I ordered 2 pair of the same size.  Of which 1 pair fit perfectly and 1 pair was very snug.  The only way to rectify this is to wear multiple times without washing, so I wear them on a "clean" outing for 3 or 4 times in a row, careful not to soil them.  Then when I wash them, I hang dry them to prevent further shrinking.

Nice fit and very comfortable! The size fits sort of like "slim fit" clothing, which is what I was looking for (aka buy bigger size if you want the baggy look or feel). It was pretty cheap and I use it all the time. Pockets are deep enough for keys, wallet, etc. although some of the bigger phones will stick out (so watch out if it's raining, etc.). Would definitely recommend!
Good Price, medium weight. Only thing I don't like is the pockets are on the small side and won't accommodate a cell phone securely. (Samsung Galaxy 7)
This jacket is kust way too thin. I wasmt expecting a huge wimyer jacket, but this one is so thin that it doesn't even block a light breeze.
Very nice hoodie for the money. I ordered it a bit big and then washed and dried it. It fits perfectly now. The red color is nice and bright.

review_title: My husband's favorite hoodie had an incident that it didn't survive
review_body: My husband's favorite hoodie had an incident that it didn't survive, so I ordered this one to try as a replacement.  It's nice material, feels soft and holds up well in the wash.  I think it's his new favorite. :)

review_title: Good Quality for the price but thin material & wont last long
review_body: Pretty good quality for the money but only for cool weather only, fleece lining is thin but a nice fitting hoodie for $12.99 but don’t believe it’ll last more than possibly 5 to 10 washes because it’s so thin...
I ordered the mens hoodie because there are a wider variety of colors and they seem more available.  This is a nice thick hoody and fits perfectly.  The color is a true Navy.
Bought a gray version of this months ago and regretted not getting a black one at that time. Have been waiting ever since to see them go on sale again so got both a black and a maroon.

so I bought this in royal blue and boy, is it BLUE!  I was walking around downtown LA after a concert with my gf last year when I gave it to her to wear because she was cold.  Big mistakes all around!  A group of dudes joyriding in an SUV spotted us and started screaming obscenities at her! We had to sneak across an empty parking lot to get away from them.  We weren't sure what we did to upset them at first, until the only logical conclusion we could draw was that they really, really don't like the color blue.

review_title: Long enough to do the job!
review_body: This is a great sweatshirt, it was bought for my grandson and it was nice to find it was long enough. He is tall thin and has long arms, finding something that fits is a treat.
I purchased 2 pairs of the same size Levi's 550 Jeans from Amazon at the same time:

review_title: I ordered a 36 and that is what the tag says but there is no way.
review_body: The one star is not necessarily for the quality of the jeans.  The one star is for the fact that a 36 isn't consistent throughout the Levi's line.  These were so tight you'd think it was actually for a 32" waist.

Ordered 2 pairs of jeans of the same size. Both were labeled with the correct size, but one pair was 2" too small in the waist; length was OK. The other pair was 2" too long; waist was OK. Because the jeans were mis-labeled by the manufacturer, I blame Levis not the shipper. Amazon refunded the purchase price.

review_title: I have always bought levis because I have an active job and levis hold up the best. This purchase was all the same brand and ...
review_body: I ordered these jeans almost a year ago and I thought I would finally write a review about my purchase. I have always bought levis because I have an active job and levis hold up the best. This purchase was all the same brand and same size but they all fit differently and one was too small to wear. The zippers are also defective. The motion of waking causes the zipper to come down constantly throughout the day. The material is holding up though. I have never had levis this bad when purchased in store or directly from levis website.

review_title: Rigid color with vanity sizing makes these difficult to recommend online.
review_body: I bought the "rigid" color. Rigid comes in a very dark inky blue...for all purposes black. After a couple of washings the color is still quite dark but after a year of washes the color gradually goes from a dark blue to a bright blue with lots of white.

review_title: But they are skin tight like spandex. Why such a drastic change just going ...
review_body: Ordered these at a 30Wx32L because the 32Wx32L was baggy. But they are skin tight like spandex. Why such a drastic change just going to a 30W waist?

review_title: Levi's Jeans, just not as good anymore.
review_body: The light stonewash color is not as shown. I ordered a pair of in light stonewash, and received a pair that was the same color as my medium stone washed pair. I returned it for a replacement. When I received the replacement, it was not any different, still a medium stonewash color. The Levi's that I have recently purchased are not of the same quality as those Levi's used to produce. The belt loops come off after a few months, and after a year or two, they get torn to shreds when pulling on the jeans. I thought that the laundry detergent was too strong, but after reading the reviews, I can see that others are having the same problem. Since  there are many negative reviews about the currently manufactured Levi's jeans, I would think that by now the Levi's company would do something to make their products with the same quality as those of years ago.Are they getting the message? Are they reading these reviews? Do they care? I am hoping for some positive action.

review_title: REALLY poor quality, I wouldn't buy from Levi's
review_body: I had to get the first pair of jeans I ordered replaced as the zipper ripped out after a few days.  I've now been wearing the replacement pair for about a week and AGAIN the zipper has ripped out!  I'm really disappointed in the declining quality of Levi jeans.  I'm not going to even bother getting this pair replaced as who knows what quality I'll get.  I think I'm going to simply get out my sewing kit and make the necessary repairs.  It's really sad that you get such poor quality from Levi's now.  They used to be such a great product.

I've bought these pants -- or, at least, prior versions of them -- for years. They fit great for me, I like the cut in general. But the workmanship has gone into the toilet. The material is far flimsier. I've had two pair for about two months, and worn each perhaps three times -- one has had two belt loops come unstitched, the other has had three. The LOOPS! Absolutely incredible. Sadly, while I love Amazon and its return policies, I don't believe there's anything to be done once you pass the one month point -- which is somewhere around the shelf life of these pants. DO NOT BUY, THEY ARE EXTREMELY POORLY MADE.
These Levi's are perfect, just what my husband wanted.  The fit is just right, and the shipping was fast.  Very pleased, will order again.  So much easier than hunting for them in the malls!

review_title: and I think he look really good too: ) I bought a medium
review_body: Got this for my husband, he really likes it, and I think he look really good too :) I bought a medium, and there is still room all though he has a bit of tummy and muscular arms, so this isn't a very tight top (which is what we wanted).
Comfortable, looks great.  Colors are true to picture and didn’t run in the wash.  Would order again in other colors,
Very happy with the price and fit.It retained size and wears well after washes.Being a big guy I appreciate the room and fit of this shirt.Definatly going to order again.
This is a great product for the price. Four starts instead of five because it is not 100% cotton, but I knew that when I bought it.

review_title: The shirt looks darn good and has a slimmer fit to it
review_body: The shirt looks darn good and has a slimmer fit to it.  I'm 5'8", 135 pounds and ordered a Small.  I have 3 of these now.  The black is sharp looking, the tan is nicely textured, and the brown one is nice and earthy (whatever that means).  I can only hope they continue selling these for the day I get irreversible stains on my current ones.

review_title: Nice shirt! Bought for my teen son
review_body: Nice shirt! Bought for my teen son, but it was too big. The medium fits my husband perfect 5'11, with somewhat broad shoulders.
I like this shirt. I can wear a XL in some high end brands but I ordered an 2XL for this shirt. Fits perfect. Will buy more.
The cotton is stiff, which makes it more difficult for my partially paralyzed husband to put on!
Great Henley shirt.  For men 5'11 170 lbs the Large was perfect. Not too heavy, and not thin at all
A little too loose fitting for a size: large compared to my other shirts. Otherwise it’s quite nice and well made. It might be better to wear later this year when it gets cooler

I've been living in these 100% polyester shirts with the high heat and 80% humidity in SoCal! You still sweat but the wicking action of the fabric keeps you cool! I'll save my cotton t-shirts for the cooler winter.

I like the material of this shirt. It is super light. I would give this shirt a five star but it is too big for me. I suggest reading the size chart, reviews and q&as carefully before buying this product.
Great overall, fot well, looked amazing, under armour doesnt fo wrong, but it left rashes under both my arms. Have to return. Very upset because it looked so well.
Nice shirt - runs a little tall - normally wear medium but was a little bit longer than normal

review_title: Perfect fit, great color, love the feel.
review_body: UA is where it is at. There are the only shirts I can wear in heat and not "sweat like a pig".  I'll never go back to cotton shirts, or for that matter, to any other material shirts.  Don't know what they do exactly, but I have had plenty of light-weight poly shirts that have me sweating heavily on the golf course.  With these, I feel cool, even on really hot days.
I'm 6'4". Probably a medium to thinner build and it fits well, it's comfortable and dries faster than a cotton shirt.

review_title: Buy the size that matches your waist.
review_body: Really nice belt. I use it for golf, because in summer I perspire enough to ruin a leather belt when I golf. Highly recommended but there are two things to know. There is plenty of length, and also the weave is made of a stretch material. So, buy the size that matches your pants, not the next larger size as you would for a nice leather belt.

review_title: Shirts are good, if you get the right ones.
review_body: The shirts are good, but, I received 3 of the wrong color, and one of them was a russell athletic brand instead of UA. Whoever shipped these was drunk or not paying attention at all.

review_title: The shirt is super wide but short
review_body: The shirt is super wide but short. Somebody that wears a XXL is either super tall or has a bigger belly. Either way the shirt needs to be much longer. My husband is 6-4 and it didn't even cover to the top of his pants and he doesn't have a belly
Narrow across shoulders and tight in the arms. Loose across the belly. So, great for the opposite of someone who is in shape.

review_title: Runs small and too tight for a 36wx34 210lb 6'3" ...
review_body: Runs small and too tight for a 36wx34 210lb 6'3" man. Doesn't compare to Dockers at all, as the description indicates. The material started producing small pieces of itself immediately upon first wash. I wore it twice and wish I had returned it in time, before my window closed. Save your money and stick to Dockers or more pricey Amazon brands life Buttoned Down.
I had to return it as soon as I got it. The measurements are all mixed up. Do yourself a favor and actually go to a retail shop to buy dress pants.

review_title: Good quality and hard to find inseam sizes offered
review_body: Can't beat these for work wear.  Great fit, very good quality and sizing perfect.  Great I can get off the wall length like 28 inseam.  Great price and will get my $$$ out of them in my day to day business casual wear.
Great pants! They run a lil long, but for the price they are amazing. Try getting these from macy's or somewhere else, and you are spending 2x the amount!

The material is soft which is OK, but not quite as thick as some of the $60.00 pants. For the cost I can buy 3 pair of these, and If I misuse them, or spill my lunch on them, I don't have to worry, just buy more!!! Win!

These really aren't wrinkle free. Even when you pull them right out of the dryer still warm. The fabric is sturdy though, has some weight to it and isn't cheap feeling. Hanging these up folded on a hanger is better than in the drawer to help the wrinkles hang out.

Pants fit OK  and appear to be good quality; BUT I have had better wrinkle resistant pants. OK to ware around the house and out for a casual lunch with friends but if I was working (I'm retired) I would need to press before wearing to work or wear something else.

True to fit in waist and length. Great looking pants for the price. Lightweight, perfect for the summer. Can be worn as casual or business attire. After trying it on, I immediately purchased 4 additional pairs (different colors).
Purchased a pair of these for my husband for his birthday. They are a different fabric from the Dockers brand of pants, but seems to be a heavier type of fabric.
They are decent pants.  Once washed they do wrinkle unless you press them out.  The material is thinner then I had expected.
Me: 6'3 - 6'4, medium built.

None of these fit the same. Not even the ones that are labeled 100% cotton. They all vary not only from style but in size as well. It's ridiculous. My suggestion to you would be pick three colors that you like, Order three pair of each and out of the nine pair of jeans pick two that will actually fit and send the rest back to Amazon and Levi. I bought two pair of Wellington and two pair of Carry-on.....all four pairs of jeans fit significantly different....seriously.

These Levi's that Amazon are selling are obviously factory seconds. This is the second pair of the 559 fit that I've ordered that do not fit right. I have many pairs of the Levi's 559 all sized 32Wx34L that I've purchased from stores. They all fit exactly as they should. However, when I order these on Amazon they do not fit the same because the sewn oddly. For example the pair I just purchased the seems on the right leg are crooked. Instead of the seems running straight up and down my inner and outer leg, they run diagonal from the crotch to the front and back of my leg. As I said, when buy these exact Levi's from a store they are fine but twice now I've received pants that are factory seconds from Amazon. Buyer beware.

review_title: A disappointing start turns into a bitter experience.
review_body: I've been a Levi's guy all my life.  The jeans look good and fit well.  My only complaint is that on the first wearing, one of the belt loops tore off at the bottom and left a small hole.  An iron-on patch and a bit of sewing saved this new pair of jeans, but this is the first time I've ever experienced something like this with a new pair of Levi's.  ADDENDUM - a little over two months after the purchase and the jeans split in the crotch.  The fabric must have been poor quality.  Not sure if I'll go back to Levis.  Too many other brands vying for my money to buy jeans that don't last but a couple of months.

Love these Levi's jeans. I'm 6'1" and weigh 250 lbs. For my body type, these jeans are the ones that fit me best. I will be re-purchasing them. I have owned many pairs of these. Purchasing a new pair recently, I realized that they seem to be about a 1/2" shorter than they used to be for the same size. Waist is just a tag more snug than the same size used to be also. Even so, I love the jeans!

review_title: Make sure to look for STRETCH with the color you choose.
review_body: Standard Levi's quality. These jeans are my go to "uniform" at home and play. Just pay attention to whether it says "STRETCH" in the description or not when choosing the color. I bought another color of the same item and it wasn't stretch so they weren't as comfortable. Other than that, you can't go wrong.

review_title: Poor Quality.  Ripped and unwearable after 3 washes!
review_body: I wanted to like these jeans.  The color, the fit, the weight of the material, everything pointed to a quality product.  Unfortunately they are not.  I ordered two pairs that arrived on Christmas Eve; meaning that I have only had these for a little over three weeks.  I wear slacks for work (which ironically are Levi and amazing!) so these only get worn on the weekends.  After 3 weekends and 3 washes they are ready for the garbage.  Both pairs have tears in the corners of the pockets that make them unwearable in public.  At over $40 a pair this kind of quality is a joke.  I have attached photos.

WTH.  Are not the same fabric/fit/look/ as 559 jeans purchased 3 years ago.  Crudely "constructed" with really thin fabric in India. Overlaid 3 yo jeans on new ones and new jeans have an extra 1.5 inches of fabric in thigh area. Clearly a size 34" waist paired with waist size 36" or 38" legs, thus the advertised "Relaxed Fit". Stuck with 3 pairs which were stripped of tags and washed never imagining Levi 559 jeans blueprints and quality had changed for the worst. I vote with my wallet and suggest you do likewise.

review_title: In the wash I bought, these are fine
review_body: I purchased a pair of 559s in Rebuilt Dark a few days ago, and when they arrived I immediately returned them because they were made out of the cheapest fabric on the face of the planet.  They were thin like hospital scrubs and had none of the characteristics anyone would associate with blue jeans, outside of the fact that they were blue.
I've been doing Levi's for years, and I know my style and measurements. I thought it was an easy decision. They fit as expected, and nothing really SEEMED off with them to me.

The jacket feels to be of decent quality, actually like it a lot for the price. I say that the fitting was somewhat small but if I were to go for a medium, I believe it would be somewhat bigger so I’m okay with the sizing. The shipping was also fast.

Got this for my husband who mentioned he wanted a casual zip up hoodie.  It's a perfect weight for Florida winters.  It wasn't expensive, but is holding up well after a couple of washings.  Husband is pleased with color and fit.

I loved the feel/fit when I first purchased it, but after 1 wash in cold water and then drying in the dryer, it shrunk in length. I ordered another off brand at the same time and it did not shrink.  I’m surprised that HANES didn’t remain the same size once washed

I'm 6'2" about 195lbs, I took others advice and got the extra large. The length is shorter than expected, but the width... I could easily fit inside the hoodie twice. This hoodie is not made for taller, skinnier people at all...
I like this sweat shirt. I have many, but this is the first all white one. I am going to iron on some important words and numbers to the under sleeves of this sweatshirt, if I ever get around to it.

review_title: It Met My Expectations for an Affordable Hoodie
review_body: 5 Stars means you love it. I don't love it but I also don't want to give them less stars just because I don't love it. There's nothing wrong with it and the description is correct, fit is okay. I just don't like the way it looks when I wear it- the look is sorta funny to me but didn't want to rate them low because I don't like how it looks.

review_title: Exactly what to expect out of a hoodie.
review_body: I originally bought this hoodie for personal anxiety reasons, and cold weather, and it works exactly as described. It's a hoodie that insulates and protects against the elements...somewhat. Its not super heavy duty so don't expect to be warm if its below freezing out, but overall, it's great to wear and fits just fine. :)

review_title: It's what I expected it to be -- amazing how hard it is to find zip-up hoodies in ...
review_body: It's what I expected it to be -- amazing how hard it is to find zip-up hoodies in local stores. I wish it had been roomier fit. I treated mine with Scotchgard so it won't suck up rain like a sponge.
This item arrived on time.  I find the zipper is a bit sticky.  I do recommend this product
I purchased the green hoodie for my husband.  It fits as expected (he wears an XL) and it washes well.  The zipper works fine, too.

review_title: they were super long. I put them next to a 29" ...
review_body: I ordered these online because I wanted to  make sure i got size 29 inseam. When I received them, they were super long. I put them next to a 29" Levi that i currently have and they were 4" longer. Very disappointed.
Should have a longer return period. It was a gift so I couldn't instantly return it. All the tags are still attached. Not pleased wasting $40.00.
The only complaint that I have with Levi's is that they are no longer made in the USA, but then what is.

Had an old pair the same size for years.  They finally became unwearable. Was pleasantly surprised that they were still available. Ordered the same style and size, fit just like the old ones.  Only difference was wife likes them darker, rather than lighter (stone washed). I don't get it but...  I find the relax fit easier to move around in, bending, kneeling, crawling under a car or stove.  Especially when working around the house.  I would choose another "fit" for "dress" jeans. But, this is what I was looking for.
Sizing is way off on this style.  I can't even get the button snapped.  I get that some brands differ, but, this is just terrible.  Already threw the packaging out or I'd just return them.

review_title: It is nice to be able to get (closer) to the length ...
review_body: It is nice to be able to get (closer) to the length needed by ordering online.  The store doesn't usually carry the shorter length pants.  These levis are exactly what we needed and slightly cheaper than the store and due to a sudden need to replace them, it kept us from having to go to the store during black Friday weekend!  Great deal!

review_title: Believe the reviews that say these are too small
review_body: I read several of the reviews about these jeans being too small and didn't believe them.  I should have.  These pants came in a 34 waist, which is the same size as all of my pants, including other Levi's jeans.  If I held my breath, and thought skinny thoughts, I could get the zipper up but still couldn't get the button closed.

review_title: We ordered 2 and 1 pair fit perfect. The other was returned 3 times
review_body: We are on the 3rd return. We ordered 2 and 1 pair fit perfect. The other was returned 3 times. it was too small each time. We decided to go with another style.
I ordered the same size that I've ordered and worn at least four other times. The older pairs still fit fine, but the new ones, after a couple of washes, are noticeably tighter.
I bought 3 pairs of these in a month, at different times, and they are all fine.  No defects like a lot of people have experienced and no poor fittings.  Exactly like I have bought in a store.

I dont usually buy Hanes products coz their Quality Assurance is big joke and had a bad experince in the past but with this shirt I believed in the positive reviews from other amazon members. Anyways, cant complain for a shirt under 10 bucks.

review_title: It is a great shirt for the price
review_body: It is a great shirt for the price. I mostly use mine to go work out outside. Long sleeves protect my arms from getting burned and to wipe off sweat. Very comfortable shirts.

review_title: Great price for a high quality shirt
review_body: Great price for a high quality shirt. Not too thin, nor too thick, it works well in the high desert for spring and fall; winter just needs a jacket added.

review_title: Good casual shirt, but not perfect.
review_body: Just what I was looking for. Price and delivery were as expected. The one problem with the shirt is that the upper front of the collar doesn't stay in place. Still a good shirt for the money.

review_title: It's a great shirt, fit is good
review_body: It's a great shirt, fit is good, just a little long on the wrists but not bad, I ordered large but I might be a medium... Anyway, its a great overall fit, love them, I will be ordering more.
Nice casual shirts. They fit well and seem well made.

I give it 5 stars. Only worn mine a few times but it seems to be a decent shirt. It's not a cheap t-shirt, It is an actual shirt. So far the thread stitching is holding up. a nice casual shirt. Good price for what you get.
Looks and feels like a good shirt, but the seam on the right front shoulder ripped (about 2”) in the first washing cycle. I obviously won’t be buying another one to see if this was a fluke

review_title: I've purchased 3 of these awesome henley shirts
review_body: I've purchased 3 of these awesome henley shirts. I completely recommend them. I'm around 5'6 and with broad shoulders and wear a medium.

review_title: I like this shirt a lot and it
review_body: Well made, I like this shirt a lot and it, I think, looks good on me. Wear it all the time and the way it is made it will last a long time. Fit just like I wanted it to.
I have several in different coolers, great shirt. Perfect for hot days at the range in the burning sun. Loose fit but not long. Holds up well after many washings.

Great t-shirt and works well when the heat is on. You feel cool the whole time while feeling light at the same time. It has a loose fit so if you are looking for something tight, this isn't it. The material feels great on the skin too. I'm very happy with the purchase.

review_title: See theough not a good quality
review_body: It was ok, color was as shown BUT it was see through. Not a good quality as Under Armour usually is. It was a gift thats why i didnt return it

review_title: he wears it all the time now and says it's one of his favorite shirts and feels great when he is out working ...
review_body: i bought this for my Dad for his birthday, he wears it all the time now and says it's one of his favorite shirts and feels great when he is out working in the yard and doing stuff around the house. He told me he wants more for Christmas.
My 13 year old son loves Under Armour t-shirts.  Soft material that won't have you sweating in the summer.  Fit was perfect.

Great shirt, just as described.  Love the breathable fabric.  Bought a medium for my 5'11"/155 lb son for football practice and he's very happy with it, not a tight shirt, nice fit for working out.  Same size he typically wears.

review_title: Then I ordered a small for myself and that suited me much better. I always order men's T-shirts because I hate ...
review_body: I am 5'10" 160lbs (female) and ordered a medium. It was way too baggy on me so I gave it to my 6'0" 190lb husband and it fit him perfectly. Then I ordered a small for myself and that suited me much better. I always order men's T-shirts because I hate how they design female shirts with the cut flaring out along the hips. It's unnecessary and unflattering, makes the shirt too wide. These shirts are nice and long.
Awesome work out / everyday shirt. Very comfortable material that fits as expected. Got a few more pairs right after trying this one.

review_title: Great fit but much brighter color than what’s shown
review_body: Great fit but much brighter color than what’s shown.  We’d have preferred a bit more of a distressed or muted color, like what’s on the model.

I love the feel of the wicking fabrics and it's even better when they're just the right size.  These come as standard t-shirt sizes.  If you wear a large, order a large. etc.  These are well made, the seams look pretty strong.  Perfectly happy with the shirt.
I bought some Eddie Bower’s for a work pant, and they kept falling apart.

review_title: I won't bother looking for work pants for my husband anywhere else!
review_body: Well done, Amazon! You offer a well-made trouser at a reasonable price. These pants fit as expected, wash well and wear like much more expensive (and lesser quality) brands. I won't bother looking for work pants for my husband anywhere else!
these are not quality pants--fits very small, not true to size---better as a dust rag than as pants--

review_title: Casual pants, not dressy as described...
review_body: Nice fit and quality for the price.  The fabric is a brushed cotton/poly blend.  The product description said "dressy" so I expected the fabric to be nicer.  A nice casual pant, but not formal as I expected and wanted.  I returned the item.

These were a gift for my husband.  I purchased them in four colors.  He loves them!  Great fit.  Very nice looking pants, that could be dressed up or dressed down, depending on the event being attended.  Price was great for this find.

If you hang them up right away out of the dryer, they sort-of hold a crease, though they might need a touch-up ironing. They're not durable enough for hard labor, but are good enough for a casual office.

The first pair I bought 2 months ago was great!  This pair seems to have been improperly sewn as the pocket openings are unraveling from the leg of the pants.  Trying to get a replacement but not sure how to do this?

review_title: Great Comfortable Sturdy Pair of Pants
review_body: Great pants, fits true to size.  Thick, soft fabric, well designed, not cheaply made.  The only complaint is that it is hard to remove them from the dryer and wear without ironing.  Sometimes this seems possible, but not always.

Well made pants at a bargain price. The fit is true to size Good material, put together very nicely. These are not intended to be high fashion, but they are great casual every-day pants. Will be ordering more.

review_title: Taupe looks nothing like the photo.
review_body: Taupe looks nothing like the photo.  What I received looks like plain grey, what is shown in the photo looks like a medium brown.  I like the pants a lot but the color is way off on the taupe.

review_title: Good quality denim for a change....
review_body: Its crazy, depending on the color you order, these Levis are all made In different countries.  So, my Carry On color was actually made in Mexico like they were some years back after they stopped making them in the USA.  The denim was nice and thick, the wash looks great, and they are pretty true to size.  A bit tighter through the thigh, but this is because the Levis made in Mexico use thicker better quality denim than Cambodia, Viet Nam, Egypt.....etc.  Would definitely buy again, and should just order another pair right now.
color is nice, fit is nice, cut is nice, but denim is paper thin.  Wouldn't be surprised if I could see through them if I held the pants up to a light.

review_title: These are a nice dark color that you can dress up and the ...
review_body: My husband is hard on his pants - holes in back pockets, stretches through the knees, frayed at the bottoms, etc. We sometimes buy jeans in local stores for convenience, but if I'm looking for a quality pair that won't start falling apart within a year, I turn to Levi's. These are a nice dark color that you can dress up and the relaxed cut is flattering for most men.

The best.  Levi's 559s are my go-to-jeans.  They're super comfortable right out of the box. They have a relaxed fit, but they're not sloppy or ill-fitting. They're durable, timelessly fashionable, and reasonably priced.  The shipping was super fast.

Fit is expected when I try it on. While checking out the material, I noticed a long sticker of Levi's, usually with the jeans cutting printed together with the model number, there is a "Stretch" printed on it. Therefore, I pulled a portion of the thigh area, it stretched a little.

review_title: Horrible quality. Both pairs lasted barely a month. Waste of money.
review_body: These jeans are the worst quality I have ever worn. The first pair I purchased in November ripped by the end of December. Bought a second pair on January 5th and they just ripped in the crotch again! $100 on 2 pairs and they barely lasted a month each. Of course it was right outside the 30 day period so I can't return. Amazon needs to take this junk off their website. So upset I just wasted $100.

Bought same model jeans locally-they look, fit and feel totally different. The fabric on ones from Amazon is very thin, color is wrong too. Looks like a knock-off. I needed a new pair to travel, so put them on right away. Should of send them back instead. Do not buy these!

review_title: Same price as any department store on sale plus I ...
review_body: Same price as any department store on sale plus I got free two day shipping. As long as you know your size, this is worth it. Will purchase again

I've been wearing Levi's for about 20 years now. These fit like Levi's. Some of the colors seem to have lighter weight denim. This isn't bad unless you expect the classic heavy denim feel. Darker colors seem to be the heavier denim that you might be familiar with. The lighter colors tend to be closer to something that would be more "business casual" in terms of material feel and look.

review_title: do not buy from this seller!!!!!!!
review_body: these levi's jeans are knock-offs. if you've ever owned a pair of 559's, you know that each pair has a bit of stretch in them and are roomy through the hip, thigh, and buttocks. these fake things fit more like the 569's, have no stretch, no room, and despite getting the size in teh 559's that i can actually pull off without unbuttoning (while i'm wearing a belt, mind you), these jeans don't even button! tags are missing, the material is much thinner than actual levi's, and the stitching is off. (i live in nyc, home of the counterfeit clothe operations, so i know a little about knock-offs) unfortunately for me, i opened the bag too late and realized all of this outside of my return window. needless to say, i will never buy from amazon clothing store again.
The best thing about this hoodie is it is super affordable. It is also very comfortable. I wear during the summer months also to sweat more when I workout in the gym.

review_title: Arrived on time. Little on the small side but ...
review_body: Arrived on time. Little on the small side but I expect that they will stretch with use and repeated washes. Oh, speaking of I washed one of them for the second time today, the zipper popped off. One of the teeth near the bottom was missing and it seemed very weak down there.

review_title: Great for chilly maybe not for COLD.
review_body: I bought this hoodie because I need something to wear during work as a furniture mover.  I wanted something I could wear on cold mornings but easily and quickly put on and take off.  I've only worn this a few times so far, but it is doing its job well.  The pockets are the right size for my average sized hands and the zipper works well.  My only minor complaint is that the hood doesn't have two layers so when you wear it you have the "fleece" side of the fabric in your hair.  A very minor complaint, but it seemed like an indication of lower quality and attention to detail.  I have not tested this below about 55 degrees.  At this point I would imagine I'd prefer something a little heavier for the dead of winter, but it is a great fall sweatshirt.
Very comfortable fleece hoodie.  The color, fit and quality is very good.  I would recommend this item to anyone looking for a good quality, comfortable hoodie for chilly days and nights.

review_title: Good Value for the money -- functional washable sweatshirt
review_body: Great basic sweatshirt -- at a nice price. Comes just a half size small, but close enough, did not shrink in the first washing either but it might in the long run.  Soft, just what I wanted.
I got this for my husband so he would have something to wear whenever we have to go to the hospital or Doctor's office.  He really likes it.  I  ordered him an extra large.

review_title: I recommend washing it in cool water on casual with light ...
review_body: This sweatshirt is soft and has survived multiple washings. It still remains as soft as it was when it arrived. I recommend washing it in cool water on casual with light colors to maintain softness.

review_title: ... purchased at Target that are also XL but fit better. I’ll keep this but it fits a little ...
review_body: I have two other Hanes “Premium” full zip sweatshirts in different colors purchased at Target that are also XL but fit better. I’ll keep this but it fits a little smaller than those. Otherwise I’d give it 5 stars.

Just what I needed. Simple, basic layer for underneath heavy winter jackets/wear to the gym. Great, breathable fleece. Warm but not too warm. Would get another in light grey! 4 stars because of the inside finish, doesn't enable you to dress it up.

It was a lightweight sweatshirt and not what I would call a fleece jacket, but I suspected as much by the price.  I like it very much for what it is, and I love the price.  I have since bought a proper fleece hooded jacket, which is what I needed in the first place.

review_title: Like these "relaxed fit" Levi's but they fit a bit snug
review_body: Like these jeans but they fit a bit snug. More so than store bought versions of the same size jeans, especially considering the "relaxed fit" billing. My wife had already washed them so returning is now not an option. Hope they stretch to fit better over time. Otherwise, great quality and the price is the best I've seen.

had to return 2 times.  product shrinks badly.  ordered the same as the others in my closet, but now made with different denim that is not as good as before.  if i were to try again, i'd go with a bigger starting size in waist-- next one up.

Returned jeans, the red tag that's sunonumus with Levi is only a red tag with no writing, second order like this. So either counterfeit or Levi has cut even more corners... I guess time to switch brands.

I like the jeans and will buy them again. For the price they are great jeans and comparable in style and fit to far more expensive jeans. The only reason I didn't give them 5-stars is because of the slight differences between the jeans now and one year ago. I purchased these thinking the material and fit would be identical to the pairs I've purchased in the past. Since the last time I purchased, roughly 1-year ago, the material seems slightly lighter weight and the fit is a slightly different feel. These jeans are still excellent though.

I have been wearing Levi's 550 relaxed fit jeans for years (I'm wearing a pair now).  However, on my last order, either all three pairs were defective in their size marking, or the sizes have changed.  I ordered the same size I am now wearing, but the jeans I received were significantly smaller--no way I could get into them.  Returned them with no problem, but the fact that I apparently can't count on the jeans fitting, even though I ordered the exact same style and size I'm currently wearing makes me very hesitant to order any more Levi's online.  I think I'll have to stick to buying them in stores where I can try them on first.

review_title: Fit perfectly. Expected quality. Good Price.
review_body: Never bought clothes online before and expected to have at least 1 issue but I was surprised. They fit as expected, same quality as the ones at a brick and mortar but less expensive and I didn't have to waste time in a store or traffic. Nice!

These are really great Levis. I have been purchasing Levis for years at retail stores.  There is a difference with the quality of these ones.  They are heavier and a better quality.  Price is better too.  I will continue to purchase here.
Got the pants they fit great. The problem is they ripped down from the pocket down. I bought 2 pair and they both ripped

review_title: Amazon changes return time frame window
review_body: Amazons new window on returning clothes is awful. We are stuck with two pairs of jeans that don’t fit because I didn’t sign up for new “wardrobe” plan. A little warning for a long time member would have been nice. I will do my clothes online shopping else where for now on.
“Levi’s - The iconic brand disappoints, quality control no longer a priority”.
A little loose but a wash and dry will take care of that. The material is nice and thick. The only negatives would be that the color fades quick and it collects lots of lint.
Good fit, washes well, flexible material...very pleased with my purchase.p
Shrank alot
fit as expected
The long sleeve t-shirts are soft and launder well.  They fit me, a skinny old man, very well and I find them quite comfortable.  I plan to purchase more of them soon.  Larry A.

I like Hanes quality, but these shirts were a little on the snug side, nor enough to return them but nevertheless.......The versatility of these shirts are excellent. Works with jeans & workboots or throw on a sport jacket to jazz it up for an evening out.

review_title: These were perfect. They came in four great colors
review_body: I bought this shirt for my dad for Christmas. He is a large man and it is very hard to find clothes that either come in his size or fit him well. These were perfect. They came in four great colors, I picked blue as that is my dad favorite color. They fit him well and he has worn them quite a few times since Christmas with no fading of color or wear of the material.
Love the shirt. Fits great, very comfortable and getting lots of compliments on the color.
If you're tall like the person I ordered it for, you may want to go a size up. He is tall and lean and this fit narrow and shrunk substantially after being washed and dried.
Good looking shirt. Got one size larger than necessary as the correct size not available.  Still fit ok.
Good purchase for me...I'm over weight and sweat a lot at work.  These are great for not letting it get through to my uniform.
Fits as described. I usually wear extra large but product description said it was a loose fit so I ordered a large instead and it fits well.  Great color and very soft feel.

review_title: My husband loved it. First time we purchased the "Loose Fit" ...
review_body: My husband loved it. First time we purchased the "Loose Fit"  and it was a nice surprise... both flattering and comfortable on him. Material is nice. Price, looks, and comfort, all in one. (Wish there would be  more choice of colors at the "sale" price as we would buy more.)

Under Armour is always worth the money.The quality is excellent and it fits just as expected. This particular t-shirt is comfortable and versatile. My fiancé wears it with gym shorts or a more casual pair of plaid shorts. It is light weight and breathes nicely. We love all of our under armour gear. The one item we purchased that we were not happy with (a pair of mens slides) customer service happily replaced with an item of greater value that we were extremely satisfied with.
Pro:
Our grandson plays football and loves under armour. At the time of purchase this was the best price available across multiple sites.
Ive bought many Under Armor products and they are well made, comfortable, functional products. This one is no different. It's light, breaths well and is comfortable.
Very thin and fit small to size. I’d order a larger size and make sure you know they are pretty much see through
This type of shirt has me transitioning from 100% cotton in the hot, humid south. Much more breathable with the wicking aspect of the material.

review_title: Good shirt, but white stains easily (even suncreen stains it)
review_body: The white color looks good until it gets stained brown by your sunscreen.  I have tried spray suncreen and rub-on sunscreen but all my white UA shirts get stained immediately.  You can keep exercising in them, but don't plan on wearing them to the beach where you want to look sharp.

Standard, run-of-the-mill pants. They'll sure enough do what they were intended for and do it well. They fit well, the tag is kinda scratchy if it makes contact with your skin. The material isn't soft by any means, but hey, they're pants.

I wore these to church for 1st time. Putting them on I noticed a little tight in the waist. I wear a 38 and they were snug. They were also very long which caused them to be baggy. The material was great and they were comfy. I give these 3 stars for comfort but that’s it. Probably won’t buy these again.
The pants fit as expected, but they looked really loose. I didn't like the overall look

review_title: These pants are made of sturdy material and look so nice and neat on my ...
review_body: These pants are made of sturdy material and look so nice and neat on my husband. They are true to size and very comfortable. I'd buy these again in other colors if they weren't out of his size in them. He wears a size 40 x 32.

Good everyday chinos at an amazing price. No complaints whatsoever. I liked the first pair so much that I bought several more in different colors. They are not "high style" but they are just fine for casual wear.

review_title: True fit at a great value
review_body: Fit is good and better quality than I was expecting. These are light weight slacks that travel and launder well.
As good a fit as Dockers for much less money.  Good value, worth the purchase.
pants are way to tight will be returning asap plz credit back my account

review_title: Great fit and feel for the price
review_body: Perfect fit--exact fit in both waist and length to the published sizes.  Very well made and "heavy" fabric.  I live in FL and its summer most of the time so I'll wear them for our 12 days of winter and when we travel...shorts the rest of the time.  Great price and quick shipment from Amazon.

review_title: These just do not feel like they fit as well
review_body: I still prefer the fit of my Lees and Dockers. These just do not feel like they fit as well. These are a few dollars less and perhaps a better bang for the buck. Time will prove if these will last.

review_title: I do not believe these are genuine Levi's jeans, ...
review_body: I do not believe these are genuine Levi's jeans, and would never buy again.

review_title: The Andi color is true-to-size and fits fine.
review_body: I purchased the Andi color which was made in Vietnam.  These jeans fit great and the material has a decent thickness.  I'm considering purchasing another pair in a different color.  Based on what other reviewers have mentioned, it seems the size/fit is inconsistent.  I'm wondering if specific colors are made only by a specific country, and if so then it would be beneficial if reviewers could indicate which color they purchased and where (which country) it was manufactured so potential buyers can be better prepared when deciding which color to buy.

Nice jeans and comfortable. Ordered another pair also a size smaller this time.  They are thinner denim than I'm used to, but feels like a comfy pair of pajama pants. They will be nice this summer.  Love the way they ride lower where I normally like to wear my jeans and no sag in the crotch area.

I've always liked Levi's, but I haven't worn them in awhile. I thought I'd experiment with other brands (i.e., True Religion, Seven, Joe's jeans, etc.). What they had in quality they lacked in fit, at least for my body type, which is small waist but bigger than average butt and thighs. Given they way jeans are cut today, I have to buy larger waist sizes so that I can pull the jeans over my butt. Anyway, this style of Levi's didn't disappoint. I usually buy jeans that are two waist sizes larger, depending on the brand and cut, but with the Levi's 559, I only need to buy one size larger. Cheers!

review_title: the waist also stretches making the 32 inch waist seem more like a 33 or 34 waist
review_body: Overall inconsistent with previous 559 jeans from three years ago (2014-2013). Material is stretchy in the most current version compared to in the past and while they fit looser, the waist also stretches making the 32 inch waist seem more like a 33 or 34 waist. My old 559 jeans do not need to a belt and these do. My actual waist is a inch or two bigger than 32 and while these sit below the waist and there is a lot variance between wait size and hip size (where these actually rest on) among people, I do not understand why Levi felt the need to increase the waist size. I have not owned them enough to comment on durability, but generally speaking stretchy materials (lycra, elastane, spandex...etc) do not age well compared to materials without them.

review_title: Too Baggy Through the Leg for My Taste
review_body: These jeans are a little baggy for my taste. I actually thought they would fit a little tighter than my usual 569's but they actually fit and look looser, which is weird. I washed them in cold water and dried them on medium and they didn't shrink up at all either, which is also weird. I probably wouldn't buy these again, to be honest.

review_title: To me they are the perfect blue jean
review_body: I feel like Im an old man now; these seem to be my default pair of jeans,I love them, and when I'm wearing jeans, it's probably these (in one of like 5 pairs). It's all personal preference, so don't let me tell you what to like, but for me I can't justify spending more!

The material is not the same as what I bought in store. The pair I bought in store is 98% cotton and has lasted me 4 years before showing signs of wear on the knees and thighs. The pair I bought here is 70% cotton and 30% spandex or some crap, looks like women's tights and feels like it too. Didn't bother checking the country of origin, the good pair I bought is made in Mexico though. Guess I should have kept the tag on before trying them on.

review_title: ... pair of these Levi 559s two years ago and like them so much that I order another
review_body: Bought a pair of these Levi 559s two years ago and like them so much that I order another.  These are my casual going-out in-public jeans.  I still like my other Levi's (505s), but for wearing when do chores around the house.

review_title: Surprised They Were Stretch Jeans. Fit As Expected.
review_body: These fit as expected, so that's good. The material seems quite a bit thinner than my store-bought 559 Levi's. There was also no mention that these were "stretch" jeans in the description, (with the exception of the listing of the material being 99% cotton and 1% elastane); so I wasn't expecting stretch jeans. But I need a pair of black jeans and they fit, so I'm keeping them.

review_title: Absolutely terrific for the price - its not that lightweight (but ...
review_body: Absolutely terrific for the price - its not that lightweight (but also not suitable for heavy cold - but that's a given). I haven't used it for very long but the zipper seems fairly sturdy, not like a junker that will be ruined or fall apart within a few wears. Hood might be big for some but for me it's just right (I usually wear M/L or L/XL size hats). very pleased

review_title: Heck of a price for a great product!
review_body: I love this hoodie! It's my favorite light jacket to wear to the gym.  I just washed it for the first time and it shrunk very little.  The material is super soft.  I plan on getting a couple more in various colors
This hoodie is very comfortable.  This is probably the 5th one we bought and it's not because it had problems.  Some were lost, but we rebought them because they are so comfy.

review_title: Perfect!  That warm comfy cotton feeling!
review_body: One of the best pieces of clothes I have bought through Amazon.  Good fit.  Extremely comfortable.  The zipper is a solid build quality.  My go to jacket on cold days or just chilling.  Warm and comfy!
These sweatshirt jackets are perfect they are lightweight so that you don't get overly heated but it's enough to keep you warm when here's a chill in the air
Thin hoodie that i enjoy wearing

review_title: Quality is decent for the price
review_body: I got this hoodie for one of my sons, who likes it very much.  At 5'10" and 290 pounds, the 3X size fits him perfectly.  It's not fancy, but it's warm and the quality is decent for the price. The zipper engages and runs smoothly.  The seams are strong and the color is true.  I would buy this again.

review_title: Drawstrings are cheap and need to be replaced but otherwise it's a great hoodie.
review_body: Too small for a large but not quite a medium . . . which is EXACTLY what I needed. Drawstrings are cheap and need to be replaced but otherwise it's a great hoodie.

review_title: I bought these for gym use and they are great. I usually wear L or XL T-Shirts and ...
review_body: These are the most expensive hoodies, but they do the job. I bought these for gym use and they are great. I usually wear L or XL T-Shirts and bout a large in this. Fits great and will last a while. Some people are worried about the hoddies draw strings.... They're not the best but honestly how often are you using those?

review_title: Great fit, medium fleece density and good construction.  Very comfortable.
review_body: Great fit, medium fleece density and good construction.  Worn and washed in hot water, dried hot, little to no shrinkage.  Hanes has the best zippered hooded fleece jackets, quite a bargain at $16.

review_title: Poor quality stich on belt loops
review_body: I'm upset with Levi's. I stop buying Levi's that I grew up with wearing almost exclusively through the 60's, 70's and 80's. Then the durability and stich quality dropped and belt loops broke leaving holes where the stich pulled out. Well I decided to buy 2 pairs after a decade or two. The first pair have been fine, but this pair had a belt loop pull out the stich on the very first day I wore them. That is not right. now I need to send back or something, there is a small hole where you would need to stich if I was to repair myself...

I have several pair of 550, Rinse jeans that I have purchased in the last 2 years. They are heavyweight (14.3 oz) as described on your website. I have purchased these directly from you and from Amazon both. Same jeans and quality. I just received (2) pair of 550 Rinse from Amazon. These are as thin as a cheap t-shirt. Pathetic !! Are there different levels of material from that go to different sellers? Very disappointed. Can tell these won't hold their color or shape for anytime. Any way to get the heavyweight like advertised ?
These are good looking jeans. I think the material is little on thinner side. I like other jeans where material is a bit heavier. These are comfortable and good looking jeans.

Well if you want the jeans in the picture good luck because what came look like I should be shucking around the farmhouse late at night with a canvas sack over my head and a pitchfork looking for my latest victim.

Long time Levi wearer, but those back pocket tares didn't seem to be around in my youth.  If they can't do something about it soon, I may have to go somewhere else.  One pair didn't even last a month before a hole showed up.

review_title: Never what size I will get
review_body: I don't know why when I order Levi's the size is always different. These are the same size as another pair and are quite long. I'm not sending these back, but I often do. I have jeans that are 34x36, 36x34 and 36x36 that fit the same. Thanks to Amazon return policy, I can end up with the right size. I still like Levi jeans and the quality is great.

review_title: Seems like the production and material is cheaper quality than it was a few years ago? Or I got a dud pair.
review_body: These were the first pair of Levis I bought in 10 years because my old ones just ripped. I figured buying Levis again would get me another 10 years, and I bought these as a test to see if I should get several different colors. I don't know if I got a dud or something, but there was a loose rivet in one pocket, and that same pocket had some damage to the jean which looks like it will develop into a hole sooner than later. The plastic package the pair came in was not damaged.

I ordered two pairs of these for my husband. He has several old pairs of the 550s so I figured these would be the same. They aren't. The material isn't as good and doesn't stretch like the old 550s. It's also thinner. My husband has large thighs and could barely fit into these although they were his size. I ended up returning them and was very happy with Amazon customer service in that regard. Returning them was very simple. In the future, I will encourage my husband to buy jeans in person. I won't be buying more mail order jeans from Levi. It's sad. I used to trust the Levi brand, but they've seriously gone downhill.

review_title: These were NOT the correct size.
review_body: Since it's hard for me to find jeans with a 29 inseam in stores (yes, I have short legs), I ordered two pairs of these Levi's 550 size 34x29 about 4 months ago. I love those jeans, because THEY ARE THE RIGHT SIZE. A pair I ordered just recently SAY 34x29 on the patch on the jeans, but they are at least 2 inches longer than my previous purchase. What gives? How hard is it to keep your product the same size? Were they just mislabelled at the factory?

I purchased a 505 that seemed somewhat small compared to prior 505 purchases.  I'm not getting fatter.  The loops for the belt are closer together in the front, and the cut around the groin seemed tighter, even after wearing the jeans for about a month.  So, I tried the 550.  It fits fine, but the cut, particularly around the upper thighs makes me look a little old and chubby, even though they are a bit baggy there.  Also, the "dark stonewash" - that was a mistake.  I meant to order the rinse, which I think looks better after a few washes.  However, my wife likes the dark stonewash.  For me, the feel of the dark stonewash is too smooth or synthetic.
Very comfortable very affordable.  Could easily pay double in any department store

I was skeptical about this shirt (figured it’d be cheap, thin, whatever) but was willing to risk $10.  I was very pleasantly surprised. The shirt is nice and comfortable, holds up to repeated washings and looks good.
I bought two different colors of this Henley, one was sized correctly and the other was to small.
I got this and I am somewhat slim but i am 6'3  so since this is 100% cotton i got an extra large expecting it to shrink a bit but the bicep area is super baggie even after i washed it

review_title: Great quality shirt for an amazing price!
review_body: It's a favorite shirt. I have 3 of these each one is well constructed and well designed. I have had one for over 3 years and it's still holding up and the color is still the same as when I got it.
I love this shirt but am having a difficult time getting it at the lower price on the Hanes site.  They have cancelled two of my orders and now don’t even list it. What’s up with that?
Can't go wrong with a Hanes Beefy T! Looks good and the price is right. Fit as expected.

review_title: This shirt is nice looking but my husband says the top half
review_body: This shirt is nice looking but my husband says the top half, chest area, fits weird on him. Oddly if he rolls the sleeves up, it looks better on him fit wise. I don't know if sizing up would help with the fit in the chest.
I ordered my normal size and these run small, so keep that in mind.  Other than that they are good material, shipped fast, and good quality.
Has a nice amount of thickness and softness with good length to the arms.  Comfortable.although not the shirts fault it is tighter around the belly area where I have more of a mini keg then a 6 pack.

I thought thought that this was aa black and gray shirt but when I received it the color was navy and gray.  Ran somewhat large.  I'm giving this as a birthday present in February so I may have to return it.  Loved the feel of the material.

I have 3 other UA shirts (Red) just like this one and for some reason this one feels cheaply made.  I wear these in Iraq on a shooting range that I work on everyday. I won't be buying from this seller again.  But don't get me wrong.... the shirt works.....but I will be buying UA shirts from a different source.
This is my husband’s favorite workout performance T-shirt. He loves it so much that he ordered 4.

review_title: Check the color before you buy.
review_body: Oh man, this color is wrong. On the web page it looked kinda red. But it's really hot pink. Just not for me

I bought this for my boyfriend's birthday in August. We are big into camping and he enjoys hiking on the weekends. He absolutely LOVES this shirt! Very flattering at the shoulders. He likes shirts to be more loose than tight. He is 6'2" 230lbs and I got an XL (I think a L would have fit him perfect, but like I said he likes things loose). This shirt is so breathable, he said it was the closest he has felt to not wearing a shirt. Underarmour's excellent quality, as expected. I will be buying him more!

review_title: An ok shirt for some reason didn't fit like the rest was also made in a different location
review_body: An ok shirt for some reason didn't fit like the rest was also made in a different location. Still wearable but ill be returning.

review_title: Great shirts, little pricey but worth it
review_body: Great shirts, little pricey but worth it. Great to work out in or go out on a casuel night out.

review_title: These shirts are great! They breath and allow sweat to evaporate
review_body: These shirts are great! They breath and allow sweat to evaporate, while keeping you cool. I've just about quit wearing cotton shirts anymore and solely use UA gear. I've had one (bought at a retail store) for years that has gone through the wash at least 100 times and it's held up great, so longevity for this brand is great for the price.

review_title: Same shirt as in the retail stores!
review_body: I was skeptical of the authenticity, but the shirt was genuine Under Armour. Recommended for summer or warmer months, as the material is the thinner wicking kind.

review_title: Nice looking shirt has a great fit.
review_body: I like this shirt it fits great and looks good on me. I've lost over 100 lbs working out and needed some new workout clothes. This one looks great and performs great as I run 10  miles a day now. I'm going to have to oder some more because one of my kids put a crayon in the dryer and now it has a blue mark on it.
Bad quality, put them on once and decided I never want to wear them. Would have loved to return; don’t buy.

My husband absolutely loves these pants. He now has six pairs of these. He wears an in-between size (35x32) so he has a hard time finding pants that fit well. These are great, though. Good quality material, love the flat front look comma and you really cannot be the price!
Great pants for business casual work environment. I will purchase more in the future.

review_title: Feels like one size too small around the waist and 2” ...
review_body: Feels like one size too small around the waist and 2” too long in length. I’ve ordered this same size with Docker and other brands for years and did not have this problem with their slacks.
Great for work but keep your long roller handy, they attract a lot of lint. But usually I use a long roller at the beginning of my shift and that's all I need. Super affordable and comfortable.
They fit way too small and didn't feel very nice.  really cheap feeling.  I ended up returning them.

Overall I like the quality and the fabric but the cut off the pants the regular fit, classic fit not for me I would give five stars if they came in slim fit but despite that this is a go and get it product!
Good fit and a good price.
Nothing to rant about or nothing to complain about they are decent slacks for the price, I gave them a 3 because I could get (in my opinion) better quality for the same price from another reatalor
Nice comfortable pants. Fit is pretty spot on. Very comfortable and deep pockets. Belt loops are good placement. The material is interesting, it sort of collects lint but not too bad.

review_title: Levis jeans are terrific. Like most men
review_body: What can I say?  Levis jeans are terrific.

I generally love my Levi's & I have purchased several pair on Amazon with no issue until this time.  I tried on some jeans at a local Macy's and found a new size/style I really liked (used to go with loose 569s, but was able to go with a smaller waist and the relaxed 559s).  I just was not crazy about the color options available in stock at the store.  I ordered the same size 559s from Amazon and they feel like they are 2 sizes too big.  Unfortunately I am not able to return them, but I will be hesitant to order on-line for a while until I get a bit more confident in the Quality.
Levi's 559 has always been my favorite jeans for casual wear. They fit perfectly for my size, which is athletic but not huge (huge would be 550 or just very baggy).

review_title: I can wear these jeans all day
review_body: I will never buy another brand/style of jeans. The comfort and fit of these jeans is hands down the best I have ever had. They don't hug your body and are just loose enough for mobility and comfort. I am replacing all of my jeans with the 559 Levi's. Best jeans I have ever owned.

I wanted the regular relaxed jeans... these are low cut at the waist. I wish that part was mentioned in the description.  Also it is made of some stretchy fabric.  This is the description...incase I am missing something:

I don't really love jeans. I mean, heck, what's to love? But I really do like these pants. Fit exactly, are comfortable, and seem durable. Because of my gut, they seem to ride down on my hips, too much, but I don't blame the jeans for that. I intend to fix that myself some day.

Levi's 559 are far and away the best fit for me personally.  They don't bind or restrict when I am working.  They are not too heavy to remain comfortable.  And Levi's sizes are so reliable that I can mail order a couple pair whenever I need them knowing that the fit will be perfect.

review_title: Sizing is all over the place
review_body: I have gotten a bit more grand this year and ordered 2 pair of 40x32's up from the 38x32's that I own and were purchased in a Levi's outlet. I don't know if they changed something over the past year, but one pair (slightly darker wash and heavier material) fits as expected, the other pair was a lighter wash and is almost falling off. The wash difference was intentional, the materials difference was pretty surprising, but not nearly as much as the fit. The lighter pair isn't even wearable. I guess $40 doesn't buy what it used to.

Stretch jeans?  No thanks. Very thin denim made of stretchy material. I checked out in store and see they have stretch and regular denim. Definitely stay away from the stretch. What are these, PAternity pants?  No no no.

Have an old pair of these that are 30x30. Ordered matching size but too snug. Had to get 31x30 and it fits great. What more to say about Levi's jeans? They're comfortable, acceptable in a wide range of places and occasions, and they wear/age well.

I have a hoodie from Joe Boxer that I've almost destroyed from wearing too much.  It's been difficult to find one that is around the same materials with that big, roomy, and cozy fit that I love.  No one seems to make these anymore, just plain with out all the prints all over them, or snug fitting, or no fur in the hood, etc.  Fashion has taken a dive with the making of a simple hoodie as far as I'm concerned.  I haven't been able to find any made by Joe Boxer anymore either - wonder if they quit making them... This one is great though!  Love it very much!
I have 5 of these in the same color. (Black) Not especially soft or fancy, but they fit close, zip up and do the trick. Good basic.

review_title: and it was perfect. Great material
review_body: I'm 5'6, 111lbs, and usually wear a small to medium in mens. I got a medium, hoping it would be a bit roomy, and it was perfect. Great material, warm, feels comfy. Highly recommend.

Bought this for my husband in a 2 XL. Fit as expected, washes up nicely with minimal shrinkage. He said it is comfortable and material is not too thin or too heavy so good for everyday over a tee shirt. I wish they also had the option of a collar and not a hood.  Will be buying again.
My husband is a 3x and these didn’t quite fit that size but they still get the job done insofar as something to keep you warm or to wear over a shirt.

review_title: Fits a tad large, but is a great light jacket!
review_body: Fits a little large but this thing is awesome. Originally, it left a little "black" fuzz on my clothes but after a few washes, this issue is no more.
Been looking for a navy zip down hoody for a long while. Good quality. Has a metal zipper, which is rare these days,  for the price. I'm very happy with it.
I've had mine for a year now and still wear it regularly. When it gets cold I go to sleep in it.

Great internal feel, good quality. Ordered black and it was black. Small and it was small. This is something I can appreciate as sometimes when buying black, and small, you never know what to expect. Buy with confidence!

If it were more expensive, I'd complain, but for $15 it's a great hoodie. My only problems with it are that the pockets are pretty shallow so my phone falls out of them, and the strings to adjust the hood seem easily frayed.

review_title: A little tight on the hips and man parts.
review_body: Length and waist are fine, but these are cut a little tighter across the hips and groin then Levis used to be. I wore a uniform most of the time for 8 years, then I wore a suit to work most of the time for 5 years after that, so I have Levis 550s that are more than 15 years old that are in decent shape and the same size that I ordered. but fit differently. I wind up doing a few squats and lunges to stretch out the tight areas every time I put these on. Once they loosen up, they are okay, but there just isn't enough material in that area for them to really allow my man parts a little freedom,

I'm an older guy and I've been wearing this brand and style of jeans for years. They shrink a little bit and fade after many washings so I buy new ones once in a while for work but save the old ones for working at home. It is rare that I have worn a pair out.
Super comfortable and fit well but it does not last long. It went unraveled on the waist after 3 months using it daily. I still can wear it but I would expect more from the brand.
Unless I gained 2 inches on my waist, these jeans fit as expected.  I do enjoy wearing them.  Relaxed fit is understated.  These are very comfortable!

A pair of Levi's Men's 550 Relaxed Fit Jeans is what my significant other wears most days. The medium stonewash is his favorite shade. I have ordered these jeans for him many times over the years from various sources. Fit is consistent, but the weight of the fabric has changed. I don't think the denim is quite as heavy as it used to be. It would be nice to be able to choose between light, medium, and heavy weight denim, but I guess that's asking too much from the manufacturer!
I bought Levi's Jean since more than 20 years.  This is the first time that one of the belt girdle brake.  Wander if I bought a genuine Levi's product ???

review_title: Solid product I've bought all my life.
review_body: I wore 501s in my twenties, then Levis kind of went away for a while, or at least I couldn't find them easily.  A few years ago I saw them again and tried them on.  I took a bit of work to find the right style for my now middle-aged butt and legs, but the 550s fit perfectly and were available in multiple colors.  I wear shorts all summer, but when the colder weather sets in, I generally wear one of several pairs of 550s.  I think what I like best about them is 'historical consistency'.  At my age, I'm not searching for a new look--I like the look I have and it's nice to know I can simply order a pair on Amazon and that they look and fit like their supposed to.

review_title: I’ve worn 501’s all my life and I didn’t expect ...
review_body: I’ve worn 501’s all my life and I didn’t expect the 550’s to fit so much differently..way to big for me..also, I purchased 2 pair of 501’s thru Amazon a while back and both pair have ripped back pockets and crotch area.. they seem to be poorly made and as compared to previous purchases thru the years
Rated the fit as "somewhat large". Actually, it's "somewhat long". Bought it to replace the old one (same style), but it's about 1 inch longer (compared it to the old one). Need to hem it.

review_title: They are exactly the same jeans you'd get at the store, without needing to go to a store.
review_body: Saying that I love my new jeans is a bit silly, but they do fit just right, as long as I keep dry cleaning them.  Down side to cheap jeans, they seems to shrink 2 sizes smaller the first time you stick them into the dryer.  They are holding up well, no issues yet.
I like these shirts. Only 4 stars because I just got them, we will see how they hold up. So far so good. Could actually become my favorite new shirt.
Great workmanship and quality materials, I should've ordered the next size up to be able to wear it untucked and not look like a basketball with legs.

review_title: 230# - XL is a perfect fit. Typical Hanes high quality and comfort
review_body: 6'4", 230# - XL is a perfect fit. Typical Hanes high quality and comfort!
Not  Beefy as their short sleeve Beefy T's. Substantially lighter material.

review_title: Great Henley. Its a bit large but I can ...
review_body: Great Henley. Its a bit large but I can only assume its where the Beefy part of the name comes from. Very stylish and comfortable. Even in south Texas Humidity, its still pleasant to wear
Love the shirts!  Bought all the colors& love them all.  Size is perfect.  They are soft & cuddly chick magnets!  Will keep buying.

This is a really terrific shirt. When I ordered this I mistakenly assumed it was another version of a long sleeved T-shirt but the material is heavier than a typical T-shirt. This is a plus feature as far as I am concerned. It is an excellent weight. I plan to order more in other colors.
I like how this looks and feels.  I noticed some people said they had theirs delivered ripped but mine was good.  Not sure how it will hold up after a was but it should come out good.

review_title: returned for a 2x and it fit great!
review_body: I ordered a 3x with a 52" chest and it was too big, returned for a 2x and it fit great!

review_title: These shirts are amazing. I've bought three colors of the four offered ...
review_body: These shirts are amazing. I've bought three colors of the four offered and am in love with each one. Fits perfectly, the wrists have a good and snug feel and the shirts themselves have found a permanent spot in my shirt rotation. I've always had good luck with Hanes' shirts and they've definitely got me as a returning customer.

review_title: So Much Better Than Any Nike or Adidas Shirt
review_body: It's Under Armour's basic t-shirt, and I have bought every version of this for the past number of years.  I find it much more comfortable (for both working out and just walking around in) than anything by Nike or Adidas, and I've tried them all.  Highly recommend.
Never expected less from Under Armour. The quality of this shirt is the best! Not to loose not to tight, just a regular shirt that would be good to wear around the house, the gym, or going shopping.

review_title: Great product, still am a dedicated customer but your tech shirts come smaller than the previous years???
review_body: The product looks awesome & feels very good, except they come small fit. I have been buying loose U/A tech shirts in the past10 year's & no problems til now? Respectfully HJP
FIt's Tight.  I think it's suppose to be snug.  The shirt looks great.  Excellent Quality and love wearing it.

It's an orange UnderArmour shirt.  My nephew really liked it as a Christmas gift.  It fit as expected, was brand new and came well packaged.  There is no reason not to purchase this shirt if you are shopping for an UA tee.
Wear it under a work shirt and you will stay toasty warm. I Have to sneak this out of the bedroom to wash it. Hubby absolutely loves this shirt.

i think I will love the shirt, the material is great. BUT, those who say it is loose are way to accustomed to skinny jeans and all that stuff. this is in NO WAY LOOSE. I am an XL size and this is barely avoiding clinging to my body. it's not a rash guard or a body suit, it is a shirt. loose means it's loose. this is not loose. and the neck is too narrow but not uncomfortable.

review_title: A little boxy of a fit but a good shirt. It seems to be the shirt of ...
review_body: A little boxy of a fit but a good shirt. It seems to be the shirt of choice for everyone at the gym as two other people were in the gym wearing this same shirt.
My husband likes this T-Shirt "real well." It looks good on, is not at all restrictive and is just what he'd needed for the gym!

review_title: really good shirt, white logos looks dumb AF
review_body: not a bad shirt, but I'm looking for alternatives because I don't believe in wearing advertisements
Button broke in half first time trying the pants on.  Cheap quality.  Returning for a refund

review_title: Waist and Length are good. The pants are very wide though
review_body: Waist and Length are good. The pants are very wide though, and look like something i'd see my grandfather wearing. Id definitely stick with slim fit.

review_title: Nice quality, very loose in the legs.
review_body: These are very nice for the price in terms of quality. I just think the fit is a little loose, even for a classic fit. I'm happy overall, but a little slimmer fit would be better.
These were advertised as "slim fit" and are not.they are so wide in the cuff that I donated them.

review_title: They are 32x34 and fit great, but the material is a magnet for every ...
review_body: Bought these in black for my teenage son, for Winter Carnival dance. They are 32x34 and fit great, but the material is a magnet for every little bit of lint etc. I had to tape roll him waist to hem before he left the house. Would have given 5 stars if the lint issue had not been so bad.
The fabric is a little light, and I am not sure that it will be wrinkle resistant - at all. They fit more like they were 35" waist rather than 36".
I like the pants. Waist line fits snug.  I ordered 33 waist and seem to fit more between a 32 and 33, length is spot on.  Would order again, but one waist size up

The button is too easy to accidentally rip off. (Which ill admit may not soley be the pants, as I have several pants with accidentally ripped off buttons. It might be partly my button undoing technique but all im saying is on a scale of sturdy button that's easy to undo to flimsy button that's difficult to undo these pants definitelt lean toward flimsy button. Still 99% effective with a belt, though, so 5 stars.)
Overall quality is not quite up to the standard that I am comfortable wearing. Fair value.

review_title: you get what you pay for...nothing more.
review_body: solid chino pants...but thinner materials, does not hold a crease well, looks pretty worn after just a few washings.  You get what you pay for...but nothing more.

review_title: Fit like a glove my first try...
