review_body: Perfect fit...  First pair that I have ever ordered online and it fit like a glove.  I am ordering more pairs now.  If I go into a store, I end up trying on a thousand pairs, which I feared would be even worse online.  Not the case...  I did a bit of homework before hand and read the Q&A and some of the sane reviews.  Great experience and great pair of jeans.

I recently bought a pair of Levi 550 black jeans from off of Amazon and I liked them enough, but they were just tad tight in the thighs, so when I decided to buy a second pair of black jeans, I looked and chose the 559's.  After having worn these jeans a couple times now, I am completely sold and very impressed.  These jeans are one of the most comfortable pair of jeans I have worn in a long time.  They feel a little lighter weight than my other pairs of jeans, so I am thinking they might be even more comfortable in the summer time, even though they are black.  I give these jeans my highest recommendation and would definitely buy (and probably will buy) more of these 559's again in the future.

Comfortable fit throughout legs and butt area. Ordered these along with some of the 541 athletic fit Levi's. I like all of them and these 559 are loose but not baggy in the butt and thighs. They allow me to move easier without bunching or tightening. I have a bigger, athletic build and these are so much more comfortable than my regular fit jeans.

Great fit and the fact that they stretch a little really helps someone with large thighs that doesnt want to wear super baggy jeans.  They also dont hurt my spare tire.  if you are a thin person they tend to get loose the more you wear them without washing.

The only thing that was kind of odd was the fact that I previously ordered the "Cash" color in the same size and they were way more stretchy and flexible than the "Wellington".  After trying them on, I double checked the tags on the Wellington to make sure they were the 559 Relaxed Stretch Jean and according to the tags they are. Fit is good overall though and they are comfortable jeans.

review_title: I gave these jeans an 3 star review as they ...
review_body: I gave these jeans an 3 star review as they fit quite a bit baggier than the pair I purchased from the store. I purchased these as replacements as they were the same style and size. In addition to the sizing, I noticed these are quite a bit thinner than the pair purchased in the store.

review_title: We love the Covered Up wash
review_body: The only reason we knew these ones would fit is because we tried the wash on in store. All of the washes feel VERY different, and have drastically different measurements between countries of manufacture. We love the Covered Up wash, but I definitely wouldn't gamble on any of the other washes based on his experience with this one - it's just not standard enough. Levis need to either standardize their sizing or stop labelling completely different jeans under one 'model'

I've been wearing 559's for 10 years or more one of my last 2 pair has worn out after about 4 or five years, what I just spent $43 dollars is no longer a pair of jeans that I enjoy the fit and quality of, half as thick now as before (like women's pants not jeans) cut is different, constantly shifting around while working and moving, bought a pair of wrangler jeans  at Walmart twice as happy for half the price!

There are several cuts of jeans that Levi's offers and these seem to be the best fit for myself.  The material on the Blue Collar is a bit lighter weight than all the others and is very nice in hotter climates.  This is a big deal for me since I work in the heat sometimes in construction.  Since the material is lighter, it may not necessarily last as long as some of the others I have purchased, but overall I have over a year on one pair of these without a tear.  They wash well even if you accidentally put them on hot cycle.  Overall, very happy with the fit and quality of these jeans.

We ordered one pair of 559 Relaxed Straight Jeans in the wrong waist size, our fault, but we liked the jeans so much that we ordered more in correct size. “Tumbled Rigid” is the color we selected; it is a deep rich blue, a nice clean fresh crispy blue without looking like a navy blue and they jeans look great with either a sport jacket and leather lace-up shoes or a Polo or a just a t-shirt and Tennis and the fit is perfect! I think the top stitching on Levi’s is what sets them apart from Lee’s, which is also a nice jean for a great price.
Great fit, great, inexpensive hoodie. I just replaced another like it that my wife said made me look homeless. To be fair, I use it mainly at work and it was full of holes, etc.
Exactly what you want in a zippered hoodie!  It's soft, warm, and fits great!
I love this hoodie!

I bought these for my 10yr old granddaughter for school.  She's about 98lbs, and 5ft..  I tried the boys XXL first and it just fit so I went into the men's sizes and after washing it's a great fit...A little roomy but for the winter in Arizona, a sweater or sweatshirt underneat, and she's set!!

review_title: Comfortable, but beware of insanely inaccurate colors
review_body: It is comfortable and fits fine for the price.

review_title: Hanes ComfortBlend Full-Zip Hooded Sweatshirt, Deep Navy, XL
review_body: Sweat shirt not to size- certainly not an extra-large. Thin and not very warm at all; not what I would expect from this usually reliable brand. More like a thin summer weight sweatshirt for evenings. Color is nice, though. My husband can't wear it and not worth sending back- will donate to local food pantry store.

I'm a bigger girl, I ordered a 3x and half expected it to fit like a woman's 3x would because that seems to be my luck. It fit loose and it is almost too big on me. I am normally an XXL. So if you want something that feels like you borrowed your bfs sweater, this is it.

Love the rich color of the blue. Not too thin like some other reviews state. It's a basic hoodie just not super thick. Based on reviews I ordered a size up and it was waaaaay too big. In my opinion it fits true to size. Reordered in the proper size and it's still a little bigger in the arms and mid-section but makes it good to put over top a regular shirt vs just an undershirt or tee.

review_title: Can't yet comment on durability but fit is great and weight of material is perfect for someone who ...
review_body: Purchased as a gift. Can't yet comment on durability but fit is great and weight of material is perfect for someone who is normally warm but may need a cover up during the day in the California winter months. Fabric is soft to the touch and not at all stiff or scratchy.
Gotta love cozy hoodies. I have red, black and a powder blue. I wear them almost every day around the house in the winter and fall. Sizes are true and quality is Hanes; good.

These jeans were made with different measurements than the listing described. Any factory seconds should be clearly stated and measurements given of actual garment. Better off to go into a store to try these on.

review_title: Waist is good, but seem too long, but comfortable as all Levi’s should be
review_body: I’ve worn a 36 leg for the last 30 years and I know I’m not shrinking (I am 6’ 4”) so not understanding why these seem three inches too long.

review_title: So far so good. Fits well and looks good
review_body: So far so good. Fits well and looks good. I have ordered another pair for my other home. So, we will see what the other pair does. Many of the reviews were not good. I have no problem at this time.

The first time I wore these pants, one of the belt loops came off leaving a hole in the jeans. These haven't even been washed yet and now they are useless. Amazon's return policy says I'm screwed. I'm getting to where I won't be using Amazon to make purchases any more.

review_title: Terrible fit for relaxed fit jeans.. waste of money and time!
review_body: The fit of these jeans is not a relaxed fit. I was expecting a nice loose relaxed comfortable Jean and they are tight fit. You need to order 2 sizes bigger to get a better comfortable fit! I wanted to return them but I discarded the packaging and no return labels was included?

My husband loves Levi's 550.  He loves how they fit.  They work with his body type and he looks good in them.  That said, I purchased a pair and after trying them on he took them to the cabin.  OVER a month later, unfortunately, he told me that, OH, they are missing a belt loop...the one in front of one of the pockets.  I checked his other 550s...they all have that loop...so, his belt slips a little and I couldn't return them as irregulars because we had had them too long.  Just saying.  Jeans are great but if you wear a belt with your jeans as my hubby does, check them when you get them so you can return them if they are missing something.

review_title: Not at all  'Relaxed Fit' = Don't Fit!
review_body: Although the description on the Ad as well as the plastic packaging said 'Relaxed Fit', there is no such label actually sown onto the jean itself. This must be a packaging error!  The jeans received were too tight in the crotch, indicating that the length between the crotch to the waist is too short. Definitely not  a relaxed fit!

review_title: I have had these jeans for three months now and ...
review_body: I have had these jeans for three months now and the belt loops are coming loose.  I do not wear these jeans but once every two weeks.  This is spotty workmanship.  In the past my jeans would last a year or two.  I will not be buying these jeans again.

The label says 34W 32L, which is the size I've worn for years......yet these are about 1" tight in the waist and 2" long.  I've never had a pair NOT fit when I try them on in the stores so I thought I'd give Amazon a try.

I bought these jeans and after a month 2 of the beltloops Broke. Had them replaced and again the beltloops started to detach. I ended up buying fabric glue and iron on patches to reinforce the loops from completly coming off.  I've owned Levi's all my life and never had a problem with them until now. I'm not sure if the quality if Levi Jean's have gone down on the last year or what. Not happy with these at all. ENed up ordering some from Kohl's and they seem to be doing ok so far.

review_title: I bought it for brother, he likes oversized items ...
review_body: I bought it for brother, he likes oversized items  But not very large, it is somewhat large for him, i was afraid. he said he will not wear smaller.
great shirt, good price, fast shipping.  great after washed.
Good price and fit.  Looks much nicer than a plain long sleeve T-shirt.
Great shirt. To prevent fading wash in cold water.
I'm wearing this shirt as I type this. It's very comfortable, and it's more stylish than wearing just a long-sleeve t-shirt.
Good thick material. Good sizing. I purchased three different colors and everything fits well.
I ordered a medium shirt turns out to be somewhat large. Looks more like a large size shirt.

Very comfortable and soft.  And NO WRINKLES!!  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!  As a matter of fact. I just ordered another! Great stitching with none of the typical threads coming apart on shirts in this price range!  Very soft to the touch and actually look forward to wearing the shirt!!!  I'd give 6 stars if I could!
I I love my shirts I mean well made high quality material soft and comfortable sometimes I'm wearing to work sometimes I sleep in them
Perfect weight for winter in the south. Good quality.
The best workouts shirts. I have been wearing them for years. They wick sweat and don’t get all heavy and soaked with sweat like cotton.

I am new to these shirts and styles so i can really tell you a lot about them, i like this one, it is tight but is suppose to be tight. I consider it as a light compression shirt (very light) unless you down size your self i would guess. Its a good buy all around if you like a shirt that is light and is a tight fit, also it is cool feeling so in the summer an while you workout this will help a lot!
These are the best workout shirts I have come across.
Did not like these. I dislike shirts with huge neck cutouts. These fall in that category

review_title: I just got the shirt and I noticed that some ...
review_body: I just got the shirt and I noticed that some of the stitching on the right arm is messed up and starting to come out. Kinda makes me think that the stitching on that arm will completely come out....

review_title: A little baggy in the waist area, but a great tee
review_body: Feels a little baggy compared to my Asics I bough together with this tee. Overall I am satisfied with the quality. I just wish it was a little slimmer in the waist area.
My husband LOVES this shirt - he asked me to buy more. The large fit him perfectly at 6'1" and around 190 pounds, muscular arms and chest.

This are great for my workout. Ordered the second one. I would recommend to buy a size smaller since these run a little loose near belly. But i have one with size L and one with M. I love both of them. I have chest 41.

I bought my husband two of these for Christmas. He prefers shirts with the sleeve seams like a "baseball tee" because it fits more comfortably on his shoulders. He was very happy with these tees, they fit true to size.
Nice but when the reviews said the sizes run large; they weren't lying. It's comfortable but a little loose!
baggy. ugh. returned.  junk

review_title: Good pants love they have every size and the quality is great.
review_body: Perfect pants.. Only thing I think i would change is for them some stretch. Im a 36 most pants these fit just little challenging to get buttoned. But thats because Im fat.. Probably will order a 38 next time but didn't want them to baggy.

I purchased the silver pair and the picture looked white but the pants are actually Stone color. I'm not sure if they accidentally sent me the Stone colored paints or they are color blind but clearly not Silver. The pants do fit well and a good value.
First Time buying Pants online and I will say Im very pleased with this Brand and purchase. Fit was as excepted and I plan on buying more in the future. No Complaints on this purchase.
After 2 washings, the grey color became uneven and blotchy in places.  The quality wasn't up to what I expected.
Pants are ok. Fabric feels cheap and collects lint like a magnet. I had much higher hopes for these.
too tight
Look like gently used pair. No tags and some friction marks tell tail sign.

review_title: Very comfortable, nice looking and good price.
review_body: Very comfortable, nice looking and good price. Love that they're thin enough for summer wear, but not so thin you can't wear during the Fall/Winter.

review_title: My husband asked what other colors they had
review_body: Getting my husband to buy clothes is almost impossible but I figured $20 was worth a gamble and ordered him a pair online. He likes them, I like the price, and the man will have some grown up pants.

I bought these as a gift for my bf and we are NOT happy with the changes Levis made to the jean overall. The cut is way slimmer - look Levis not everyone wants to wear skinny jeans. The hip, seat and crotch area were tight. The fabric is very thin and light - not as thick as jeans usually are. A slightly loose and comfortable fit that used to be the original 559 is GONE.

Not to scare off any guys; but I gotta tell you gals (esp larger sizes) these men's jeans ROCK.  They look so good on hubby I had to try a pair.  Men are SO LUCKY with size options and not suffering (as much) from "trends".  Women's jeans are so full of spandex, they're not even really denim anymore.  These are that good THICK stuff that holds you in at all the right places, but then actually hangs from the thigh down  (I mean seriously, do we want to emphasize that our KNEES are skinnier than hips).  Granted, guys have no "curve" between hips and waist so there's a gap, but belt, sewing machine, or tailor makes quick work of that.  The "Tumbled Rigid" is a perfect all occasion color.

review_title: Great jeans, great price, great service
review_body: I've made the mistake of buying clothes online and learned that I should probably stick to buying clothes in the store, except for these...

Really love these jeans!  I've been wearing jeans forever and have had many kinds of different styles until I came upon the 559 Relaxed Straight Jeans.  These fit well, look great and have just a bit of stretch to them which makes them all that much more comfortable.  I've already ordered several pairs in different colors, great Jeans!

review_title: Ok, but thinner material than other Levi jeans I have owned.
review_body: I had a pair of Levi 559 Jeans that I bought about two years ago.  I bought them at Kohls.  I liked them enough to order another pair through Amazon.  The color is darker than my original pair but other than that they are the same style.  My main complaint is that the material on the recently ordered jeans are thinner than on the ones I bought earlier.  Don't know if it is due to being made in a different country as seems Levi has manufacturing plants in several foreign countrys or if they are a different material due to different color.  Time will tell as to how they actually wear but don't feel as sturdy as my first pair.

review_title: Just like department store, but much less $
review_body: I already had a pair of these 559 jean that I bought in a department store about a year ago. I paid 60% in the department store for the exact same jeans. Since I already owned these jeans, I knew what I should be getting, and I'm not disappointed. These are exactly like the ones I bought in the store. Please know these do sit low on the waist, so if you're looking for a high waist, these are not your jeans.

I purchased these jeans for my son.  I had originally purchased a different fit that he did not like, so I sent those back and ordered this pair.  These are nice looking jeans that fit well and are relaxed fit.  The fit is not too tight and not too loose (cannot stand to see that on men), and the color is perfect, a modern dark color with the light wore look.  We were definitely happy with this purchase and product.

Ok, Levis 559's are my favorite jeans but you might wanna try these on at Macy's or Kohl's first. Indie Blue (color code 4258) is made in two different countries, Bangladesh and Vietnam. The Vietnam version is darker and the material is thinner than the Bangladesh version. I'm about 5'8 155 and wear a 31x30. The Vietnam version fits me well while the Bangladesh version is large in the waist and has a slightly longer inseam. I need a 30x30 in the Bangladesh Indie Blue. Anyway, these jeans are relaxed but not baggy. The 18 inch leg opening is what I like because it covers the top of my shoes just right. I've been wearing these pretty frequently for over a year and despite the thin fabric, they have held up well. I would recommend trying these on at store before purchasing though.

Levi's have been American as apple pie but, that has changed. They are much lighter fabric and do not stand up to cleaning. I can now under stand why it is going around not to wash them. I wear mine for comfort and do not submit them to hard work. On the second wash, a hole for no reason developed in the leg of the paints. After the  third wash, a belt loop has half come off. What a waste of money. I spend half the money at a warehouse center on their jeans and get my moneys worth. Levi’s your not for me any longer it’s a shame because you fit so well.

Pants did not fit as stated. They were plenty baggy around the calves, but skin tight on my thighs, even though the fit is looser than what I usually wear, 541's. I am starting to dislike Levis. They tend to be cheap and the fit varies or is unlike what the fit descriptions states. I'll never buy 559's again.
The perfect lightweight hoodie!!  I've ordered several of these for several people, and they all rave about them.  They're very thin, which is great for when you just need a little bit more warmth.

review_title: but the length was good. after about a week I decided to wash ...
review_body: when it came it fit a tad bit baggy, but the length was good.

I was looking for a mid-weight zip-front hoodie to block drafts and keep me comfy during chemotherapy.  This thing is going to be awesome.  It works over a wide range of temperatures.  Just provides the right level of warmth.  The color is very vibrant.  Since this is a poly-cotton blend, I don't expect the color to fade.  I think the bright color might help keep my attitude "up".  I really like this product and may get a second one in a different color soon.

I buy these goodies for the gym, so I'm not expecting "high fashion" or anything. They do the job, aren't too heavy, and help me sweat when I need to. The only issue is, they're not REALLY for tall individuals. Sleeves and length both run a tad too short. Not everyone who needs a 2XL wears it for room around the middle....
I really like this top. It is a little bulkier than I'm used to, but it will work when its just a bit cooler out. I plan to buy another color soon.
Excellent quality and nice thickness if you are looking for something more substantial.  These do run at least 1 size large and unfortunately I had to return it.

review_title: and the body of the jacket is a good length too
review_body: I'm 5'5", bought a size small and it fits me perfectly! I have wide hips, but the snugness at the bottom doesn't bother me. The arms aren't too long, and the body of the jacket is a good length too.

I’m a female who bought this sweater because it was cheaper than the exact same female one. (Up yours pink tax!) Fits like a boyfriends sweater so it’s allll good. Very soft on the inside and stitched well.

Fits well, however, after the first washing, the strings to the hood became unraveled and this makes the jacket look "old", in my opinion.  The material also did not was well, there was some pilling after first wash.  I would not buy this jacket again.

review_title: i got a large because i love oversized hoodies and its pretty big on me
review_body: i got a large because i love oversized hoodies and its pretty big on me, i'm 5'7 and 164lb . Its soft and comfy and great in all kinds of weather. It doesn't pill if i love these hoodies

I've owned may pairs of these jeans purchased through normal outlet stores in the local area.  I decided to purchase on Amazon and was unfortunately disappointed!!  I ordered 3 pairs of Jeans and over the past few months, both pairs developed a rip at the crotch.  I know, you're thinking these jeans don't fit right, but not the case.  I've been wearing these jeans for years with no problems until I purchased online.  I tried to return/exchange these jeans but their return policy is truly JUNK.  Warning, DO NOT PURCHASE, you/re better off at the local store for a little more $$.

review_title: The price was as good or better than what I could get in the ...
review_body: It's been a long time since I could find size 35 waist jeans but Amazon had them in stock. The price was as good or better than what I could get in the local stores and I didn't have to buy multiple pairs or get store credit to get the deal. The jeans arrived promptly, fit fine and had perfect quality.

review_title: I know that some like to wear these without a belt but I like ...
review_body: what's with the belt loops?  I know that some like to wear these without a belt but I like the "neat" look. There are not enough belt loops to properly secure the end of my belt. One more loop just beyond the zipper would allow for the neat storage of belts. love the heft and weight of the material. Quality material.  Just those darn lack of enough loops, screws up a quality pair of jeans!

I have an exact same pair of 32x30 550 jeans I bought at a store.  Those older ones fit just fine.  These new ones are painfully tight.  Looking through the reviews, I see the same thing.  It seems best to order a waist at least 1 inch higher than what you are used to.  As it stands I can't use these jeans.

review_title: Levi's Men's 550 Relaxed Fit Jean, Black, 34x32
review_body: I purchase alll my husband's clothing and I have a keen eye for quality.  I purchased the stone washed jeans and the black ones, just for a change, and promptly returned them for the reliable black version.  The other color did not compare in texture to the black 550's. I don't understand the reason, but they are thicker by far.  i wash them inside out and the color stays true much longer than it takes to see visible wear and tear on the jeans. I purchased these not too long ago at a high end department store and they were exactly alike.  I also got them for far less than the department store jeans.  Buy them!

review_title: Ordered and received what I wanted
review_body: First, I am very satisfied with the product. Yes they are Levis, they are blue and they are well stitched. So a five star rating. But I have to note a couple of things. I bought about 5 pairs of these, all the same size and style. But they don't all seem to be made with the same material. The colors are all just about the same, but they seem to have been made with slightly different material. Also, the belt loops are not always in the exact same places from one pair to the next. I still gave them 5 stars, because even though each pair seems to be slightly different, they all have the same quality.

review_title: Thank You For Sending Me a Broken and Returned Item... I Enjoy Wasting My Time Returning Amazon's Mistakes...
review_body: This item was obviously returned, as it had no zipper metal tab, and no labels, stickers or tags.

review_title: After buying Levis jeans for over fifty years, I ...
review_body: After buying Levis jeans for over fifty years, I have never had the metal top button snap off before, especially when putting them on for the first time. I'm certain that this is an anomaly and will try again.

review_title: Deceptive Marketing Buy It Again misleading
review_body: I was very disappointed to discover that I only received ONE pair of jeans. I had made a previous order of TWO pairs of Levi's Men's 550 Relaxed Fit Jeans for $42.99 on January 7, 2016 and I clicked on the "Buy It Again" button. I was unaware that I was only receiving ONE pair for the same price. I feel that this is somewhat deceptive. I thought that "Buy It Again" meant exactly that so I had expected TWO pairs of jeans for the same price.

review_title: These Levi's jeans are much lower quality and less rugged ...
review_body: These Levi's jeans are much lower quality and less rugged than in the past.  Previous pairs of these jeans would last 1-2 years in a work environment.  The last set wore through in several places in less than 6 months.  Stitching is less secure and long threads were left dangling in seams.  No longer worth a premium price.
Good shirt, my son likes it.  It fits well and is comfortable.  I have washed it many times and it still looks great.
Very nice shirt will order more the sleeves fits my long arms permit enough body room to let air in
Love there shirts! Quality is great for the cost. Handle hard work and repeated wash very well.

review_title: A little big, but its to be expected
review_body: Its a little big, but its a Beefy T. So I know what I was getting into. Its a bit darker then the photo, but I expect it to fade nicely.
Great shirt for the price even better.

review_title: They feel good, but a little snug
review_body: They feel good, but a little snug. Said it fit a 50 inch chest. I am a 48 inch chest and this is like I'm trying to not breath deep cause I don't want to stretch it out.
fits as expected

review_title: 6' tall, 165 lbs, medium is slightly small, shoulda got large, especially if it shrinks in the wash.
review_body: Pretty good for the price, bought medium, I'm 6 feet 0" tall, 165 lbs. Arms the right length, fits slightly snug compared to my normal bulky shirts. It's a bit smaller than I expected actually. But length is good. Would not be good if you have much of a belly, if so the large or xL is for you.

Bought for husband. It's really tight. He says they're making them for the small people in the orient not in the west.  He may be right.  Gave it 4 stars because otherwise it's a great shirt - just order a size larger.
Fits as expected, soft material, great color... wash and dry, holds up well and minimum shrinkage if any. Bought same shirt twice..like it that much.

These t shirts have to be the best ones I have ever owned.  I'm a larger guy, so wicking is very important.  I wear these under my button down shirts to work each day, and they under Armour keeps me dry all day.  The 4xl size fits great for me, and they last in the wash too.  Ordering more.
My husband’s favorite brand. True to size, true to color. Washes and wears well!

The dark maroon does not look like the color shown.  Also, this polyester shirt looks and feels more like cotton. I prefer the silky polyester shirts from Under Armour.  The Under Armour shirt says 100% polyester.

After using Under Armour gear on the golf course, I decided to try out their gym gear. Excellent, as expected. These HeatGear performance tees are light, comfortable (the raglan sleeves are great) and the material wicks moisture so quickly that within minutes of my workout cool-down, they are dry again and have no odour too...quite amazing!

review_title: Great, perfect for summer, silk-like feeling on the skin
review_body: Perfect, this shirt is amazing. It is exactly what you need when you run. It is very comfy, and it is not bothering the skin. It feels like silk. Also, it is thin but not too much. The skin can't be seen even if a supernova is lightening your way during a run. I would say that this is particularly perfect for summertime.

review_title: Inconsistent Sizing, may be a qc issue...
review_body: Bought the same exact shirt in Gold, also with Under Armour as the seller, and it fit good. So I bought this on Navy and it is much smaller even though it says same 3xl size ???

review_title: Don't buy this product with out trying it on.
review_body: My mistake was ordering this product and taking the sellers word that their sizes are universal, but when I ordered a Large, I
I would have liked something a little more form-fitting, but this was good.
Terrible quality. One of the sleeve was not sew correctly and half of it already came undone. I only had this shirt for a month

review_title: Under Armor quality and price - very good.
review_body: Typical Under Armor quality - love it. Own a bunch of these and I've never had an issue with them. Fits as expected and the price was good compared to other retailers. The fit and feel is what you would come to expect from Under Armor.
Size fit as expected. Seems durable and strong enough for the daily use.
My husband has a very hard time finding pants that are 42/29.  Although these took quite a few months to arrive, he is very happy with the size, style and fit.
I like the fit of these Amazon slacks and for the price they can't be beat especially if you need a length thats not normally carried by stores.

review_title: Nice pants! They hold up really well after washing ...
review_body: Nice pants!  They hold up really well after washing and really don't shrink.  I have two pairs now and will probably order more!!!
A really nice fit and a really good price

review_title: Good pants for price, dark colors attract lint like crazy.
review_body: The fit is nice and fabric seems of reasonable quality for the price.  I bought the Khaki and the black.  Khaki looks good and wears well.  Frankly, I would stay away from black and navy because the fabric is a literal lint magnet.  Maybe this will stop after more washings, but lint sticks to fabric like glue, even right out of the dryer. Even a lint brush has minimal effect on removing the lint and dog fur that gets stuck to them.
Great price and fit. Will definitely purchase again. Only downside is the wrinkle resistance. I hang up right out of the dryer and they still need a little touch up. Other than that A+ product.

Purchased these for just a casual pant.  Were a cotton poly blend as I expected.  Not to much you can mess up here.  The fit was accurate, the only thing I will say is make sure you know your actual size, not just the size you think you wear.  I previously worked in the men's clothing industry as a buyer, and sales person for suits and the like.  The waist size is accurate for what you would be measured.  The rise is a graduated rise, so us shorter men the 30" inseam will have about an 1" shorter rise which eliminates the bagginess that I have come to expect in casual pants.  These fit great and actually fit all the way around.  For $20 a pair I am quite impressed.  Will defiantly purchase again.  I ordered two pair to start navy, and taupe and both colors were what I expected.  I avoided the "washed black" simply because black never seems to hold its color in a cotton garment.  You can order these with confidence.

review_title: Perfect! I love being able to order pants that ...
review_body: Perfect!  I love being able to order pants that is exactly the right length!  They look good and feel good.  A definite thumbs up!

review_title: ... about the quality given the price but I really like the fit and durability
review_body: I was unsure about the quality given the price but I really like the fit and durability. I had to send the first pair back because they were a little tight, but I think that is an aging issue and not the pants. The return and reorder was very easy with amazon wardrobe.
if you get the right color they seem to always come from the same country and fit as advertised, just don't stray or you will get some stretchy jeans from Katmandu or something,  thanks

I really liked these when I first purchased them. Unfortunately, they have shrunk almost two and half inches since Feb! Incredible! Now the return window has expired and I have jeans that are too short and I'm too embarrassed to wear. I bought three pairs in different colors at W34 L32 and their new length is just over 29 inches.

I've bought three different colors of the 559 series now, and this last one (color Levine) surprised me because it contains a few percent of spandex or something stretchy.  Not a bad thing, just unexpected, since the other two appeared to be straight cotton as usual (I can't find a % content label on any of the pairs - WTF ?)  The stretchiness is mainly noticeable in the front pockets, where it's a plus because it helps getting stuff in/out of the pocket.  This pair was made in Pakistan, while the Midnight Oil color was made in Cambodia.  BTW the all-cotton ones both fit larger than expected, i.e. they were 32 waist but felt more like 33.  That's why I tried a 31 with this pair - just about right.

review_title: Jeans ripped after a month of wearing.
review_body: The jeans seemed extremely thin, which I believe lead to them ripping. The jeans ripped as I tied my shoe, lucky for me I had not left the house yet. The most active thing I have done in the past two months was sit at a computer. I don't believe this was something that should cause a failure in the material.

review_title: Too long, to large in waist. Levi's are ...
review_body: Too long, to large in waist. Levi's are made in several countries, which seem to be tied to the color. Unfortunately this results in  jeans that you have no idea how they'll fit. Some seem to be right on, while others are nowhere near the same (even if they are both 559). Consistently inconsistent.

I have a pair of Levi's 559 so I assumed if I ordered the exact same pair of the exact same size that they would fit, I was wrong. These are just a bit too small. They are tighter in the waist than my old pair of the same style/size and more than any amount of "breaking in" can correct for. My old pair tore in the knees after several years. And what is worse is that I bought these right before breaking my leg (I've been stuck at home) and didn't realize that they have a shorter return period than other Amazon items and now I'm stuck with them.

I'm a pretty big guy (6'6'' & 280lbs.) and have stuggled lately trying to find any jeans in stores that fit properly. Everything is all skinny jeans and boot cut which are too tight in the thighs for me. I ordered the 559s and they fit pretty well. My normal jean size is 38 x 34, which is what I ordered. They seem a little long but I'm guessing it is just normal variance in the product. Only reason i gave 4 star instead of 5 is the jeans are pretty thin and I'm not sure how they will hold up. But i knew this going in to the purchase as Levis have been trending that way for quite a while.

review_title: do not fit like the 559 jeans.
review_body: not too bad to send back, but really snug fit.  my jeans that i never have to try on are 559 levi's...they always fit me perfectly...thats why i didnt hesitate to order these...but they do not fit like the jeans...color and fabric are great, if they would just be the same 'cut' as the jeans.
Didn't know these jeans had stretch in waist. What a pleasant surprise. Very comfortable. Ordering a different color now!

review_title: My husband wears these pants to his business casual office ...
review_body: My husband wears these pants to his business casual office job. He loves the quality and fit, these jeans are not "stretchy" we ordered others that didn't specify that and had to return them, but these are all cotton - no stretch. The color is a deep dark blue jean color.

review_title: Good solid middle of the road hoodie
review_body: Good solid middle of the road hoodie, exactly what you would expect. Not super heavy but still good quality, perfect for autumn and spring nights.

I'm a medium but I buy large hoodies just to have the extra room for comfort. I bought a large in this and it's barely larger than a medium. Only one star off for that. It is extremely comfortable and warm for being a sheet of fleece. I like it a lot!

review_title: My husband likes this jacket. The sleeve/wrist holes fit ...
review_body: My husband likes this jacket.  The sleeve/wrist holes fit tighter around his wrists that other jackets he has looked at and they are just what he was wanting!!

review_title: Not quite right but not too bad
review_body: I expected this to fit rather large because I like my hoodies with a little extra room, but that was not the case. It's not too small, it fits, but not like I had hoped. It feels just a bit too short, also.
This is good quality for the price and the color is pretty true to the picture for the blue.  We got two of these for a show and both were good.

review_title: Not the best, but no complaints
review_body: I got this for lile 10 bucks, I got the dark green color cuz it matches his eyes. Just a regular sweater, decent quality. No complaints! He likes it, he's a simple kind of guy...

This is a good, but not great hooded sweatshirt.  It has a nice feature in that the hood string is stitched into place at the top center of the hood, so it will not ever pull out, otherwise it is pretty much just a mid-weight sweatshirt.

review_title: I like it. Good experience working with the seller
review_body: I ordered a size up just to be sure. It's quite bulky. I like it. Good experience working with the seller.

Not bad cheap hoodies. I bought two for work and use them everyday almost. I bought large and it was a bit smaller than expected but not tight or unwearable. I'll buy more but will order XL and recommend others ordering a size up unless your looking for a slim fit.

review_title: Its a 5 because its good quality especially for how inexpensive it is
review_body: Fits just a little snug for a XL, if you're between sizes order the next one up.  Its not too thick which is what I wanted to wear under another jacket when its really cold.  Its a 5 because its good quality especially for how inexpensive it is.

review_title: I was paying $65.00 for these at the department store!
review_body: These are the real thing. Perfect, fresh and exactly what you expect from Levis. I know my sizes exactly, so when I bought these jeans I already had two happily worn out examples in my closet to compare them to. The fit and finish is exact. And the price is AWESOME! Highly recommend this seller. I originally purchased a too small size, and they sent the replacements ahead of my return and I had them in no time. They picked up my previous pair and that was that!

We checked the tags that were on my husband's current pair of jeans and ordered an identical pair of jeans.  The jeans that arrived were not made of real traditional jean material, but rather something that appeared and felt inferior.  They also had dyed-in crease lines in the crotch/upper leg area which were not attractive.  Perhaps these were meant to be Levi's with a "designer" twist but they were not what we had expected so we returned them.

Levi Strauss would be ashamed at the quality of the new Levi's. I have worn them for 55 years and will never purchase a pair again. The previous pair were purchased a year ago and the belt loops had to be reinforced within 2-3 months. The last pair purchased a month ago developed holes on both back pockets upper stitching. I returned them for replacement but doubt the new ones will be any better.
Pros:. Color and styling.

review_title: where as the Rinse fit fine. I've already washed these so what am I ...
review_body: This is abnormally small. I bought these Dark Stone Washed and also a pair of the Rinse both labeled the same size Levi's 550 Relaxed fit but I couldn't even get these Dark Stone Washed Jeans on, where as the Rinse fit fine. I've already washed these so what am I going to do with them?

6 months and these jeans have fallen apart the zipper broke the belt loops have torn and the pockets have ripped at the seams.  Not up to Levis standards.  After a lifetime of wearing Levis I'm switching to Wranglers.

I purchased three pairs of these jeans in a size 36 x 32 at the beginning of October. They were delivered in the same box in the same packaging. I pulled out the top pair and tried them on and they fit perfectly so I took the tags off all three pair and tossed them in the wash to soften them up. It turns out the one pair I tried on is the only one true to size, the other two were at least an inch smaller in the waist. Shame on Levi's for slacking up on their quality control, I have worn the same size for decades and used to be able to just pick them up off the shelf and count on a perfect fit. I should have sent the other two pair back despite having washed them and thrown away the tags.....my one pair of Levis for more than a hundred bucks doesn't look like such a great deal.

review_title: Okay but a bit puffy in the hips and wear out too fast.
review_body: Overall okay, but this style gives the illusion that you have bigger hips than you really do.  What man wants that?  Plus, they wear out faster than expected (especially on the upper inside corners of the back pockets); Wrangler jeans last at least twice as long.

It would be great if Levis can sell a 32 inch waist and 31 inch length jeans. But I get either a 30 inch or 32 inch length in the 32 inch waist category. So I order a 30 inch length variant. Just to make sure that the trousers don't go up too high, I just wear it a tad bit below my belly button level and there are no regrets. This should not be a showstopper for me. I have tried around 5 to 6 different types of jeans brands till date and I like the relaxed fit model of Levis the best. It's not because I am a Levis fan or so. Just that their models are very comfortable and fit my anatomy. If given a chance to select jeans other than Levis then I'd prefer getting one stitched in India by buying the cloth. Yes you got it right. In India we still have tailors and there are many who really do their job very well. But when it comes to an affordable model that's ready made then I'll not look for any other brand.

Have this same exact pair of jeans but they do not fit the same. Idk why but they are much baggier than the same relaxed pair that I have. Was displeased. I washed them in hot water and dried them to get them to shrink and still much bigger than my other pair. Nice jeans though.

The Hanes Beefy Tshirt is a great bargain. It fits my 230 pound body perfectly with nice long sleeves and is a long shirt that stays tucked in for the long haul. For around $10 you will not find a better quality shirt. Thank you Hanes!!
Very nice, comfortable shirt for the cool weather coming.
My husband loves these shirts & so do I. They wash up nice & look good on him. Highly recommend them.

I LOVE these things!  Cheap. They don't shrink. 3X fits like a 2X so there's that. They are bulky so they are warm. 100% Cotton so it's good for the environment! I got Navy. I'm thinking  about getting more colors.  These are now a part of my 3-Shirt System. A short sleeve Fresh IQ tee, one of these and a long sleeve dress shirt. I'm now packing an insulated vest just because. One caveat: since they are cotton they take a long time to dry. When they are wet there is zero insulation from cold. Take an umbrella always.....
I got one of these and liked it so much I ordered another one.  They wear well and are nice to the touch. Well satisfied.

review_title: It fits him perfectly and I'm pretty sure it's his new favorite
review_body: Ordered this for my fiance for Christmas. He loves the different material this is made from over the Gildan plain long sleeves. It fits him perfectly and I'm pretty sure it's his new favorite.
Too small..order a size bigger...and material is light and stretchy not heavy duty....gave it to my sister rather than return it

review_title: I don't know about the "beefy" description,
review_body: I don't know about the "beefy" description, doesn't seem any thicker to me than a regular cotton t-shirt with long sleeves

review_title: Great quality! will be buying more
review_body: I just switched back to men's L from XL. With that said, this shirt seems closer to an XL ( I obviously bought a L)  although I was concerned that it would be on the tight side, which it isn't ! Great quality! will be buying more!

review_title: Quality is way off. Buy one at your local ...
review_body: Quality is way off. Buy one at your local Walmart. Seams and buttons do not match up. Fades as soon as you wash it. WILL NOT buy again.

review_title: 5'11 215 lbs with an athletic build and XL fits like a
review_body: These shirts are my go to, 5'11 215 lbs with an athletic build and XL fits like a charm

I feel like their products have changed material, seems inferior to what they used to make it with. I still have one from years back and its still thick and not worn out, this one is already wearing out and getting smaller with only a few months use
Love under armour products and this was no exception.  Price was pretty good as I saved about $6.00 off the price of what I would have paid in a store or on UA website.

review_title: Great for working out but beware when washing
review_body: I love Under Armour apparel but beware the Tech line is sensitive. I have a front load washing machine and if I don't wash the shirts (and the Tech line shorts) in delicate laundry wash bags they will shred after a few washes
This tech shirt is not like the  excellent other Under Armour T-shirts  I've bought. It was a big baggy thing with crappy fabric.

review_title: Perfect Fit, doesn’t fade and never shrinks!! A+
review_body: He loves this shirt! I bought him a few under armor shirts and each one fit perfectly and none of them have shrank or faded in color! I will be purchasing him more of them soon!

xcellent product. Shop fulfilled with the delivery and arrived on time. the texture and material of the product is of high quality. I am satisfied with the product. I recommend the seller and the products they sell.
good warm good service and very fast all thank you very much for everything
Good quality, color and stitching. I'm 6ft tall and have a 44" chest, the xxl fit very well. Would recommend.
Very comfortable, looks great, and love the wicking fabric.  Pretty much the only t;s I buy now.
Awesome! I bought these for my husband who is 5’5”. We always have a hard time finding pants that fit, but the length options worked great!
These are just ok. They are not the most comfortable pants but they are also inexpensive. I would not wear them as daily pants.

review_title: look great, unbelievable price and only needed touch up ironing
review_body: look great, unbelievable price and only needed touch up ironing.  I can't rate them a 5 until I see how they wash and wear a few times.  I hope they are a 'SIX'

review_title: Good fit for a good price
review_body: I like the pants. They fit well and seem to be a good material. I would purchase again if they had more colors. Great Price.
Pretty much unusable do to the way they attract dust.  Unfortunately I’ve had them hemmed so I doubt I can return them.

review_title: Material is nice, however the measurements are way off compared to ...
review_body: Will be returning. Material is nice, however the measurements are way off compared to other brands. Waist measurement was fine, but the pants were way longer than other pants of the same size. Also, the pants are very baggy and don’t look very great because of that in my opinion.

review_title: These are pretty good pants sold by amazon
review_body: These are pretty good pants sold by amazon! The size were pretty spot on for me and i might have to buy a few more in different colors.

review_title: Ordered size 31 from this and 2 other brands. ...
review_body: Ordered size 31 from this and 2 other brands. The sizing on the Amazon Essentials was tighter than the other 2 brands. Will not order these again.

Inexpensive, and looks inexpensive. Good for the price, but the fabric attracts lint like a magnet, it is not really black but dark grey even though it is marketed as black. Probably would not buy more of these.
Junk...junk...junk.

review_title: ... 559 levis jeans and the material is of a better quality almost like a pair of 501 jeans
review_body: i have an old pair of 559 levis jeans and the material is of a better quality almost like a pair of 501 jeans, thick. This new pair is thinner like they went with a cheep material to make the jeans . still feels and fits well but noticeably of an inferior quality . i would still buy but why the change to a lower quality for the same high price. its not only this vendor but at the levis store in the mall too so it must be a company wide division to increase profit .

review_title: There are great pair jeans they just came a little bigger on ...
review_body: There are great pair jeans they just came a little bigger on the crotch and the butt area almost giving a extra loose appearance. Would it be better for someone that has a fuller body large legs full butt .

review_title: I know garment people who can do this correctly so they look like they came from the manufacturer
review_body: Fit well, the stretch helped, had to order 32" length because there is not a single manufacturer left in the world that makes 31" length, which is what I need.  So I will pay someone to hem.  I'm lucky, I know garment people who can do this correctly so they look like they came from the manufacturer.

I used to be a 550 guy but my wife would always call me "baggy pants" when I wore them. Still, I needed the relaxed fit so I took the ribbing. Now, Levi's has given me the ultimate solution--the 559. For guys with my build, these make me look stylish yet allow me to be as comfortable as I was in my old 550s. I look a lot better in jeans, and I don't get any snide remarks from the wife. Win-Win. Plus, they seem to be built with the same (or maybe) better quality as the 550s. I don't know how well they will hold up over the long haul, but I have bought these in several colors so I expect to have these in the rotation for a good while.

WOW,  I have never been this disappointed in Levis jeans.  I have been wearing this brand as my preferred work jeans for about the last 10 years or so.  I have always went down to my local Sears shop and purchased new ones when my old ones wore out.  Never had to try them on.  Always great fit and great material.

I have ordered two pair in the last month. Both times, the jeans are at least 2" longer than the label states. I compared them to other 559's that I own and the length difference is apparent. Unacceptable.

I was skeptical about the flex fit after wearing nothing but 501 Levi's for the past few years.  These don't feel like they bind up at the knee like my other jeans.  They feel much more breathable too.

review_title: Perfect in legs, tight in booty
review_body: I have a pretty stout lower body situation going on, and had tried the 541 Athletic Fit on in a store. I liked the room it gave in the butt/thigh area, but was hoping for more room in the calves as well. I was hoping based on the description that these jeans would be like those except with looser calf area. Sadly, they are still very tight in the buttal area. I guess if you have zero butt but big calves, these are the jeans for you.

I've been wearing Levi's 559 jeans for about 5 years now.  I like the fit on them; not too tight, not too baggy, and slightly lower waist height, but not enough where it falls off.  My recent purchase was the "range" color and these seem to be a slightly thicker material than the "indie blue" which I purchased last time.  I prefer the thicker material because it's a bit warmer and feels like it would last longer.

Others think these may be knock-offs.  In my opinion, the quality is consistent with what I've purchased in the past directly from levi.com.  That said, the sizing definitely varies between the color options.  I purchased one that is a full 2" different than another, and both fit nearly the same.  Overall, however, I'm satisfied.
Great qualitysweatshirt, looks just like any other sweatshirt. This does not have a boxy fit thankfully.

Absolutely gorgeous. Everyone compliments when I wear. I like the short length similar to a choker. If you like a natural look like stone pieces you will love. It goes especially well with brown and greens. I want to order more now. I ordered the one with mostly browns.
Comfortable and lightweight. Always soft.  Turned it into a stuffy the dragon costume for Halloween.
great hoodie. great price. Have one for my son that is over a year old and still is red. Still soft and cozy.

I really like the jacket itself, but I wanted one a bit bigger than me so I decided to buy a men’s jacket instead of women. I have the skinniest arms ever, and even though I bought a small (and haven’t washed it yet), I have a hard time putting my arms through. I can’t even close it comfortably around my stomach. Definitely SIZE UP!
After looking around Dick’s Sporting Goods, and finding hoodies from $50 to $90, I decided to look to Amazon for a basic full zip, hooded sweatshirt. This one (now under twelve bucks) is just fine.

review_title: Not happy - hole in the front fabric.
review_body: There was a hole in the fabric right on the front of this jacket.  However, I stitched it up and used it because I needed it for his first day at school.  Very disappointed. The fabric appears to be very thin as well.
Excellent Hoodie - this is one of the quality items I have purchased on Amazon for an incredible economical price. Fits perfectly.

review_title: Its been a couple of months and its still his favorite hoodie to wear to work
review_body: Bought it cause my boyfriend works at Target. Its been a couple of months and its still his favorite hoodie to wear to work.
Fits well, keeps you warm, has loads of loose threads and not super well made, but about what you'd expect for the price. Not bad.

review_title: Classic cut that does much to make those of us no longer built like stick figures still look good
review_body: Levis 550's sit at the natural waist and do much to make those of us no longer built like stick figures still look good. Not a fat boy jean but more of a classic cut that does what clothes used to do, which is to showcase ones strengths while deemphasizing our shortcomings. The only thing I don't like is the size printed on the label. People standing behind me in line don't need to know my pants size.

review_title: I'm not a happy camper and these jeans are going back to the ...
review_body: I've worn Levi 550 29x31 for many years. These are supposed to be 550 size 29x31, but they don't come close to fitting. I want to exchange them for 30x31. If those work out well I'll revise my review. But as of today, I'm not a happy camper and these jeans are going back to the seller.

review_title: They are Levi's -- what else can you say?
review_body: Levi's are a very dependable product, and it's really nice to be able to order by-the-numbers and get exactly the fit you expect. If only Levi's would make it a bit easier to figure out which color is which--Rinse? Dark Stonewash? Plank? It's hard to tell looking at photos online. At the very least, perhaps Levi's could include the name of the color on the label inside the pants, so you can order the same thing later. To purchase another pair of ones I already owned, I ended up searching the Internet for "Levi's product codes" or some such, got lucky that someone had actually posted a list like that, and then I matched up the code number on the pants label to find out what the color is called. But, hey--it worked!
I don't know how you order the same size as the 569 style and the 550 isn't even close and the 569 fits perfectly.

review_title: it's thinner and doesn't have the nice flexible feel of good denim
review_body: I ordered 3 pairs of Levi's 550's in different colors.  The two that were blue denim fit but the black was too small.  Black also isn't of the same grade of denim, it's thinner and doesn't have the nice flexible feel of good denim.

review_title: Finally, a way to buy 35" jeans
review_body: I have looked everywhere for jeans with a 35" waist, but only once did I find some tucked in with the 34" and 36" sizes. 34 is a bit snug for me, and 36 almost falls off. I was complaining about this at a family gathering, when it occurred to me to try Amazon. There they were: perfect 35x30, relaxed fit, stone-washed jeans, just what I wanted.
I like Levi's, I think.  Maybe not.  The sizing seems to vary wildly depending on supplier.  Some seem to be high quality.  These ones seem like cheap garbage.

It’s nearly impossible to buy jeans that don’t have elastic in them.  Not sure who thought this was a good idea but I can’t stand anything with elastic. There’s only a few colors made elastic free so make sure you read the fine print in the description!
The button is somehow attached with metal "pins", well one of them was sticking out of the denim and I've got the puncture wound to prove it. I've since bent it inwards with a pair of pliers.

review_title: Just Right! It does not get better than this,
review_body: The jeans fit! I know that is expected, but with these jeans, it happens! They are comfortable. These jeans appear to be of Levi's famous durable construction. Fit, comfort, durable! What more could one want?
Fast delivery. Short looks fabulous and very comfy. I definitely recommend!

review_title: Look great...size up one for regular wash/dry
review_body: I would size up one if you want to wash and dry normally. It does shrink up a bit since they are 100% cotton. But my father loved them!
Perfect
They don't shrink and few wrinkles. However, the color does fade after a few washes.
I really like these for casual wear. They look good and fit great, just like a regular long sleeve beefy-t shirt
Nice thick & hefty fabric, feels solid and durable. Works well on its own or as a warm under-layer. I will probably get another the next time I want a Henley.
Very soft well made and mid weight for cooler to cold days. Hubby liked very much. Washed well too no pilling !
Purchased for son and he really likes this shirt. Very well made and nice color.

review_title: Have only had the shirt for one week or I ...
review_body: Have only had the shirt for one week or I could have given this item 5 stars.  This shirt is heavy and not a light weight cotton shirt.
Very nice T-Shirt. Well made, feels good in your body and keeps you warm. For 10 bucks this is a great deal.
Typical UA fit and quality.  I am a fan of UA items.  If you have never purchased them before, they fit a bit snugger than some other brands, but for UA it fits as expected.
The small was a little snug on my hubby, so we ordered another in medium, but it's a little too loose.  Other than that, it's a great shirt.
Bought this T-shirt in a different color. Comfortable light shirt.

This is a really great shirt! I use it for my regular workouts in the gym and it feels very good. I used to wear regular cotton shirts and get home all sweaty, but with this shirt its not the case- it dry and comfy. I think that the fabric is excellent and does the job perfectly. I must say that I tried several dry fabric shirts, like Asics and adidas. UA is by far the best. I now own 7 of those shirts, for everyday workout. Highly recommended.
I don't think I've ever bought a product from Under Armour that didn't feel comfortable and deal with sweat and breathing greatly!
This shirt is so comfortable and soft. My son really enjoys wearing it.

review_title: A little large, but they work.
review_body: I guess these shirts run a bit large.  I'll remember to order one size down next time. Other than that, the shirts are very light and breathe well.  I've seen some complaints about the fabric being thin, but it hasn't worn out or torn with the abuse I've put them through.  I have to say that I actually prefer the lighter material, as I cool down and dry off must faster than some of the heavier sweat-wicking clothing I've used before.

It fits great.  Nice material.  Only problem is that I ordered "Academy/Steel" which looks grey in the picture, but the shirt I got is definitely blue.  Not a big enough problem to send it back, but I wouldn't have ordered it if I would have known it was blue.

The color listing on these shirts is terrible.  Be careful what you pick because what you get in the mail could be totally different.  Royal blue is anything but royal.  More like dark blue with black flecks.

review_title: Great shirt. My so wears one every day under ...
review_body: Great shirt. My so wears one every day under his work uniform.

These are comparable to anything at Bealls or Khols.  Comfortable, durable, and attractive office slacks.  These arrived when they said they would and there were no flaws in the pair I received. I'll be ordering more of this style.
Bought these for my boyfriend, and he loved them so much he had me immediately buy another pair. They're comfy, well-made, and look good!

review_title: Waist and length fit right.  Pant legs seem baggy.
review_body: The waist fit just right, but the pant legs seemed a bit wide.  I like a straight fit jeans fit to my pants.  These felt more like a relaxed fit.  It is more like a dress pant with a baggy fit.  I hoping for a slightly tighter leg fit out of a Chino. Gotta show off that butt and legs.  Good build quality though.
They're just ok, nothing special. Great price but don't look as good as the Izod or Lee brands I purchased at the same time. They seem a bit snug to me so I've ordered the next size up to compare.
Tried these out for work casual slacks. 100% Love them and they move well.

review_title: They look and feel super baggy
review_body: The material looks and feels nice. But I swim in these pants. They look and feel super baggy. If I hadnt worn them for a full day, I'd return them.
Great fit and comfort at a wonderful price. The material seems nice enough to be durable and they wear well after washing and drying without ironing.

review_title: The pants are OK. Not really what I expected ...
review_body: The pants are OK.  Not really what I expected.  I was looking for a light weight material and these are more a casual thick material pant style.
Size is accurate. Pants feel good. Minor wrinkling after wash. They shrink 1/4-1/2 inch after wash. Good buy for the price

review_title: Notice, these slacks are NOT white.
review_body: Nice chinos for the money but they are a light tan or what they call natural. I actually could see the difference in the advertised photo  but didn't really care.

These are relaxed fit which works for me at my age and size.  These jeans are fairly light which I also like, so they are good for most weather situations unless it is sub-zero outside.  They seem well made which is what you should expect from jeans with the Levis name attached.  But they are not the original denim material.
Really liked the old cut.

review_title: These feel pretty flimsy, which is a bit worrying as they're ...
review_body: These feel pretty flimsy, which is a bit worrying as they're supposed to be "jeans"...but aren't. They have only one function, which is fashion. Not going to survive a single work day. Hell, probably not even a single exterior photo-shoot. They're probably fraying in my closet right now under the weight of this criticism.

review_title: Does NOT match usual Levi quality
review_body: I can't believe these have the Levi name on them.  Bought these for my son to replace his previous pair 559 bought from Macy's.  Label shows same size but these are WAY too big!  Due to the fit, he would require 2 whole sizes smaller in the waist and 2 inches shorter in lenght.  So, what do we do?  These have been washed but I refuse to keep a product that is so far different from what is listed on the label.

review_title: Terrible quality and a disappointment from a long-time Levi's fan
review_body: I'm not sure what happened to Levi's. But these pants were just absolute crap. The quality was non-existent and the fit was wonky. The material of the pants felt like those spandex mom jeans you see on tv. Overall a highly disappointing experience from a once trusted brand. Avoid this cheap knockoff of itself at all costs.

I really like the cut of these jeans, so it's too bad that they're roughly 1.5 inches wider than the tag states (They were supposed to be a 30 waist, but as you can see from my pictures they are closer to 16 when folded in half, making them nearly 32). The ones I received were made in Cambodia, and as another reviewer states they are made with very thin material. Buyer beware, there seems to be a few different versions of these floating around.

review_title: Not all that, but still cool.
review_body: I notice that Levi's run kind of small these days, but all in all these jeans are cool. I like the relaxed, straight fit that can be flattering if you aren't extra skinny. I got Steely Blue. A medium blue, kind of stretchy denim (not a fan of that), with fade strips on the upper thighs. I like them and would order more. Levi's are still cool to me.

I’ve ordered these before so I didn’t have any issues with this additional purchase but I will advise that people need to make sure to read the sellers/consumers comments on the sizing and colors to make sure you get what you want! I’ll definitely end up purchasing another pair in the future!

These jeans are odd.  I do like the wash of them - as they look sufficiently worn-in.  However, what they don't tell you in the product description for the "standardize" wash is that they are made of 98% cotton and 2% "elastane".  Which makes for a "stretchy" jean.  I've never worn jeans like this.  And certainly not ones made my Levis.  That being said, they are starting to "grow on me" a little and  I am finding them to be unusually comfortable.  Even if I do feel kinda like I'm wearing Mom Jeans from the 80's.  Overall, not bad jeans - just be forewarned that the material is not your usual Levis' denim.
These jeans looked fairly good and were comfortable prior to washing. However, they shrunk a lot during their first wash/dry, and I honestly cannot fit into them now.
What can I say my husband usually wears size 2x got him the size and it fits perfect. I guess if he wanted a baggier fit he could go up a size but it fits nice not too fitted.

review_title: I am a medium in all tops. This item ...
review_body: I am a medium in all tops.  This item, with a long sleeve tee shirt on underneath was too small.  Especially considering it will most likely shrink after one wash.  I gave to my Wife to wear, rather than returning it
A good fleece hoodie just the way it should be. Good quality and good fit in a good material for a very reasonable price. Thank you Hanes!
I got this to replace my husband's worn out hoodie, which can be tricky 😂 But he loves this one just as much and finally let me get rid of his old ratty one with holes in it. Win!
Exactly as pictured. Nice bright pale blue. Soft and comfortable. Zipper sturdy. Can't beat the price.
They fit great, very comfortable.  They're not too tight on the sleeves by the arm which is my issue with my other zippered hoodies.  Definitely recommend!

Just OK  If your looking for something lightweight this may be for you.  I was searching for something like a sweatshirt and my first impression was why put a hood on a shirt?  I have shirts that are heavier.  I'm interested to see how it holds up.

review_title: fits well and does 2 different jobs
review_body: great fit...I keep it in the car in Summer for indoor A/C blasting and in the Winter for all around use.

review_title: Warmer than I expected. Very comfortable
review_body: I love it so much. It warmer than I expected. I thought it would be too small but it was actually a little big on me. Super comfortable and soft.
Not a heavy jacket, just for lounging around or somewhat cool days. This is what I was looking for. Xlg fit as expected.

review_title: Not Up To Levi's Standards--Or Mine
review_body: Because it's thin, stretchy denim with white stitching, WTH?

review_title: Classic Levi’s, always a great go-to.
review_body: Love the availability of so many different waist/length combos so it was easy to get the one that I know will fit me.  And it has the normal waist height for those of us who hate low-waist-cut jeans that always feel like they’re falling down.

review_title: I'm giving 2 stars and not 1 because I still think the overall product is good, as long as I can get a size ...
review_body: The jeans were too small, and I returned them. This was disappointing, as previous Levi's 550 relaxed fit jeans I purchased from Amazon fit when I purchased the same size. On comparing these with the jeans of the same size (35W, 32L) that I already own, these new ones had a noticeably narrower waist. I'm giving 2 stars and not 1 because I still think the overall product is good, as long as I can get a size that fits properly.  I'll try purchasing in a store, where I can try the jeans on.  I did not that other comments said there could be an issue with jeans manufactured in Egypt (compared with, e.g., Mexico). The new jeans were manufactured in Egypt; the ones I already owned in Mexico. This is consistent with the other comments.

after having read the reviews about levi's (and having some of the same problems as others in variability of fit), i ordered two pairs on two different days to see if there were any differences in construction...  these appeared to be from the same lot and were of the same quality with the same fit.  i have had other levi's in the same supposed size that did not fit, but these appeared as per specs... they appeared to be well constructed and competently sewn.

Jeans are undersized...very poor quality stitching....I wore them twice and stitching in fly area has failed..zipper  unattached to fly...very disappointed...won't buy Chinese made Amazon jeans again...lesson learned....thought I was buying real Levi' s  but got inferior crap jeans.
I purchased 2 pair of these for my husband.  They fit the way I would expect and haven't shrunk length-wise (machine washed & dried 3 times).
Husband likes them, could not find them in a retail outlet

I read the reviews and so only bought one pair to see if my "Picky Guy"  likes them.  Husband said they do not fit like the old fashioned ones he wore to work years ago.  However, being that he has a little bit of a tummy, he liked the one area being slightly tighter.  They are made to help keep that tummy looking a little flatter.  They do not fit "relaxed" as in the title, so in the future we will be looking for a new brand of jeans so Mr. Picky will be completely happy with them.

review_title: Fabric much softer than earlier jeans
review_body: Constructed well as Levi's always are.  But, the fabric is flimsy compared to one's I purchased even just a few years ago.  It's way too soft.  It's almost like wearing pajamas.

review_title: The Jeans are great as always but be very careful on the size
review_body: The Jeans are great as always but be very careful on the size. I ordered size 42 waist as every pair of pants I own and wear are size 42 waist (including some Levi's 550 Relaxed Fit Jeans which fit me just right). These jeans did not come close to fitting me and I had to send them back. Not sure if Levi's shrank their design or what but there was no way these jeans were going to come close to fitting me. Amazon took them back and credited me back immediately
Will be buying more, great look, feel and fit. Surprised that it’s so good.
Quality, comfy t's, look good, no shrinking after first few washes.
Nice shirt. Thinner than expected but happy it doesn't feel bulky. Good fit. Good length.
Great quality! Soft to the touch and sturdy construction! My nephew loves to wear it to school and for baseball practice.
Fits great really like the buttons on the shirt..
Very comfortable. The quality and the price justifies itself.  https://www.amazon.com/dp/B010278M7I/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_0
Good communication, nice red color, fits well.  Thank you.
Very nice shirt, under $10.00 I got almost all the colors, Medium size. Lucky me no more medium ones.
A nice thicker cottton, not thin at all. Perfect gift for a nephew who has everything. The grey/black look s really nice.
nother successful christmas gift.  Very soft and very long.  Great buy for the price $7.99.  Wish I'd gotten more.

review_title: very comfortable and light weight shirt
review_body: very comfortable and light weight shirt.  loose fit will conceal either a flabby or buffed body.  consider a smaller size if you want something more form fitting
My husband is a soccer referee and needed this to help him stay warm on cold nights. This fits as expected and does it's job. It's great quality, which I expect from the brand and price point.
Fabric feels a lot cheaper than other Under Armour shirts I own. I would not buy this again.
Great purchase for the price. Very light weight and comfortable.

review_title: Ordered this for my husband and he says he loves ...
review_body: Ordered this for my husband and he says he loves it clearly I see he does since he's always wearing it LOL
XL fits great for 188cm, 98kg body but I prefer the fabric of heatgear sonic fitted short sleeves that make you feel cool in hot weather.

review_title: and a large fit great. Material is thin - good for hot day ...
review_body: 6' and 180lbs. and a large fit great. Material is thin - good for hot day workouts. I have only worn it a couple times, but I trust UA quality/durability.

review_title: Already good, even better with Amazon Prime Discount
review_body: What can I say? Quality shirt at Amazon Prime Day Prices!
was hoping for a longer fit. Other UA shirts i have seem to be longer. oh well!

Ordered a black shirt, the color was listed as black/white which the Q&A section described as black with a white logo. I received a granite colored shirt, and now I have no time to return and receive the correct color for the event I needed the shirt for in the first place. The picture also shows a male wearing an all black shirt. Very misleading.
I did not order this item. Besides the size you show is wrong.

review_title: Seem to be made of good quality fabric but didn’t care for the way the ...
review_body: Seem to be made of good quality fabric but didn’t care for the way the pants are cut and the fit. But easy exchange and return if needed.
cheap pant, doesn't hold crease

review_title: Very good value for the price
review_body: Solid pants. Very good value for the price. For some reason it attracts dog hair but it iwouldn’t keep me from buying another pair
PRO. price, material, waist fit.

review_title: I told him how good the pants look on him
review_body: I got these for my son for school (high school). His school has a dress code, just no jeans and a collared solid shirt, colors are free to choose.  Anyway.....he has Aspergers. Comfort is important. I told him how good the pants look on him, he gives me a dirty look and says "comfort is what matters....). Thus my review.

review_title: Quality at a price that can't be beat for business casual khakis.
review_body: Great pants for work. Very economical and not bad styling. I usual go more high end with my clothes but I tried these pants out and I was surprised at how good they were for the price.

review_title: I just received these today. I am 6'2" 227lbs ...
review_body: I just received these today.  I am 6'2" 227lbs with a retired athletic body (big butt and stomach not as flat as I would like), they fit well and I will be ordering more.  I'll check back after a run through the washer and dryer.
A great value, and a perfect fit. Better fit and quality than the name brands. Great selection of colors. I bought several colors.

Nice pants, fit well, but only wore once and can't/won't wear again. When I got these pants, I washed and ironed the leg crease flat. Unfortunately, that left a perfect white line down the leg. I wore them hoping the line would fade. No such luck. Seem it got more obvious after wearing. I won't even look at Amazon Essentials brand anymore.

Comfortable but too big I am a 40 inch waist 29 leg the waste was way too big had to send back bought new pair waiting for them to arrive.  I ordered a 38 waist 29 leg.  I will let you know how these fit. And one of the belt loops was broken.  That's why I gave it four stars instead of five due to the broken loop.

These jeans are obviously fake, the first pair that I opened (steely blue) seem to be made of a stretchy material, I have worn Levi's for most of my adult life and have never had a pair of jeans that were made of this material, I thought I could live with the stretch material pants until today (Aug 1, 2016 I came home and my wife told me that the other pair of pants had already ripped at the back left pocket, that convinced me that these are fake jeans. I would obviously give the seller a chance to make it right, and will change my review if I just happened to get two bad pairs.

THey fit great at first, but shrank about an inch making them too short.  Had to return at order the next size up so after they were washed the length would fit.  These were lighter weight denim than usual jeans but I like them.
Good jeans! But surprisingly lite-weight fabric. I hadn't noticed they were made with stretch fabric.

review_title: Got mine in Midnight Oil and am happy
review_body: I can't be bothered with going from store to store looking for the correct size in the right color, it's frustrating as I can't find my size easily.
