However, buying clothing online is also risky unless you know what you're buying. I knew the 559 jeans (given several other options I've tried including store brands that just stay in my closet now) fits me well.  I ordered one here in Midnight Oil which I hadn't seen before and I'm very pleased. Perfect for casual Fridays at work with a nice button down shirt. I'll try another new color next.
Owned these pants for less than 4 months. Bought 4 pairs, today the crotched ripped out from center seam all the way up the zipper.

review_title: then they would be great but how am I supposed to know what to ...
review_body: They're huge. I have a big waist - around 42-44 true waist size. I ordered the 38x32 because I had a previous pair of 559's that fit reasonably well. But  these are giant. Waist is way too big and there is too much material in the seat. If I had any clue what size to order, then they would be great but how am I supposed to know what to buy when they keep making their product bigger and bigger.

review_title: They are his new favorite jeans. He's all about being comfortable and these ...
review_body: Bought these for my boyfriend. They are his new favorite jeans. He's all about being comfortable and these are the most comfortable pair he said he's ever worn. They look really nice with anything too!

review_title: Not The Quality of Levi's I Am Used To
review_body: Beside not being a solid color that is shown in the photo, the quality of material has definitely declined over the years.  I couldn't believe these were Levi's when I took them out of the packaging.  I am left wondering if these are knock-offs, or if Levi's has simply started using thinner, poor quality material.

review_title: Seems like everything these days is getting lower cut
review_body: These are my go to jeans. Seems like everything these days is getting lower cut, slimmer, and made with stretch material. No thank you, please. If you want some good quality denim that has a normal waist and is straight cut, this is the jean for you.
My son loved it, the price was awesome, and the quality was spot-on and it should last for years.
Bought this rather than the women's equivalent because I like a cozy, oversized feel. It fits precisely as I expected. The stitching feels sturdy. The fabric pills a little.

review_title: since I'm a woman and this is a mans style) I love the feel of this hoodie
review_body: Even though the sleeves are a little long (I expected this, since I'm a woman and this is a mans style) I love the feel of this hoodie, it is so comfortable and warm.

review_title: Be great for windy days in spring
review_body: It's light weight jersey. Be great for windy days in spring, or for layering. Good for working inside a semi-heated garage or warehouse.
I returned the one I bought. The outside was very stiff and not soft. It kind of felt like a soft burlap.

For the price, this is great. I may order another one. It's just your average hoodie and there's not much special or different about it. I'm impressed because the price was low and it fits just as expected, even after being washed and dried.

review_title: ) its fine to work out in I guess
review_body: Plenty big just not very long the bottom barely reaches my belt line. its a halter top hoodie :) its fine to work out in I guess.
A good hoodie with a great color (light blue). It's thin (what I wanted) for those looking for something bulkier.
Nice medium weight fleece. I’m 6.0 and 185 lbs. fits great, not baggy or tight.

review_title: The fabric used is excellent, has survived numerous washings with no ill effects
review_body: Am on my second season with this hoodie, worn for work. The fabric used is excellent, has survived numerous washings with no ill effects. sleeves are intact, no fraying. Zipper continues to work properly. A little on the thin side so works best as an underlayer in very cold weather.

review_title: belt loop ripped loose leaving a hole in the jeans
review_body: Levi's just aren't made with the same integrity anymore.  The belt loop ripped loose leaving a hole in the pants the first time my husband went to wear them. Very disappointing
Looks like I should have chosen a shorter length and a looser fit leg as they were hard to slip on over my fused ankle. Needs a "stretch able waist. Good quality product.

The jeans are great. Love the way they fit. Wasn’t sure about the color “Fonzie” but was happily surprised. What sucks is that after 3 days of wear (Mostly office environment) they started coming apart on the outter leg stitching. Levi’s said it’d be 6-8 weeks to review once sent in and no guarantee on receiving a new pair. Lame.

review_title: I have worn the same size for years, and ...
review_body: I have worn the same size for years, and these were definitely way smaller then the listed size... I purchased several pair of dark stonewash too, and the size on those pants were correct.  Not sure why these were too small.

I purchased some of these jeans,  the same size as normal just like I have done every year for years.  This year,  the fit and size is different.  They are MUCH too small.  I have heard other people complain that it depends on which country they are manufactured in and that there is no consistency in sizing from Levi.  I returned them and have switched to a different brand.

review_title: Levi's men's550 relaxed fit were the jeans for me
review_body: I ordered the Levi's 550 relaxed fit as a replacement pair. I purchased my first pair from another source some years ago and they have worn and fit great! I purchased other cheaper jeans thinking all jeans are the same so why not save some money too! But that is not a true statement. The budget brand has shrunk about a inch so now wear short in the length to me and my old Levi's 550 jeans wear the same though have been washed many times over the years. Get these jeans if you are 6'2'' weight 235lbs great fit. Or just looking for a durable pair of jeans, and price not bad.

Didn't fit like an older pair I had, so I sent them back. I've noticed with Levi's that depending on what country of manufacture that is located on the tag will determine how they will end up fitting. The older pair I had were made in Mexico. These were made in Lesotho. Side note: Search for a CBS article regarding the Gap/Levis textile factory there.

review_title: The price you pay you should get a better product!
review_body: Bought two pairs and alternate wearing them. After less than 60 days one pair has two holes just from washing! What has happened to Levi jeans? The price you pay you should get a better product! Ordered a third pair in July and today the third pair just ripped out next to the back pocket!

review_title: I really don't like the way these fit anymore
review_body: I really don't like the way these fit anymore.  I'm replacing an identical few pairs of jeans that still fit perfectly fine.  On the one hand, it seems like they've modified the crotch area and it creates a kind of bubble in the from, but the rear area is so tight that it feels really uncomfortable when I sit.  After wearing them all my life, I'm sending these back and I'm gonna try another brand.

Bought two different pairs one was Dark Stonewash that was made in Mexico... no problem, fit well... The other pair was Medium Stonewash made in Indonesia and was too small in the waste... diminishes the brand name when the basically same product, same size, is actually different.... I will pay more in the future and buy them at a store where I can try the pants on...
Outstanding value. Medium weight, good fit, didn't shrink or fade in wash
Boyfriend loves this. Nicely made, perfect for his days outside at the range. Can’t believe this was only ten bucks!
Good henly, tho it does seem a hit snug (is that me?)
Great color, great fit and really quite comfortable.  I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
Great Henley shirt for a decent price. I've purchased several of these in different colors

review_title: All in all though I really like it.  It's a great addition to my casual wardrobe.
review_body: This is a nice step up from a long sleeved t-shirt.  The material is comfortable.  The Henley style adds a little class.
Very nice. Comfortable. Washed up well. The large ran a bit smaller than I expected. But it’s an under shirt for the winter so it’s fine
Look and feel of this shirt is great! very heavy-duty material.
Great shirt, especially for the price.  The selling and delivery process went well.
Fabric medium grade, not too thick,but not flimsy either. Perfect for 3 seasons maybe too warm for summer. Easy care, washer & dryer. Any casual occassion and wear with dress slacks or jeans.
well made, washes well, well cut. very happy with this purchase
A really great shirt for the price. Soft yet quick dry when you sweat.

review_title: Guys this shirt is the best tshirt ever for the gym but dont do the ...
review_body: Guys this shirt is the best tshirt ever for the gym but dont do the mistake i did, i bought medium since i'm usually wearing medium for tshirts but believe me its too big, if i buy one again i will buy the small one.

review_title: good stuff, material is thinner than other heat gear ...
review_body: good stuff, material is thinner than other heat gear I have.  Don't know if they changed how they make them or if this is a "value" line or something.
Should order a larger size than you wear. Runs small
Fits well. Size accurate (Xl=Xl) and not tight. Very thin and "window pane" fabric. I prefer more body + next time will go with a blend. Color and logo legit.

I've ordered xlt shirts from under armour before and they've been great. This one for some reason is badly undersized. I'm 6'6" so I need tall shirts, this one was labeled xlt but fell just below my navel.

My first Under Armour T-shirt arrived today. I threw it on a did a 45 minute treadmill workout. The product works as advertised. I will be ordering another one after I finish this review. Buy the same size that you would normally wear. It's already loose fitting, so don't sweat it!
I'm usually a medium but the medium here is way too big. The color is not great either.

review_title: My favorite shirt. Receive great comments
review_body: My favorite shirt. Receive great comments. Feels Awesome on me. Must buy more in different colors... Thank U so much
good fit. good look. washes fine.  no fading after 4 washes. if they hold up, they'll replace dockers for me.
Nice for the price.  My only complaint is the button hole is a bit small making it difficult to unbutton.  After washing though it gets easier.
Realky nice pants. Given the cost factor these pants are surprisingly well made. They wash well and there is no evidence of fading.
They have held up to my son’s fast food job for a month. I foresee them lasting awhile longer. For the price they are fantastic.

review_title: Comfortable, but wrinkles very easily in wash
review_body: They feel very comfortable and fit well, but they wrinkle very easily. The came with a crease, but that disappears after one wash. I also ordered Lee's slacks, and those held up much better with far less wrinkles and a very defined crease.

review_title: My replacement for Target's canceled Merona brand.
review_body: Fit great.  Good value. I used to buy Merona brand from Target before they discontinued that brand.  I've switched to these.
Perfect fit, just as advertised.
Good pants for the price. I have no complaints. They don't wrinkle easy and are very comfortable.

review_title: Good fit, always covered in lint
review_body: These are comfortable, flexible, and sized accurately, but are amazing at picking up lint and debris.

Poor quality material. Always wrinkles no matter how many times I iron or press them. They arrived already looking faded and just faded even more with every wash. I tried to like them but they really suck. Not worth the twenty bucks spent.

For someone with an athletic build, these jeans are excellent.  They are right in between a really loose look, like Nautica loose fit, or more form fitting "regular fit" jeans, which are not my thing.  I thought the fabric was very stylish and looks great with buffalo plaid or a black t-shirt.  Finally, I'd say that they fit just as expected.  Overall, I'm very happy with them and highly recommend them.

review_title: Good fit.  Thin acid wash style material was not what I wanted though. Which color is the real levi's?  I guessed wrong.
review_body: The fit is good and as expected.  I was trying to buy normal robust traditional colored blue jeans.  These appear to be acid washed or something and the material is very thin.  I have jeans I've warn over a year that feel more robust.  I guess you cannot tell from the color descriptions which material is quality jeans and which is thin fashonable acid wash.  I would not have purchased these if I had known the material would be so weak and thin.  I assume these will snag and tear at the slightest scuff.

Ordered the 'Range' color and was disappointed in their appearance.  Range is a nice way of saying very-dirty-looking-denim.  If you like your jeans to look grungy and muddy, these are the ones for you.  Not what I was looking for.

Great jeans, fit perfect-- since I don't change sizes and I'm not a huge fan of going to the mall, ordering online was the way to go. Jeans showed up just as described and fit exactly the same as the worn pair I was looking to replace.

review_title: Fit well, and was what I was looking for ...
review_body: Fit well, and was what I was looking for.  I was surprised that they were made in China.  I always thought Levi's was an American company.  May have to find a different brand in the future.

review_title: Disappointed yet again with Amazon and their sellers
review_body: This is ridiculous I ordered a size 36wx30 and got this as shown in the picture... I need my money back please and thanks... All the orders I have made with Amazon have been a waste... I clearly did not order a 34w, the pants which was supposed to be jeans is too small.. Material is just soft cotton... I need my money back thank you

As other reviews have mentioned, the sizing and material varies. I purchased a pair or the Range color jeans and they fit great and the material was a decent quality. On the other hand, I purchased a pair of the Wellington color and the fit was too tight and the material was thin and cheap, definitely not the same weight denim as the previous pair. At $42 a pair I expect the quality and consistency to be a lot better. Levi's is obviously taking short cuts to cut down on the cost, but they are blowing it in process. Looks like I'll be finding a new brand of go-to jeans.

review_title: Levi's Still the Best Jeans on the Market
review_body: Levi's are simply the best Jean's you can buy. Find the right cut size and style and stick with them. For me the 559s are the only jeans I wear.

I had purchased a pair of blue color at a dept. store and liked the fit. Ordered a black color of the same size here. They fit perfectly. I like these jeans, they are not too heavy and have a lot of give so they don't bind. Wouldn't be my go too jeans for heavy work as they are thinner than a 501. As a nice casual jean with plenty of give look no further.

review_title: Can't go wrong with Levi's red tab.
review_body: Great Jeans! Relaxed, straight leg jeans by Levi's are very comfortable and stylish. The Covered up, Jean color/scheme looks very nice. I could easily live in these jeans every day. That's why this is my 7th or 8th pair of jeans I have bought that are Levi's this year. Highly recommend these jeans.

review_title: I am 5'4 1/2" 155 lbs and it fits loose but comfortable. The last one I got lasted 10 years ...
review_body: This is exactly the sweatshirt I needed to walk my dogs.  It is middle weight.  I am 5'4 1/2" 155 lbs and it fits loose but comfortable.  The last one I got lasted 10 years and is still wearable if a bit faded and stretched out.  Would highly recommend.
my son is 5' 4" and his weight is 135 and he wear Medium size,and that fix him perfect.

I love this sweatshirt; I've bought four of them, 2 gray, 1 dark green, 1 light blue.  They're great.  It's fits well, has good pockets that things won't fall out of, and it's warm.  Definitely recommend.

review_title: Too small i bought maroon and green
review_body: Too small size are at least 1 off. I probably keep them i hate sending stuff back

review_title: Great product, fits as expected, comfortable
review_body: Bought for a Dad Tiger (Daniel Tiger) costume for Halloween. I knew my husband would still wear it afterward! It worked great, and he says it’s very comfortable.

Fits okay, Just received it but haven't washed it yet.  I like that it's made with some recycled materials.  It's light weight, not very thick.  Cost less than others comparable.  I will add an update on the fit after washing.
Great fit and look.  White is a hard color to find in retail stores.  This is a great hoodie to have handy in any weather.

review_title: Ok price not very well made.
review_body: For the price it is a good hoddie but the materials are not the best and it does not seem it will have a long life ahead.
I like that it is soft to the touch, it's not bad roomy as I expected but for the purpose of its use it works.
Seemed to be made well. however the expectation on the website was for a robust, heavy fabric and it is not...I  returned it..

review_title: Another US brand down the toilet.
review_body: Belt loop broke 2nd time I put them on.  I'm a middle-aged, out of shape weakling but still manged to bust these jeans with my non-dominant arm/hand. What cheap garbage.

review_title: falling apart after a month.. Are these fake levis or has the brand gone bad
review_body: I cant believe this.  they were worn a few times, then washed.  First my wife said why are you wearing those old levis with the holes in the back pockets.  then one of the belt loops fell off.

review_title: Garbage. I will never buy Levi's again
review_body: Levi's quality is a thing of the past. Belt loops break loose within a month, tearing a hole in the jeans. The claptrap about "legendary Levi's" is nothing more than empty marketing hype these days. Garbage. I will never buy Levi's again.

review_title: These pair of Levi's are no so great as they used to
review_body: These pair of Levi's are no so great as they used to. There is something different and when you wash them, the legs torn. I am disappointed with the latest Levi's product I bought. Not sure what is happening with this company that was synonymous of great quality and you can buy Jeans there without doubts, but now, not sure it is the case...

review_title: Levi's get the job done, and comfortably.
review_body: So glad Amazon has started carrying these at a good price!  I have grown weary of being forced to pay too much or play the sale-of-the-week game at the department store at the mall.

Other than the waist being too small these are the same 550s I've been wearing for years. I usually buy my jeans at Macy's partly because they vary slightly in size, so this is nothing new. Since you really don't know what you're going to get, and returns are a pain, I won't be buying my jeans at Amazon anymore.
Purchased these 550's and found that they are a little tight throughout the hip and thigh area. My cell phone, wallet and keys bulge out more than I would like. Hoping to break them in more.
Bought a pair from a department store that fit fine. Got these from Amazon and the are very tight abd I almost cannot button them.

Well, I don't wear them, I got them for my son. The cut is perfect for his tall 6'4" frame - the waistline is not too low cut like many other jeans. They give him a cute butt, so he's happy. My only complaint is that they're not in real, heavier denim - but these are ok.

item became defective 1 month after we are allowed to return - pants worn maybe 6 times and belt loops are ripped - cant find how to contact Amazon to make a complaint - very disappointed - this is not Levi quality pants.
These are good shirts especially for the price.  The collar is the best part, the picture doesn't show how nice it really is.  Highly recommend
Very well made and fit nicely. Good product. Great color. (and no one paid me to say this HA!)

review_title: 16 yo boy liked it and looks good on him
review_body: 16 yo boy liked it and looks good on him. Little thinner than I though it was but good quality.
Arms were pretty large and long - I washed it to see if I could shrink it. Other than that very nice shirt... super soft.
Gave it to good will.  Not a good fit. The material was not comfortable.
A medium was a little tighter than some others I own, but still in range. Finishing is good. Fabric is like the weight of a T-shirt, but not a cheap paper-thin T-shirt. I like it.

review_title: this was a gift for my son - fit fine - he loves Heneley shirts
review_body: this was a gift for my son - fit fine - he loves Heneley shirts.... very warm and lightweight...
My son is pleased with the fit, color, and washability.
States that it is a henley. It is nothing but a long sleeve buttoned pullover. Very unhappy with the description compared to actual product.

review_title: It has a hole in armpit and I haven't even ...
review_body: It has a hole in armpit and I haven't even washed it yet. Also the grey lining shows where it buttons.

The darn neck hole could fit life ring through it, good grief I'm a big guy but my head could be TWICE the size and stil fit through the hole.  That means an obnoxiously large opening at your neckline (so I constantly have to adjust the shirt)

review_title: True size and works great under vest.  Worth the $.
review_body: I use it under my vest and works as great as my other under armour shirts.
Not authentic Under Armour! So thin, poor quality. Cheap knockoff!
Shirt is comfortable, though neck is a little large and my body armor straps can rub my neck.

review_title: Lightweight t-shirt for the summer heat
review_body: Nice lightweight t-shirt, ideal for the summer heat. Fits snugly -- consider ordering one size up if you want it looser. Very happy with this t-shirt.
This fits really well on medium. So, no complaints.

review_title: Runs way to small to be effective
review_body: Quality is ok but are they run way too small. I am a lean 5'9, 225lbs and a XXL was tiny on me.
Great shirt. Very comfortable and fit was true to size. No loose strings or anything like other UA shirts I’ve purchased in the past.
Good shirt, good quality, fits well as expected
Fit perfectly. Much better than the quality at WalMart. Received compliments on Easter for how good they looked.

review_title: I will start off with the good.. The pants fit perfectly and the material ...
review_body: I will start off with the good..The pants fit perfectly and the material seems to be a really nice soft feeling cotton blend. My husband wears these type of black pants exclusively for work. This is the first time trying the Amazon pants.I purchased them because the price was good and they are non-wrinkle. Now the bad...I washed them before having him wear them for the 1st time. They did come out of dryer wrinkle free but the material attracted small hairs and fibers all over the material! I literally spent 10 minutes with a lint brush trying to get out the little hairs/fibers..I decided I'm not doing that every time so I was going to return them but the package says they cannot be returned if they have been washed.So now I'm stuck with pants that I will have to use a lint brush to every time. As I said my husband wears this type of pants for work and none of the other pants he has, has this problem. I gave it 2 stars because the actual quality of the pants seems good.
the size was not the exacte size..it was smaller than i ordered.
Great value! Husband usually wears Dockers and decided to give these a try. They’re perfect!

For $20 dress slacks, I have no complaints. The fit is as measured, the buttons feel fine and the pockets as I'd hope for. The 34" inseam feels a little shorter than I expected without much room to hem out, but it'll work.

review_title: Looks good and fits fine for the price
review_body: Looks good and fits fine for the price, but they are NOT wrinkle free and they attract lint/hair like crazy.
Returning dont like how they look.

Only complaints I have are regarding the angle of the pockets... The way they are angled, it is hard to out things in and take them out (especially a large phone).  Otherwise, the pants fit and are comfortable.
Once we got the correct size these fit my husband well.  Great quality for the price. Will buy again for sure!

review_title: Should be good in the summer
review_body: Black? Maybe.  More Charcoal, or something.  Doesn't match any black I own.  Fairly light weight.  Should be good in the summer.  Not sure how long they would last since they are a lighter weight.
One of the best things about being a guy is that once you find jeans that fit well, you can just order pants based on the numbers - the Levi "model" number, the waist, and inseam length.

review_title: Get in touch with your feminine side.
review_body: If I had been born a female of the species, or undergone dramatic surgery, these might fit better.

review_title: My go-to black jeans for life
review_body: I really love the fit and feel of these jeans. Usually I'm a 35-32, but these have always fit very comfortably in a 34 waist. They have just the right amount of stretchiness to keep them comfortable all day long. The denim is medium--not to heavy, not to light.

review_title: Garbage, poor craftsmanship and expect to order several to get the right fit since they come from all over the world.
review_body: Very dissatisfied and let down by Levi’s.  Levi’s is part of the USA economic problem.  On the same day, on the same order I bought 4 pairs of 559 jeans in same sizes but different colors.  Quality is trash.  All, ALL 4 pair of pants were from 4 different countries (Mexico, Bangladesh, Colombia, Lesotho, and The pair I already have is from Pakistan.  5 pairs of Levis all from 5 different countries and all 5 fit very different. The only thing in common beside the labels was the horrible stitching that was already falling apart especially on the back pockets.  I guess even China was too expensive for Levi’s. Never Again.

I was skeptical of the reviews saying that the material used for these jeans are cheap and not worth it because after all they are Levi's and how can that be possible. It's sadly true. I have dress pants which are more thicker than this cheap stuff. I can't believe they actually sell this labeled as a Levis. The cut and fit is still true and looks great but only from far since the cheap thin fabric wraps around you differently than a more thick, robust denim material so it can look a little flimsy. It's a good weekend lounging around the house type of a jean but not worthy of any outing.

review_title: While the 559's are one of my favorite styles of jeans
review_body: While the 559's are one of my favorite styles of jeans, i'm really not sure if i was sent a different model/type because the color of jeans i got certainly didn't match the color of the pair i saw in this photo which really drew me to them unfortunately.  Had to return them because the color was far too blue for my liking, too bad.

review_title: bought these for my husband but...
review_body: My poor dear husband ended up in the hospital this winter, and I discovered he had next to no jeans (that he should be wearing in public).  I ordered these for him but he's only worn them a couple of times.  Mostly due to my swiping them for myself.  The definitely look better on him than on me!

Nice pair of jeans. Mine came a little lighter than what I ordered though. Fit is good. Tight in the butt and lose in the quads. But not baggy. Great fit if you leg day. May order a darker pair. Though, I'm going to go to the store and try them on. To make sure I get the right color this time.

Like others have posted, these jeans are much thinner than the 559s you might used to. I was definitely disappointed. The only reason I'm not sending them back is because they are so light weight they might be useful in the summer. The fit was as expected, but the Andi color was much darker.

review_title: a bit different than the last time i purchased it
review_body: bought several pairs of these same Levi's about 5 years ago,  like them a lot, just about live in them.  those jeans were made in Colombia and the quality of both the workmanship and materials are excellent.  they are getting a bit ragged in spots so i decided to order a new pair, you know, for dressing up and taking the wife out on the town.
Purchased for casual office wear when the building temperature is unpredictable.
Perfect fit. Super soft. I’m going to buy more for my kids. We got them embroidered for an event. The quality is great

review_title: About a month after owning this hoodie I noticed the ...
review_body: About a month after owning this hoodie I noticed the seam on the elbow was coming apart.  I don't know if this happened after a month, during which I hardly wore it, or earlier (the window passed on being able to return it).  Regardless, this is unsatisfactory.  I have another hoodie, a different brand, that I've used rigorously for years that has no wear on it.
Bought this for my son, it's good quality and fits perfectly.  It's better quality than the standard hoodies.  He loves it.

review_title: Very happy with these zip up hoodies
review_body: Very happy with these zip up hoodies. They fit well, I've ordered in multiple colors for my 12 year old. He really likes them and he's usually very picky with clothes.

review_title: Fits as expected, washes up well
review_body: Not much need for this most of the year in Central Florida but when you need a light jacket for the morning, this works well.  I wanted something that I wasn't afraid to wear when doing something that I might get a little dirty, and this is it.  Washes up well.

review_title: Good, but the green tone wasn't what I expected..
review_body: It's a great line, except for two issues- the large size is larger than you might expect (I had to get both a medium and a large because the large was too large for me, with hoodies the sizes vary from brand to brand). Secondly, the colors matched what I expected,  EXCEPT for the green- The green is not FOREST DEEP green, it's more bright nerdy green- Not too happy with the green. I gave the green one to a friend... Otherwise, it's wonderfully comfortable, warm, and nice looking..

review_title: Love it. I wear it around the house
review_body: Love it. I wear it around the house.  Comfy like a blanket.  Wife caught wearing one of mine (I bought 2)!
It fits better then Fruit of the Loom hoodies and does not shrink in the clothes dryer like Fruit of the Loom does.

review_title: I would definitely recommend this item
review_body: Fit as expected.  Light, but warm enough in North Carolina for summer & fall.  I would definitely recommend this item.

review_title: Excellent, But Are They Still Well-Made?
review_body: These have long been my favorite basic jeans because of their fit, feel, and look.  However, the last pair I ordered wore out more quickly than any Levi's I'd ever owned.  I'll keep an eye on this pair, and report back with any issues.
I have waited for these to go down in price for over a year.  I finally snatched them when the price was right.  Good thing I did.  These fit just right.

I've purchased these at Macy's or elsewhere before. When mine were starting to wear a bit but I was avoiding going out shopping for more, my finace recommended I buy them online. Hadn't done that with jeans before. But since my size hadn't changed since I bought the last pair, I tried it. And they fit perfectly! Might be buying all my jeans this way now.

Not the fit I'm looking for. I gained some weight recently and I've been buying size 31waist by 32 long. Before weight gain, they fit perfectly. I will be sending a pair back for an exchange. I have to figure out what series of pant later.

review_title: I bought them as a present and he is pretty sure I bought these from a street vendor selling ...
review_body: My husband hates these jeans, I bought them as a present and he is pretty sure I bought these from a street vendor selling knock-offs.  He has made it a point to pull out his old Levi jeans and show what quality they used to have and how the difference is so overt that he has sworn to never buy another pair again...with the cheap material, crap quality and horrible new way they fit, I can't help but agree.  I will never buy anything from Levi's again and he is much more vocal about it.  Too bad, their stuff used to be first rate...just garbage fodder now.

Seems Levis is struggling with quality control. I bought 2 pairs of jeans (can you buy 1 jean?) and one of them had obvious flaws in the stitching where it looks like they ran out of thread and started another bobbin - it doesn't look terrible but it caught my eye. Of the two pairs, there is at least a 1/2" difference in the waist measurement. I also am worried about how much these will shrink since the last ones I bought shrank so much over a year I couldn't wear them anymore, even though they were dragging the ground and falling off my hips when they were new.

I've ordered several pairs of these jeans and I'm giving them 2 stars because I don't hate them but they seem to be poor quality.  I really expect more from Levi's - I've been wearing them my whole life.  But this particular pair - the belt loops keep snapping off.  It doesn't happen to any of my other jeans - just BOTH pairs of these jeans.  And yes, I wear belts.  I don't understand why it's happening, but it is, and it's disappointing.

This review is for 2 different orders. The first time I ordered these they fit perfectly. I recently reordered another pair and they were obviously miss marked and a full size too small even though the tag on the pants was correct. I don't think I will ever be ordering these again.
the button was missing, sent back

Rise, waist and hips fit just like always. However, as previous reviewers noted, Levi decided to change the leg cut on these. From mid-thigh to ankle the cut is approximately 1-1 1/2 inches wider than 550's from years gone by. If you are tall and thin like my husband, they will still look great.
The shirts are great just a little built for thicker around the middle kinda guys.
Glad I bought it. Good quality,fit well and my grandson liked it . Would definitely purchase again.
Color shown bears no relation to the description given.The color shown is bright scarlet, very misleading.
very longer as requested.

The material is a little thinner than my other Beefy Henley's but this is a product that I continually buy for casual wear.  They wash & dry really well.  Beware of spots !  If you drip something oil based on the shirt it will not come out if you don't pre-treat.
Gift for son-in-law. Beautiful shirt. Sure hope it washes up well. Will update if it doesn't.
Good quality shirt. No issues with shrinking or fading. Soft as well.
I have long arms and was pleased the shirt sleeve length was great. Comfortable fit. Feels like quality when you wear it. Ordered 3 more. Great price.

review_title: Not sure I love the color
review_body: Not sure I love the color...came out a little more purpley...than the photo...but the shirt is good quality, fit well. Item packed well and shipped very quickly.
Great shirt for my husband. Fits as expected.
Very comfortable and looks great. Washes well.
Good for the gym or any other sweaty activity.
Perfect. I have a few if these, and the never disappoint. Fit is perfect it keeps you cool, very durable, and so easy to care for.
This fits perfectly for my husband. It's comfortable and light weight and it looks great!

review_title: As described. Great product and fast delivery.
review_body: As described. Great product and fast delivery.

review_title: I'm 6 ft and pretty slim guy
review_body: I'm 6 ft and pretty slim guy. I got a medium, and the shirt was pretty short on the bottom and fits a little loose. Also kind of expensive for a shirt to work out with.

I know it says "loose" fitting but don't expect a baggy shirt. I'm 6'3" 190 lbs athletic build and a medium size is more tailored across chest with some breathing room around stomach, perfect fit. Fabric is very thin and lightweight. Not sure how it will hold up but it definitely looks as good as I hoped after one use.

review_title: This shirt fits fine but know that the material is very thin
review_body: This shirt fits fine but know that the material is very thin. Kinda seems like a knockoff but it gets the job done for its intended purpose, breathable workout shirt.

This shirt is my go-to UnderArmour workout shirt.  I also have the venting one which is also very good, but this one is a little less expensive and is still performs very well.  The fabric is just stretchy enough to give when you're working out, but is not baggy so it looks great.  Washes very well.  We'll be buying more of these!  Highly recommended.

review_title: ... just what I needed and wanted for me to enjoy and that Bruno Mars CD is the best heard ...
review_body: All of these products have been just what I needed and wanted for me to enjoy and that Bruno Mars CD is the best heard from start to finish in the last 15 years Wow
great pants, I'm glad I bought them.  fits very comfortably and definitely wrinkle resistant which is a huge plus!

Nice thick pants. Brought for work but they just don’t look trendy enough for me. The material although durable doesn’t cut it for me. They are not fitted at all. The color of the pants are kind of dull and unappealing.
More of a faded Navy.  The cotton material feels different.  Not bad, but different.  They are okay for work.
The Amazon Essentials trousers are a great deal.  They fit well, are durable, and are quite comfortable.
This is a perfectly serviceable pair of pants. It's not super nice, but for $20 it gets the job done.

review_title: Usually you can find better quality pants on sale for close to this price
review_body: Belt loops started fraying badly after a couple uses. Usually you can find better quality pants on sale for close to this price.

review_title: Pretty good slacks for the price!
review_body: For $20, these are pretty good slacks. They fit well. They don't shrink, either.
Great easy care pants.  May be an inch long in the inseam but I can live with that.  Dollar for dollar a great buy!
Buy a lint roller too, as these things come out of the dyer loaded with lint. Fit as they should. Nice quality for $20

review_title: These pants wash up like a dream and they have a nice fit also
review_body: These pants wash up like a dream and they have a nice fit also. I am planning to buy the other colors. Good buy.

review_title: I have a pair that match the label and everything size and all favorite pair of jeans ever but they stretch a bit
review_body: I thought they would be the stretchy kind. I have a pair that match the label and everything size and all favorite pair of jeans ever but they stretch a bit. both of these did not stretch even a little. Im fat so what. I wish their sizes were more consistent.

I love the jeans except the length shrank up and now I don't want to wear them.  I purchased 3 pair of my usual 36x34's and they shrank in the length.  I then purchased a 36x36 and by the time they shrink, I think I'll be satisfied.

review_title: For some variety, try the soft-wash jeans.
review_body: These are the first pair of soft-wash jeans I have owned. The material is soft and pliable, not like typical jeans which can seem stiff when new or just back from washing. The color graphite is a nice alternative to black. I don't know whether this is something new or not, but these jeans are intended to be worn "below the waist". If you try to wear them at your waist level, don't be too surprised if the crotch becomes too tight!

review_title: Be careful when you pick the color!
review_body: I bought these for my husband for Christmas and he loves the fit. But buyer beware, Avenger-Stretch is Black. I assumed that since there was another one named Black that this one was a dark blue. I was so disappointed they weren't blue because he really needed a blue pair, but my husband still liked them and will wear them.

Really like how they feeel, but lots of reviews said get a little bigger than normal - I did and they are too big. They say relaxed straight leg - legs are very baggy . I'm keeping them though because they do feel good on

review_title: The fit is consistent; Factory fabric inspection was poor
review_body: THE FIT was OK and as expected. HOWEVER: Returned 2 pairs bc the two identical pairs ordered had large pin holes around the full circumference of both leg hemlines. Unfortunate quality control failure; packaged in a folded manner, the hemline issues were hidden from visual inspection. Once opened and removed from the clear baggies, the issue was apparent.

Well this is my first 100% cotton buy of Levis and i was impressed on how the jean felt. The jean initially feels a little larger and definitely very baggy in comparison to jeans i usually wear, hoping after a wash the fit is a little more snug. Overall i'm happy with the purchase and would recommend it to someone else.

review_title: I like these jeans and this style
review_body: I like these jeans and this style. I now have 3 pairs of 559's Levi's, all bought within a momth of each other in different colors. The fit is different for each one, although they each are supposed to be  34/32. One was almost too tight, one just right, one a little on the looser side. They all worked for me, and I like the material (soft out of the package) so I am keeping them. . Just be aware when buying that it might not quite be the fit you were expecting due to them being cut slightly diffrent.

I have always bought Levi's because of their quality and because of the consistent fit. I could just tell my wife what style and size I wanted and didn't have to go with to try them on. Unfortunately thAt doesn't seem to be the case anymore. I just bought two pairs one from Amazon and one from a local store in the same size and style I have purchased in the past (559 - 34W 30 L) and when I tried them on they were two inches longer than they should have been, I know this because I held them up to a pair I already had of the same style and size. The don't fit the same either, they are much tighter in the crotch and sit lower on my waist. It's hard enough with the styles and sizes available to find a pair that fit without having to check where they are made as other readers suggest. It also means buying online is no longer an option, sorry amazon.

review_title: Great jeans but off in sizes!!
review_body: So far so good all have fit the same! These are the best jeans for a 33-34 waiste but ass & thighs are big i guess from rugby playing days , but jeans are a hard fit without being a skinny tight fit butt looking like a huge muffin, but he'll being so exceptionally fit is hard(yea right)!! But if waist is good and thighs are thick along with rear end these 559 are the best!!!

review_title: It fits but once after you wash and dry it ...
review_body: It fits but once after you wash and dry it, look out. Some of the fabric will get on the jersey you're wearing underneath.
Adding another color to my collection and they are all great for the price.
I'm usually a Large size when it comes to shirts, and jackets, but this hoodie is way too small. I ended up givinf it away. Good quality, but size is wrong.

review_title: Good fit for young athletic men
review_body: This is a nice midweight hoodie. The color is beautiful. This is a little more fitted than I had expected. It is very suitable as shown for a young, athletic man. Unfortunately I bought it for my older disabled husband to wear over a sweatshirt. It will fit better when the weather warms and he will be wearing it over regular weight tee shirts.

review_title: not much heavier than a good t-shirt.
review_body: The weight of material was practically see through, not much heavier than a good t-shirt.. Too light for me, otherwise it seemed ok.,

I like it but I don't like snug fit, I like my clothing a little roomy and this was too small, I will be returning this. One tip if you don't like snug fits like me and like them a little big I recommend ordering a size or two bigger than you wear. I saw some reviews saying this runs bigger than normal but if anything it runs smaller than normal... It's really thin and feels cheap and can see through it when pointed towards the light. I returned it because it was "free" returns bit had to pay $14 for postal code. I only got like $3 back... Not Happy.

I love this zip up hoodie. I'm a female and I wear a 2X in tops and decided to go with 2X in this men's hoodie and it's perfect and slightly loose. I tried it on as soon as I got it and then I washed it I didn't notice any shrinkage. ❤️

review_title: An OK hoodie- If it's still fairly warm outside
review_body: Pretty good look, fit and construction - but much thinner than I hoped.  Probably would not keep you warm at temperatures below ~ 55F

review_title: The size was a perfect fit, bought him a small and he's 5'7 ...
review_body: Bought this sweater for my boyfriend as he's only allowed to wear red tops to his work and he loves it. We've had the sweater for several months now and it shows no signs of tear or stains, even though he works in a warehouse. The size was a perfect fit, bought him a small and he's 5'7 and 120 lbs. Good material, too!
Love these for the gym and running.  Won't buy anything else!

I've been wearing 550s for many years so I was concerned when I read the reviews complaining of deteriorating quality. I ordered 2. When they arrived I actually weighed them and a pair from years ago. They were identical. So at least in my case the fabric weight has not changed. They also feel the same. The only defect was a sticky zipper on one of the two pairs.

I have worn this style ever since they started making "relaxed" fit Levi's.  They feel comfortable from day one.  This pair feels - almost comfortable - There is something short about the back and when I bend over they pull at the waistband of my underwear.  Most annoying.  I'm pretty sure that these jeans are cut and sewn to the company's specifications but, as in all things assembled, slight differences occur.  I'm sure these are one of those pair whose pattern was cut slightly off and sewn slightly off, as well.  I will still wear them but they will not be "my favorite pair."

I was told Levi's make good jeans. Didn't know they made relaxed fit jeans. I normally wear 36-38 waist but in the winter when I wear thermals I want to be comfortable not tight so I wear 40 for extra comfort. The Levi's were perfect; even when bending, unlike some relaxed fit jeans. Would buy them again.😊

review_title: the stitching along the waistband is rough and itches
review_body: Thought I ordered 1 size to big, but these are 1 size to small, that's the problem when ordering clothes online, they fit but after washing they will be to tight

review_title: For Jeans, these are the best fit
review_body: Unless you are a kid and just gotta to have the clown-style baggy pants, these are the ones to buy. Even with large legs, these fit awesome. The black color holds for a long time if you wash them in "cold water" and "turn them inside-out, and leave them inside out in a cool/low temp dryer." Trust me, you'll be quite happy. I recommend this style...especially for us guys with larger thighs, but won't make us look sloppy and childish. These are made for mature, level-headed men. Remember...they are the "550s." NOT the 505s. God Bless!

review_title: all good. Saved a trip and the frustration of parking
review_body: After having these 2 months im not sure they are real Levis. The jeans ran tighter in the waist and keep shrinking more and more after every wash, and don't stretch back out. They were loose when new and now can barely be buttoned at the waist...and i have actually lost 8lbs!

review_title: What Ever Happened to Size Standards?
review_body: Levi's jeans still seem to be made with quality materials, and continue to be durable.  That's why I ordered this pair.  But after washing and wearing them for the first time, I realized that they're too short.  I already had two pair of the 31 x 32 550 Relaxed Fit Levi's which I had purchased from a local department store which fit well, so I thought I could purchase, sight unseen, another pair online.  I was wrong.  These Levi's are about 1/2 inch too short, even though the label says 31 x 32.  Why are there no size standards anymore?

review_title: These don't seem like the same 550s
review_body: I have been wearing 550s for years, and the style and fabric of these just seem different. They're too tight around the waist and lower abdomen, and the upper thigh area that usually is more roomy also feels tighter. I thought it might have been a fluke (or changes in my body,) but a second pair is the same. I checked the 550s I bought a year or so ago and they are definitely the same size and branding. The fabric on these also seems more...stretchy? They almost feel as though there is some nylon or polyester in them. Either way they're going back - I may have to look look for a different brand unfortunately.

review_title: they are a perfect and comfortable fit
review_body: A 28 inch inseam is very hard to find, and when I saw this, I had to get them and in typical Levi's fashion, they are a perfect and comfortable fit.

review_title: Good fit  with the Levi's Men's 550 Relaxed Fit Jean
review_body: The Levi's 550 Relaxed Fit Jeans. 2 pairs, arrived as expected, with good packaging and in new condition.  The fit was as expected the price was right. Happy with the purchase over all.
beware Amazon size charts are highly inaccurate

review_title: thick and shrinks, so plan for one size above.
review_body: thick and shrinks, so plan for one size above.
Slim fit, long tails. Heavy, but OK for spring. Well made.
Very good quality my husband like it fit perfect and worn it to put together his other new 6 ft tool table with all the room for his metric......!!!!!!
Pretty darn good. It's 75% cotton, 25% other. Makes for a good fit and a nice hang. Sleeves and body length are plenty long.
Kept me nice and warm during my trip to Middletown, NY this winter. Fantastic fit for me in XL (I am 5'7 and 220lbs)
Love it. I bought two by accident, but just gave one to my brother so we can be twinsies.
Product seemed to work well but was a little on the small side.

review_title: Love it. Cozy & not to warm.
review_body: Love it. So comfortable. Perfect fit.
Item arrived on time and as described.
UA never lets you down.  Great shirt for the gym or daily wear.

review_title: Perfect for travel, hiking or just around town
review_body: This is number 5 of these shirts that I have purchased recently. Perfect for travel, hiking or just around town. They roll up and disappear in a backpack and are one of the layers I depend on for wicking and comfort. Can't ask for more.
Rode my bike in it the other day, works fine.

review_title: Thought all underarmour heat gear were the same quality. ...
review_body: Thought all underarmour heat gear were the same quality.  This one is not exceptional material. Very thin and a bit uncomfortable.
The shirt is great for working out or using as an undershirt for those who work out in the field during the hot summer days
I would absolutely recommend these shirts.
Love Under Armour fabric, very comfortable.
Gift for my brother and he really likes it
still prefer these models over the new cotton type of shirts they are currently selling at their stores. The size is slightly smaller than the same type of shirt I bought before.

review_title: I've had this shirt for a while now, and ...
review_body: I've had this shirt for a while now, and I have no complaints. It fit as expected, and it works well when I'm working out at the gym.

review_title: Not good for big and tall guys.
review_body: If you're big and tall like me( 6'5" 260 lbs) you might not like these pants. I sure didn't. Sent them back the same day i received them. Got a refund.
Inseam was 1-1.5" longer than the equivalent Dockers. Reasonable quality for the price.
You can wear them for work or to dinner. Very good looking and comfortable.

review_title: Good casual pants at a terrific price.
review_body: Bought one pair, liked the quality and fit. At this price it's hard to go wrong.
Very comfortable khakis.  Glad I purchased them as I did (plus that $8.63 off my total order was very helpful)!
Good value. Fit was spot-on.  Color is more charcoal gray than black. Fades a little after a few washings, but nothing abnormal for cotton pants.
These pants are comfortable and look good. They came out of the dryer wrinkle-free.
Look great and fit perfect.  Looked nice right out of the package.  Didn't even need to iron them first.
these pants magnets for dust lint and pet hair

review_title: Material feels good and wears well
review_body: Waistband was a little wider than expected.  Material feels good and wears well.
Good fitting and comfortable. I like the stretch aspect even though it makes them a bit thinner. Measurement are off some as well, leg opening stated as 18' but more like 16' but fine overall.
My husband loves these jeans!  They are durable and he's been wearing them to work without issue...no rips or splitting at the seams.

Absolutely love them. I use to wear Levi's all the time in my teenage years and was a huge fan of the Silvertab brand. When I got older I also added a considerable amount of weight and the sizes available were limited to bigger sizes.  Now that I've been dieting and feeling great about my appearance I decided to go back to a nice pair of Levi's (still not a slim fit kinda guy) and these are very comfortable. I ordered the 33x32 which after wearing a few days feel great though I've broken them in enough that I need a belt now. Overall not baggy, nice fit and sit low on hips. Always worth the price.

Unlike all of the other 559 jeans, these are NOT loose around the lip. They are very stiff and do not budge, providing an uncomfortable feeling. The color is nice, I just wish they fit the same way the other 559 jean material does.

review_title: I am really sad to say
review_body: I am really sad to say, the quality of these levis' are not the same as you get at the store.  I thought for SURE I could trust ordering Levi's online and get the same quality.  The fabric of these jeans are very light compared to typical sturdy strong levi's denim.  Buyer beware.

review_title: My husband wears a 30 inch waist and has numerous ...
review_body: My husband wears a 30 inch waist and has numerous pairs of Levis with a 30 inch waist.  I ordered a 30 inch waist but no way is the product I received a 30 inch waist.  My husband did not lose weight (he has none to lose), the measurements are way off.  Be prepared for this when ordering - have a back up outfit ready for that big event in the event these don't fit.

review_title: Comfortable, durable, good looking - and the jeans are good too!
review_body: These are comfortable, stylish jeans (bear in mind I'm a middle-aged man!)

Don't fit like they used too! Laid a pair of jeans bought last year and never wore next to the new pair I just purchased, and they don't even come close to being the same size! The waist and leg opening is not even remotely close, These new jeans are basically relaxed skinny jeans! If I wanted skinny jeans I would have ordered them, I'm a full grown man, and skinny jeans are not for work, and Levis are not for me anymore! Thanks for the loyalty Levis!

review_title: Not baggy, not skinny. Just right.
review_body: Really like this fit. Been wearing Levi's athletic fit and the regular straight fit and wanted something a bit baggier for machine shop job. I was expecting too loose but these are perfect. Won't be getting any other fit than these in the future.

review_title: extremely disappointed in quality of material
review_body: Paper thin material,bluish  coloring patches heavy in areas,extremely  disappointed in quality of material . I would Not recommend  buying Levis without First trying them On and inspecting them.If Levi believes it's quality is being maintained their in for declining Sales.
It was a little larger then expected. It's not the thickest fabric, but for the cost and color choice, it'll do.
Despite the incredibly low price, it really does have good fabric and good stitching. Great value!

review_title: Quality product at a reasonable price
review_body: Exactly what you'd expect from Hanes. Medium weight, properly sized and comfortable with deep enough pockets to keep things from falling out. Looks good and perfect for most days. Not suited to coldest or hottest days but useful for everything in between.
What a great deal! The fit is right, zipper is strong, color is nice!

review_title: Great Sweatshirt at a Great Price
review_body: Holds up really well, just like a more expensive version.  Warm too.

This is a hooded sweatshirt just like the ones we used to wear when I was a kid.  I bought it for my father in law expecting it to be long enough to come down below his belt.  The back of the sweatshirt rode up above his belt line, and when I tugged on it thinking it was just not on straight it did not budge.  I would buy another but would get a size large.
I love these sweatshirts. They are light and comfortable and perfect for layering. Inexpensive yet well-made.

review_title: but its a great light weight jacket
review_body: Nothing that could be considered Fleece, and there is little insulation, but its a great light weight jacket.

review_title: Zipper quit. Only wore a few times.
review_body: After wearing only a few times the zipper won't zip. I'm very unhappy. This hoodie fit perfect and was comfy. But now it won't zip. Oh well

review_title: worst hoodie i have ever purchased. period.
review_body: i dont know how this hoodie got so many good reviews, but i have never seen a hoodie that was worse quality than this. the size medium i was sent literally didn't even reach down past my belly button and the sleeves stopped about two thirds of the way down. im only 5'9" and skinny. i swear im not a monster. they are practically doll sized. not sure if these are actually kids sizes or what because there were no tags or labels anywhere on it to even indicate what product it was. looked like it was already washed and used. absolutely would never purchase again. i cant believe amazon would actually sell someone something in such poor quality and condition.

I ordered these jeans for my son for Christmas.  We were not pleased with the color nor the size.  They were way to big in the back and thigh area.  I returned them to the seller and replaced them with the 559s, which were a much better fit!  If you like the really baggy thighs and bottom, then this style is for you, otherwise, I would look for a different style.

I have always worn these jeans, my last few pairs lasted years. The pair I bought in April has completely fallen apart, I wear them every day and wash once a week, they do not get dirty at my job that would increase deterioration. They are a lower quality product than they used to be.
Good ole Levi's - hard to find.

review_title: Fits nicely, although after wearing for one evening I was ...
review_body: Fits nicely, although after wearing for one evening I was disappointed to see a loose thread by the button hole - not the level of quality you'd expect from Levi's. Out of the package, the jeans felt a bit stiff and itchy.  I'd recommend washing before wearing.

review_title: Must remember to order a size larger.
review_body: I have a few pair of these jeans in 34x30 and they fit great.  When I got the first pair, they were much too small, they were the 569 relaxed straight leg.  So I decided to order the same 550 jeans that I have but in black and in 35x30 and they fit great.  Guess I will stick to 550 and 501's from now on.

I have worn Levi's for years. Recently I have worn the 560's but have lost a bit of weight and they were feeling too baggy. The 550 seems to take care of the problem, they felt great the first day I wore them..

review_title: ... (same size and model) and both fit and looked great. I nougth this one thinking that I would ...
review_body: I bought two of these (same size and model) and both fit and looked great. I nougth this one thinking that I would be just as good as those two. But I was very  disappointed when i could not closed it. Don't waste your money buying this jean. it will fit you small  despite being the same size and model.

Despite the recent news about not washing jeans for a year, I do wash mine after wearing.  They still last for years and don't shrink, thanks to sturdy material and good workmanship.  Thank goodness I can still buy the same style in a size that fit me just right.  Years ago I tried fashion jeans and other brands but never liked any as much as my Levi's.  This is one item I would hoard, if I caught wind they would be discontinued.

Unreal! I should send them back!! I just got them today...and went to fold them and as the light though the window was shining...the inseam all the way down from inside of the jean....you can see daylight...On Both Legs!!!  I cant believe Levi would put out this type of quality!!  I guess I'm in with a lot of other reviewers....Good By Levi's!  Quality is the thing of the past!!

I have always purchased Levis's brand because they were always dependable.  I purchased two pair and they were great.  Then I purchased another pair a month later from my previous order on Amazon and even though they were the same style and said they were the same size they were easily an inch and a half longer. From now on I only purchase clothes from local retailers and will no longer use Amazon.  I love Amazon but the constant returns are too frustrating./
It’s good and for $10 bucks you can’t ask for anything better. Nice thin weight like a t-shirt, fits well

Great shirt. Fits well, good quality, doesn't fade in the washer, but shrinks a tad-be mindful of that and maybe get a size up. One of the softest, most comfortable shirts I own. Definitely will buy again!
Good quality and Great fit.
Basically the right size, but torso was too small.  I am average size, but it would be better for young slim person.  Nice shirt and color otherwise.
It is a great shirt for my husband.
Nice shirt, color was cranberry not red, only reason 4. Needed red for a holiday theme.

review_title: This shirt is stylish and easy wash and wear.
review_body: I bought this shirt for my husband and he really liked it.  It washes up well, too.

Easy to wear henley. Not to tight and not too loose. Fits just right. I'm 5'9" with an average build and I feel really comfortable in this shirt. I liked it so much I bought a 2nd one. Nothing super fashionable or trendy about this shirt. Just a normal, everyday, goes with everything henley.
Husband loved it. Came back and got him another, as the price is right.

review_title: Great shirt, but the tag is a real pain in the waist.
review_body: Great shirt, but the tag is a real pain in the waist.
Great quality. The style is loose and not tight, which I think is great. True to size due to it being a loose.

review_title: and the excellent quality of material is exactly as we expected from ...
review_body: The Under Armour Tech short sleeve T-shirt was a gift to my son.  It fit him perfectly, he loves the color, and the excellent quality of material is exactly as we expected from Under Armour.
Under Armour makes the best stuff. I have 6 of these shirts. Very easy to use as a casual shirt since these shirts look nice and slick, especially the darker color shirts.
I got this as a gift 100% love it and a great price
Husband loves it! Fabric feels great too.

Wearing this shirt now as I make this review. It shows great form around my shoulders and possibly even makes me look stronger than I am. The shirt itself is very thin and cools well. Pretty handy if you live in Florida like me.

I bought this for my husband years ago and now this is the only type of shirt he'll wear to the gym. We have gotten them in all different colors. The material is great and perfect for working out. The fit was perfect on my husband who often has a hard time finding s***s that fit his muscular build. Not too tight and not too baggy. Perfect shirt!
You can never go wrong with Under Armour. Bought it as a gift for my husband and it fits perfect. Lightweight for summertime.
run a size or two smaller than advertised
Comfortable for running in hot weather

review_title: They look streaky and terrible. Not worth the money
review_body: I've had these for a few months now, and even following the washing instructions, the color just doesn't hold. They look streaky and terrible. Not worth the money.
Not very comfortable. I knew as soon as I tried them on that they were not the right fit, fabric or look I wanted.
They are absolutely not wrinkle free

review_title: It picks up lint very easily.
review_body: After few washes, it looks old and faded. It picks up lint very easily.

review_title: - sturdy and good quality - but buy a lint brush ...
review_body: They are o.k. - sturdy and good quality - but buy a lint brush off you plan on using these with a dress shirt.

Amazon had to backorder these slacks and it took a couple of months to fulfill my order but they meet all my expectations. They look sharp, feel comfortable, have a true fit , and are a great value at $20.
Runs alittle small

review_title: Best low priced chinos on Amazon, period
review_body: Great price and a nice fit. Material is thin (but not too thin), which helps keep you cool. Can't beat the low price. I own 7 pairs, and none arrived with any flaws.

review_title: The leg opening on the bottom is very wide and the pockets are a lot deeper than I would have liked. The waist size is okay and does match ...
review_body: These pants are more of a relaxed fit. The leg opening on the bottom is very wide and the pockets are a lot deeper than I would have liked. The waist size is okay and does match the size. These pants are just way too baggy for me, if it went for a straight fit with the pockets not so deep then I wouldn't mid but I would recommend looking for something else.
A little long in the legs but otherwise perfect.

review_title: Since staying with the default "Range" color fits and wears exactly like I want
review_body: I bought my first pair of these in 2010, apparently after the redesign others have had problems with. For me, they fit and wear well...at least the default color. The black pair I bought was too big. There is another design I bought that is too tight. I am unsure why Levi's can't synchronize their sizing. Since staying with the default "Range" color fits and wears exactly like I want.
I ended up sending these back since the denim was very thin. You might like this.  They might be nice for hot weather wear, but I am used to old school 100% cotton denim.

review_title: Quality not as expected from Levis
review_body: Have purchase same pants a few times. These Levi's are not same quality as from Levi store as the pants tear very easy in crotch area. I'm writing this review because today will be 3rd pair that I have to throw away after wearing 2-3 times.

review_title: Apparently each color is made with diff materials so if you like a color and fit
review_body: Got these for my bf since he had another pair same style diff color. This color is a bit different than the color he had, since they were lower in the waist area and a bit more snugg. Apparently each color is made with diff materials so if you like a color and fit, check the label and make sure the materials/composition is the same or you will get a diff fit.
Bought for a friend and they fit well and look good. No quality issues at all. These are original Levis and not some china knock off so buy with confidence.
T-Shirt thin material. I won't be using these as an everyday jeans because I'm afraid they will just rip. Will buy in person at a store from now on to get a more real world thickness denim

I like the 559s, but I don't like the stretch style.  I have several of the non-stretch and like them much better.  Will be returning these.  Also, I was told that Levi's are discontinuing the 559, and 569 will be the closest option.  Buy while they're available.
After a few washes the back label simply shredded in the washing machine. It's literally made of paper! You can just tear it off with your hand.
Levi's mens 559 32W x 30L is the best fit for my body type. Other Levi's and brands do not fit as well. Know what  jeans fits you before ordering.
These are not the same 559 jeans I purchased in a dept. store. The material is thin.The stitching  is not as expected. The price is the same as a big box store price. Overall I'm disappointed.
Needed a new daily hoodie to wear under a heavier coat so I ordered this product.  Have been wearing daily for months and it isn't showing any signs of wear yet!  Would definitely buy another one.

I purchased this jacket for my husband. We reside in Texas and the winters are weird here. He needed something to double up with his coat or wear alone in cool weather. My only complaint with this jacket is, it's really thin. This jacket is light weight and more for spring time or the beginning of fall. The shipping and packaging was great.
I have to buy a smaller size. The size chart said XL is 46-48" but it's actually 52" on the chest. VERY comfortable though. I'm happy with the product. Going to give my husband the XL and buy a L.

review_title: No loose fuzz, great hood depth
review_body: Great hoodie. The hood depth is good, which is always a big factor in hoodies. When the hood falls back repeatedly, I get annoyed so this one passes the test. The fleece is warm and doesn't fuzz off onto your clothes. Recommended!
Great price. A little thin but luckily for me I live in so cal and it doesn't really get cold compared to the most of the country.  I would recommend if looking for a 50° sweater.
I did not realize that Eco meant economy type weight - kind of cheap but it will work for the spring.

Nice lightweight fleece.  Great for cool weather or for layering when it gets cold.  I liked the first one so much I got a second.  Might even get a third.  A bit too large.  I need to exchange it for one size smaller.
Fit is almost perfect.  I prefer a bit past the waist for length.  This goes to the waist.  Very good sweatshirt.

review_title: Nice quality. Order a size bigger than you normally ...
review_body: Nice quality. Order a size bigger than you normally would - they're on the smaller size and will shrink after being washed.
I'm an average build, 5'6" and was looking for a baggy sweatshirt and this was perfect. It's very soft, your basic everyday zipup... will buy again :)

This pair of jeans was made in Mexico and ran somewhat small. My husband is losing some weight so hopefully they will not be so snug. He has been wearing the same style and size for as long as I have known him so not sure if they were stingy with the material but about 1/2 inch tighter than his Jeans that have been washed many times. If I returned then and went up a size it would be too big.  Go figure. I would call in next time to ask where they were made. The ones made in Nicaragua, Lesotho and Egypt were all true to size. I think Levi needs to move back to being made in the USA. All the jeans were bought on Amazon and you don't know until you get them delivered where they are from. Does anyone else think that is strange?  I may send these back but if I reorder I have no idea where they will be from. I say "strange".

review_title: sometime the leg seam is off and towards the front ...
review_body: sometime the leg seam is off  and towards the front instead of the side

review_title: Fit is good.  Denim quality is suffering
review_body: The denim is lightweight and thin.  Much lower quality than Levi's of the past.  I'm giving 3 stars because they are comfortable and fit correctly.  Be aware, they do wear out quickly, though.  Levi's should lower the price, if we have to buy them twice as often.  I guess it's time for me to start looking for another brand.

pants length was too long.  when I lay them next to my 29" length pants purchased last year they are exactly 1" too long.  So, it looks like they took the 30" length and sent it labeled as the 29" length.  the same for the second pair I purchased.

I have worn Levis 550 relaxed fit size 36x32 for the last 20 years and loved them. The last 2 pair I purchased was quite the let down, they are 2 3/4 inches smaller in the waist than they should be. I have not tried on a pair of jeans in I don't no how long so buying online is normally not a problem, I guess now it is. Levis is definitely not the same company it used to be, I believe its time to move on what a shame.

review_title: They are very comfortable and have held up well after months of use
review_body: Bought two of these. They are very comfortable and have held up well after months of use. Would rate a 5 but one end of one belt loop on one of the pairs dislodged from the waist band - I don't sew....
fabric is a noticeably more rough or coarse then the same Levi Blue jeans - making them less comfortable. I washed, dried, and wore them repeatedly - hasn't helped so far.

review_title: The pants would be great if they didn't smell of some very strong chemical ...
review_body: The pants would be great if they didn't smell of some very strong chemical odor.  I've washed them three times and now all of my other clothes have this odor too. Whatever dye they use in Bangladesh is hardcore!  I'm giving them two more washes and then sending them back if they don't stop funkin' up my place.
These fit well.  I was surprised to get them for the price I did.  No holes yet.  It's been almost a year.  Levis are no longer made in America.  But they still fit a wear well.

review_title: I don't even have to put these jeans on. ...
review_body: I don't even have to put these jeans on.  They are so chill and relaxed, they make my weekends and  TV series binge watching totally chillaxed.  Every now and then they even make popcorn.
I really liked this T-shirt .. very comfy ... I will buy this again and recommend this to buy...
Nice shirt..I think I purchased it a bit large..great price at that time.
What can I say?? This shirt is perfect! I love the color. I love the fit. Washing it just made it better. If it wears out, I'll order another same size & all. It's a wardrobe staple for me.
Smaller than expected and scratchy feeling. Not very comfortable shirt. I returned.

review_title: You could wear this on a hot day and it would be fine. I was hoping for something to wear on ...
review_body: The material in this is just too thin.  You could wear this on a hot day and it would be fine.  I was hoping for something to wear on a cool day, but no way with this.

review_title: He wears it often, very happy with this shirt.
review_body: Very nice shirt. Quality fabric and construction.

review_title: Going by their size chart go a min of 1 ...
review_body: Going by their size chart go a min of 1 size larger, probably 2 sizes allowing for shrinkage,  even washing in cold water.Made in pakistan
Fits as expected but it’s a little thin. Definitely won’t keep you warm.
$10 for a Hanes Henley?  I bought one because I thought it might not be great.
Thick fabric. Feels like it can handle some wear and tear. Good stuff
Sizing is definitely a little on the smaller side, but not enough that it needed to be returned.
Seams were incredibly irritating, get the nike competitor instead.
Beautiful shirt great fit, its a little see through no problem for me because i wear a compression shirt underneath but it could bother some people

review_title: They seem to change for the worse when you order the same shirt
review_body: The seams are irritating on the skin..  They seem to change for the worse when you order the same shirt.  The original one was great so I've tried to order it again several times.  Each T-Shirt has a different Country of Origin and different seams.
Pros:
I'm late to the party in buying Under Armour products.  I love these shirts.
Does what it was made to do, good value
This is my first UA shirt and I like it because it's not a tight "compression' style fit. the material is soft and comfortable. I use these as work undershirts and base layers for play.
Fits as expected and looks great on my husband

This is a high quality comfortable shirt. I'm using it exclusively for hiking. It is light weight, and dries fast. I've got my eye on other colors of the same shirt. I would definitely recommend this product for hiking.
This pants are without compare for the price and quality. Ordered one pair and was so impressed I ordered three more.
Fit's like it should, however they seem to fade fairly quickly after only 5 washes there is a noticeable difference in color.  Don't think these will make it 6 months in my wardrobe.

review_title: Goodbye to shopping for pants at department stores. You got me as a customer for life!
review_body: This is a great product! I love it. You got me as a customer for life. Great fit and outstanding value for your money.
Package arrived and tags had been removed as if a defective product or rejected batch. Never again.
Can't beat these for the price point.  May shrink.
A major misstep by Amazon, don’t buy not worth the money.
Look great and best value. Need a little touch up ironing out of the drier. I'll be getting more.
Great value for the $$!!
Tad long but doable.  Pretty amazed with these.  They are incredibly comfortable, nice color and well made.  I ordered them just to see how they would fit.  Now ordering more.
I have to say these pants are more comfortable than those $200ish pants I got from Zara or KC.

I have only purchased Levi 559 jeans for the past 10 years and have at least 15 pairs. I've loved just about every pair.. but this pair is unusually large. The legs are flared out and baggy but yet the quality of the material is very good. Mixed feelings on these.
I tend to have a problem finding anything in the right sizes...  I am 6'3" and 190 lbs, and tend to wear a 34x36 in pants or a Large Tall size for long sleeved shirts.
These are the perfect fit for my husband. He’s got a long waist and short legs for being 6’ tall. He wears a 38x30. They fit great in the seat, not baggy but not too slender on the leg either.

The denim fits nicely, however, due to my previous experience being with the 505 brand, I found the cloth to be a tad thinner than I expected.  I am sure I will get used to it...though my next one will be a 505.  Also, the faded part appeared to be more faded than what you see in the picture.  I just hope it doesn't fade any further.  I attire conservatively. The comfort factor, though, makes these denims a winner. They are a lot more comfortable than the thicker cloth denims I have worn till now.

review_title: One gripe!!! Hugs ass too definitively because of how it sits below the hip!
review_body: However, these pants are a nice step up from jeans but not too dressy like regular slacks/pleated slacks, These pants are designed like denim jeans but are twill.
