This design makes these pants less dressy but casual enough to wear daily in place of jeans which is cool. These are the only type of twill pants that I've came across that are designed like jeans, so they seem kind of uncommon in stores but they'd be a staple wardrobe addition.

Product is not the same as the 559 jeans purchased in the store. An unusual stretch denim which is not characteristic of Levi's. Believe these may be a knockoff masquerading as Levi's. Displeased with fit and material. Would not purchase this item via Amazon in the future.
The BEST place to buy 550's! These are exactly what you expect Levi's to be. These are not knock offs! I've ordered 3x over several years, and never disappointed.

review_title: A pair of jeans that fit just right
review_body: You know I like my chicken fried

I have been buying levi 559 in 40x32 forever. I large thighs for years of running and biking and so I buy jeans that fit my legs without making have to wear "baggy," I normally buy online because I rarely can find my sizes and any department store. I ordered three pair of these jeans to replace my old 559's, and for the most part they fit well, of the three fades I ordered this fade "Wellington" was a tad baggy and much longer than the other two fades that fit perfect.

review_title: Bad quality. The crotch is unraveling
review_body: Bad quality. The crotch is unraveling. These are either knockoffs or Levis have gone down in quality. Disposable clothing.
Good quality for the price. The jacket is exactly what I was looking for. It has a zipper in the front with the two Side Pockets. I also like the fleece inside.
The material is a little thinner than I expected but will work.  Excellent value and fast shipping.
Kept me warm all winter... The wife sets the thermostat a little low for my comfort.
Hate the small size and the fabric.

review_title: I really like the color but it did shrink a good amount ...
review_body: I really like the color but it did shrink a good amount after I did dry it so now it fits a lot better

review_title: I got a large and I am 5'10 170 and it fits perfect. Was debating to get a medium but I ...
review_body: Your typical zip up hoodie, its thin lined with a soft fleece. I got a large and I am 5'10 170 and it fits perfect. Was debating to get a medium but I am glad that I didnt. Great hoodie!
It's a good jacket; fabric is nice and soft. I'm quite tall (5'9, 160lbs) and the large fit me comfortably, but wasn't as big and cosy as I expected it to be.
Fit perfectly. Arrived in perfect condition. Great for chilly mornings/nights.

review_title: Great item at a great price
review_body: My husband loves these. This is our third time we have purchased it.

review_title: Runs way too wide and poofs out
review_body: Comfortable but way to wide and baggy. I’m not a slim guy by any means and like a little bit extra material so it’s not too tight, but this is wide enough to fit at least one size bigger, if not two sizes wider. Gave it to a friend who thought it was great (he normally wears an xl)

Been wearing levis for 31 years. First the 501's and the last 15 years I have been wearing the 550's.  It has always been a crap shoot as far as size goes.  As always with Levis you can buy three pairs the exact same size and get 3 pairs that all fit differently.  39.99 seems to always be about the going price either on Amazon or on sale at a local dept store.  My last two pairs I purchased on Amazon fit quite well so this rating gets 5 stars.  I currently have another pair of 32 x 32's that are so tight they are uncomfortable.  I miss the old days when they were made in the U.S. and were better and more affordable.  Now they come from a multitude of foreign countries which I'm sure adds to the inconsistency in size.  I'm not sure how they size them now but back when I wore 31 x 34's in the 501's I always wanted a size 31 x 35 and they didn't make them.  Having pants show up on my door step in two days rather than going to the store is quite cool though.

My friend was so happy to get his favorite Levi 550s.  He is a senior and does not walk very far.  He ordered 2 pairs, and loved them so much that he ordered 3 more. Except that the jeans cost $8 more the second time. He ordered them anyway since everybody was selling them for $39 last week.  He was so pleased that he wanted to order some for his brother too.  Well, this works for guys who are loyal to a style. I am glad I signed up for Prime.
I purchased two pair and one pair tore out beside the zipper. Not fixable. Thinking the price was good, because they are seconds....live and learn

I like this style, but they have a problem they could fix easily.  The belt loops on either side eventually come loose because they are not sewed through a pocket or something that gives multiple thicknesses of material.  Some of their other styles do this.
Even with the free shipping from Amazon, it shipped on the same day and arrived on the next day. I was very surprised. I was expecting 5-6 business days but it got here the next day!!
I would like to return these.Not true to size.
I didn't realize "relaxed fit" meant "baggy". Otherwise, these are the same high-quality jeans you've always loved.

review_title: but sad that the same model
review_body: Not sure what Levi quality control is today! I have a pair of the exact same pants, same size, purchased 9 months ago (though I think may have had a different country of origin). That pair fit loose, and I had to shorten them. This pair is 1-2 inches smaller in waist (very snug), 1 inch shorter (no need to shorten) and has 5 belt loops instead of 7. I'm used to differences between brands and models within brands...but sad that the same model, same size of the same brand can fit so different!

I should have returned these jeans for a refund. I am convinced they sell stuff here that are rejects. The label said 32 waist and it was CLEARLY NOT a 32. More like a 28 or smaller. If not for the hassle I would have returned them but I threw them in the trash instead. Never will I order clothes on line again. Not via Amazon anyway. And not jeans.
I haven't worn Levi's for a long time, and I decided to give the 550's a shot.  I am very pleased and will

review_title: Barely any shrinkage; held shape well...
review_body: Held shape after washing. Still fits suitably. Would buy again.
I am 170cm 62kg, it is a little too large for me.
You got a love it for nine bucks
Great quality shirt!
At even twice this price, you'll this shirt! Soft, beefy fabric, nicely detailed, comfy fit (not at all snug). A no-brainier pair up with a good jacket for a casual night on the town.

review_title: Great feel,fits great,have ordered another one.Al Richard
review_body: Just received top nice material, fit great have ordered another one,very pleased.Al Richard
Excellent product and service!  Thank you!!
I had bought this in multiple different styles but the same shirt these. This particular one fits very baggy compare to the two tone that fits perfect.
Nice quality, fits well, soft and thick material.  Seems like it will last a while.  When the price comes back down I expect I will order another.
This product is rather larger than I expected

review_title: Same as found in stores, just cheaper
review_body: Under armor shirt.  What more to say.

review_title: Not a real pretty shirt in my eyes
review_body: Bought as a Christmas present for my husband, he loves it.  Launders well, dries quickly and does not snag.  Not a real pretty shirt in my eyes, but he likes it fine.

review_title: Great shirt from UA and fits athletic men no problem
review_body: I love these UA shirts, they fit well and are not too long or to tight. I'm 5'11 and this shirt fits perfectly in a large and holds up to high intensity training. Looks good, feels good, love UA.
This item came as expected and as was described.

review_title: I am normally a 2XL and these fit great.
review_body: UA has started making all of their clothes in European sizes!?!?!?

review_title: Great fit for us big guys
review_body: I really like Under Armour shirts. They fit just a bit better than other well known brands and last longer. I'm tall 6'6" and weigh 230...the XXL shirts fit me perfectly.

Love these shirts, light and airy.  Bought three other colors at the same time, and have since bought 5 more. The shirts are great for working out in, or to wear out. I will be buying more colors when my sizes are available.
Fits great. XL I have athletic build with 17.5" arms and this is not too tight.
These fit well, but not very comfortable. Feel pretty rough. And stiching under the arms is bothersome when working out.

Love these shirts, light and airy.  Bought three other colors at the same time, and have since bought 5 more. The shirts are great for working out in, or to wear out. I will be buying more colors when my sizes are available.
I was worried about the quality.  No need to worry.  Better than expected all the way around.  At this price, and quality I'm no longer buying my pants from the brick and mortar.
Returned, black was more charcoal/gray, easy return!
attracts hair like a magnate. I have to use a lint roller and go through several sheet.
Slacks were a little long and I thought the quality wasn't as good as LLBean's slacks

review_title: Being able to buy the exact waist and length is really nice.
review_body: Good for the price and the fit was as expected.  I really like buying the exact waist size that I need.  Would buy again.
Great, basic pair of slacks. Fit well and was a great price.
Nice quality and fit. I am super impressed with the quality for the price.

review_title: Very nice pants for the 20 dollar price
review_body: Very nice pants for the 20 dollar price, a little thicker then I was expecting but that is also kind of nice
Definitely worth the 20 bucks. I would definitely buy again.
a bit baggy, seems to be more of a "traditional" style pant

The waist seems a size or two larger than it should be. On top of that the material is thin and the waistband seems to be made of elastic material. The color I received matched the product image but the fading on the product picture is non existent in what I received. I could understand the fading looking different but not completely gone. Also the stitching is also a different. They are made in Columbia if anyone is interested.

review_title: Watch out for the size and length. I got ...
review_body: Watch out for the size and length.  I got 30x30, but somehow i got 30x29.  I couldn't return since I've washed and worn it.  Never buy again! 1/2 star for it ! :(

Good pants. Fit as expected. Would buy again. Wish they were made in the USA, seems wrong to have an iconic name like Levi being made overseas. I guess that's what keeps the costs down and profits high.

review_title: Beltloops pull right out.  I would recommend passing on these.
review_body: I am a longtime Levi's fan...and incredibly disappointed.  I purchased three pairs of these 559 Levi's in different colors.Two of the three fit exactly as expected, the gray was too large, but I didn't mind that too bad.  This isn't the problem however.  In two out of the three jeans I purchased, the belt loops pulled right out in the first wear, within the first few hours.  The third pair did the same thing in the second wear.  It is incredibly frustrating, I am not even sure Levi's still has the guarantee, I will be looking into that next.  Even if they do, it is a huge hassle to go through this process, and I will need to purchase new jeans to wear in the meantime (will not be Levi's). Longtime Levi fan, very disappointed and will not be buying Levi's (especially online) again if this is the new level of quality to expect.

I really like Levi's 559 because they're not too tight and not too baggy.  They fit just right.  Most jeans these days are either skinny jeans (for the Emo kids) or baggy jeans.  Not these.  They are straight but not tight.  Loose enough to give your junk some room to breathe, but not baggy.  I already owned 1 pair that I bought locally, so I ordered 2 more (in different colors/shades) on Amazon.  I am very pleased.  The size is right and the fit is great.  Plus Levi's are really durable in my experience.

review_title: Fantastic jeans for the big guy!
review_body: Let me start of by prefacing this with the fact that I just lost 80 lbs with a high protein diet.  So finding cheap, well fitting clothes is just a huge pain as it was 80 lbs ago.  These jeans fit the bill perfectly, they sit at the hip, which I wasn't fond of at first, but as long as you have longer shirts, your crack shouldn't hang out for too long.  The color I got Midnight Oil, is fairly good and doesn't seem to bleed after a few washes.
These are very comfortable and flexible pants. The lip at the top does not dig in and is not stiff.

review_title: We ordered these for my son and he loved the feel of them
review_body: We ordered these for my son and he loved the feel of them. They are somewhat thinner than most jeans. With that being said, after his 3rd time wearing them he was walking down the stairs at school and they split down the inner leg seam from crotch to knee. When we logged in and tried to send them back it was 1 day after the possible return date. Please don't waste your money on these jeans. They are not well made and they only give you about 3 weeks to return them.
Update: I previously was disappointed by the siding of this cut and color. However I (accidentally) ordered a new pair and it is just how I hoped it would be.

review_title: My favorite cut and color for the hubby!
review_body: I bought these as a gift for my husband because this is my favorite fit on him.  The darker color is nice and bit dressier.  Levi's are still made extremely well and last for a long time - these new ones were bought to replace ones that he has had FOR YEARS.
Warm but a little big but my laundry lady can try to shrink it. She's good at it. Lol.

review_title: maybe fits a hair small. I am 5' 2" ...
review_body: maybe fits a hair small. I am 5' 2", 106 lbs and the small fits well, not overly big on.

review_title: I bought this because I kept taking my husband's. ...
review_body: I bought this because I kept taking my husband's.  It was time for me to have one of my own.

review_title: Great hoodie. My teen son loves it
review_body: Great hoodie.  My teen son loves it.

review_title: comfortable and the price was awesome
review_body: I'm on a tiiight budget, this hoodie is warm, comfortable and the price was awesome
We got this for my 15 year old son, who has to wear a uniform to school. He's 6'5 and linebacker size. This was good quality, he can wear it every day, the 3XL fit his arms. So shrinking.

review_title: DA PeRfEcT H00DIE F0R BoTh SUmmEr AnD WinTeR!!!!
review_body: Ok let me StaRt 0f by Saying....

review_title: great product for a great price
review_body: This was great for the price, was just a tiny bit loose but was fine as that was the fit I prefer.
I'm 6 foot and 190 and an XL fits just right'

review_title: great hoodie! My son uses it frequently and it ...
review_body: great hoodie!  My son uses it frequently and it holds up nicely.
Being short, I thought I'd have to have the 29" inseam--the shortest available--taken up.  That proved unnecessary, saving my $10-$12.  Otherwise, they are well made and comfortable.

To my surprise, the jeans were too small.  I ordered 34" waist as my other jeans and when I tried them brand new from the box there were at least 2 sizes small!!  Also, the material is quite stiff/hard.  I washed them expecting to loose a little (believe it or not jeans do stretch once washed) and the jeans shrink significantly one more size.  This is horrible.  If you buy these jeans online, order waist 2 sizes up.

Shipping/delivery was great, price was good, but for some reason they only use 5 belt loops for a 36" waist (minus one star).  They have also changed the stitching along the waist, which now feels like a hack saw blade (minus one star).  Tucking in a shirt protects skin from the rough stitching, but even a minute of skin contact against the brand new jeans will cause skin damage.

The exact product expected, same fit & style, my husband has been wearing this style for years. However, we were VERY overwhelmed by the extremely strong chemical smell of the fabric even after washing with vinegar twice. Left them on the porch outside for several days in hopes that the smell would dissipate, it has lessened but lingers. Never have had this problem with these jeans before &, in my opinion, treatment with such strong chemicals really is not necessary.

review_title: Didn't fit the same as previously-bought jeans.
review_body: I ordered these based upon the fact that I was wearing jeans of the exact same manufacturer, style, waist, and length.  Took the tags off to hang them (like an idiot).  Went to put them on, and they were WAY to small.  So weird since they were the exact same everything..... Now I have two useless pairs of jeans I wasted money on.

review_title: Great Levi's In Almost Every Size = Happy Dad!
review_body: My Dad is the classic Levi kind of guy.  He loved working on cars, home-remodeling, tinkering on things in the garage, etc.  Now, at 92, while he doesn't stay so busy, he still prefers Levi's to wear.  I noticed that every single pair he had were so worn out but he refused to let me recycle them and continued to wear them, even though he had practically new pants made by other manufacturers.  Finally, I decided to go shopping and pick up a couple new pairs of Levi's for him.  He has an unusual size so it wasn't easy to find in stores and I was shocked by the prices!  I thought about Amazon but due to his unique size, dismissed that as too good to be true.  Then, a couple months later while shopping for another item, I noticed a sale on Levi's men's jeans.  When I saw the size my Dad wears ON SALE, I was thrilled.  I just wish I had a picture of my Dad's face when he opened the package!!  The fit was great, the fabric was the same hearty quality but the price was about half that seen everywhere else.

review_title: Fit as expected. But would have preferred pockets with ...
review_body: Fit as expected.  But would have preferred pockets with more of a vertical opening instead of pure horizontal. Pockets are deep.  Does tend to bunch up over the pocket-hip area, making it uncomfortable.
Nice color. Hoping that the belt loops don't tear out on these like they did on the last 2 pair. This was my husband's favorite way to buy clothes. Hates to go shopping.

review_title: Too small. Sent back I couldn't imagine after washing ...
review_body: Too small. Sent back I couldn't imagine after washing once what I would have for a fit. Material is too thin. No longer made in US. Made in Mexico.
Product is great but the zipper doesn't work.  My husband put these levi's back and didn't try them on.  Now we can't return them/  Bummer.  Usually Amazon is good about products but this one bombed.
Beautiful color.
a little larger than normal. overall good shirt
Got one for my son

review_title: fit was a little large but that's what I wanted ...
review_body: fit was a little large but that's what I wanted so when I wash them It will be the right size. Shirts are just want wanted to bowl in because the ally is to cold for short sleves

review_title: Basically, a tee shirt with long sleeves and a ...
review_body: Basically, a tee shirt with long sleeves and a button neck. What else could it be when it says 'Hanes'? ...
My husband loves the shirt. Yes it's too big right now but being 100% cotton, he'll still be able to wear it perfectly after it's washed! Colors are beautiful!!

review_title: Guess I'd be better off with medium and then putting it in a ...
review_body: Medium was a tad roomy, so small was ordered.  But, the small is a bit snug.  Guess I'd be better off with medium and then putting it in a hot dryer to purposely shrink.
Love the color and comfort but defiantly order a size bigger as they run small
Washes well and comes out soft.  No pilling.  Order up a size is my opinion.
nice fit easy to care for .
Wasn't what I expected but I like the shirt for heat gear.

Despite a number of comments about size problems and complexity of Under Armour's system, this fits me well.  It has been a very cool, comfortable and low odor shirt for long bike rides and hikes.  Washes and dries well, even being not quite so gentle as instructed by manufacturer.  Bright color attractive and good for safety.  Too soon to judge durability.

review_title: I'm a bigger guy so large normally can be too ...
review_body: I'm a bigger guy so large normally can be too loose while medium is actually to short. These are right on, and the material is incredible.
One of my favorite shirts for working out wicks away moisture and feels comfortable against my skin. Looks great and it's expensive but worth it. High quality shirt
Great shirt.  Very comfortable.  I’m a fan of pretty much anything by Underarmour.
Husband loves it for working outside and boating.

review_title: fit runs to big the medium fit is a large ...
review_body: fit runs to big
Exactly the kind of quality I would expect. It is "Loose" fit, which wasn't clear when I ordered it, but I like the way it feels.
Shirt fit great until first wash in cold water.  Shrunk about 2 sizes.

I love these shirts.  They are all I ever wear now.  They are ideal for the hot summer months where comfort can be an issue with thick cotton T Shirts.  They can be hung up to dry very quickly.  The only issue with wearing T Shirts like this is that once you get use to the comfortable and soft feel you won't be able to go back to wearing cotton T shirts.  The cotton t shirts will feel like a sweatshirt after getting used to UA Tech.
wished they had more "stretch" otherwise nice fit
I was pleasantly surprised that these are very nice pants. Will purchase these again.

review_title: These are great! Looking forward to purchasing a few more
review_body: These are great!  Looking forward to purchasing a few more.
These do not wash well and are massive lint collectors. I have to wash these on their own. I really dislike the material.

review_title: Extremely hard to get the wrinkles out of these pants ...
review_body: Extremely hard to get the wrinkles out of these pants. They fit well but the pants overall are lacking. If your shoe makes any contact with the pants when you cross your legs you will find yourself in need of constant “leg brushing”.
Decent enough, and price was very acceptable. 3.5 Stars.
too baggy below, and ran small in the waist for me. returned.
These pants attract quite a lot of lint, but otherwise are pretty good.

review_title: Good quality like a more expensive brand.
review_body: These fit well. They are soft and confortable and need no ironing.

review_title: Wouldn't recommend. Spend the extra $20 and get something worthwhile
review_body: Length was too short. Material was cheap and uncomfortable.  Wouldn't recommend. Spend the extra $20 and get something worthwhile.

Levi's fan for life! I bought these for my brother and they're his new fav...bought the 559 style 34x30 and he's been gaining a little weight so he was super excited to find that they material has a some stretch to it so he can relax. My parents bought him the same 559 34x30 style at JCPenneys without stretch in them but those fit him well too. Material feels durable as usual.
I bought these for my boyfriend and he loves them. They fit perfectly and they were both affordable and legit. So I recommend.

The fit was as expected, the price was just ok but the shipping took like 2 weeks!! I received 2 desks and a headboard before these jeans came in!  That is why I only gave 3 stars.  I will never order jeans off the internet again!

review_title: Great pants to wear when doing laundry
review_body: They look different from the picture.  The material is stretchy and pants fit a bit large.  I only wear these pants when I do laundry and have nothing else to where.  They remind me of old-man pants, something just off about the material.  I thought the material would look more like a rustic cotton gray but they are more like polyester stretchy slight shine and half cotton jeans.  I hate them.

review_title: Good jeans, go with the picture and not the color code
review_body: The jeans I received were of the good "Made in Mexico" variety. Though the color code on my old pair of 559's was different than the code on this pair, they are still made and fit the same way as my old pair - which is excellent.  Overall I am satisfied with these and will continue to wear them.

review_title: Love that Levis recognizes may be big OR tall
review_body: My husband's "go to" for jeans.  At 6'5" with a 34 inch waist it is hard to find appropriately fitting jeans. Most brands mean it when they say big AND tall.  Hard to find one or the other.  Love that Levis recognizes may be big OR tall. These jeans hold up great and continue to look nice wash after wash.

review_title: Hard to get the right fit!
review_body: I'm having such a tough time getting the right size in these Navarro stretch jeans. A 36x32 is way too big in the waist but fine in the length and a 34x32 is a little tight in the waist and short on the length. Go figure. I guess I need a 35x33. Good luck finding that! At least Amazon has free returns.

review_title: Great deal, great quality. A must have for your casual wardrobe
review_body: Great variety of washes and size choices. They are the only jeans my 17 year old wears. He says they are super comfortable and I frequently find him sleeping in them! They are a great quality of denim, compared to jeans I bought him at Old Navy and Wal-Mart, these last way longer. They look great, he has a style he always wears, which is plain T-shirts with hoodies and pumas, and the different washes make his outfits really pop. We will continue to buy these and we recommend them to others.
OOP's.... Thought I'd try Lee's, now that was a mistake, they were made stretchy, like yoga pants.

review_title: They do not look or feel like genuine Levi's jeans
review_body: These jeans appear to be some kind of counterfeit garment.
So far, so good.  I have only worn it twice and it fits the bill (and my build) just fine.  Seems well made and of excellent quality for the modest price.
Its really comfy and is as basic as a hoodie zip up needs to be. Its simple and I like it for the price. Good buy for me.

It's a VERY BASIC hoodie.  Color is very plain, but is priced to be a basic one.  Feels warm, good for under a coat in a midwestern winter.  Priced really cheap!  I wear a Large shirt, and should have bought a Large hoodie, but I got XL.

I got this at a spectacular price, I got a larger size so it would fit me loosely but I never would have guessed how comfy this thing is. It is relatively thin so if you are looking for something to keep you warm in 30 degree weather this may not cut it. However it is light enough to move around in comfortably and the inside lining is soft. My friends keep taking it when i'm not looking, it is definitely a great buy and I will be purchasing more of these.

review_title: Fit as expect. It's an all-black hoodie. The ...
review_body: Fit as expect. It's an all-black hoodie. The zipper is silver metal, which is hard to see in the picture - so if you're looking for a 100% black hoodie, you may need to replace the zipper.

review_title: Good for wearing to the gym or staying cozy inside
review_body: Good for wearing to the gym or staying cozy inside. Not gonna keep you warm on a cold day outside (thinner material).

It's nice and light weight perfect for use in my office. It's definitely more of a cool weather hoodie because of how thin it is. Zipper is really nice and works smoothly. It's Hanes so you get what you pay for, don't expect anything too amazing.
Can't go wrong with goodies for my kids!  This was a hit.  Comfortable and fits well!

review_title: Try on before you wash it.
review_body: It fits ok, but is a little snug. I didn't try it on before I washed it, so it may have shrunk a bit in the dryer (medium setting).  Worn with a t-shirt its fine, but probably won't work over a sweater.

I bought this for my brother. He wanted a hoodie to wear in rehab where he is now because of losing a leg, I was feeling under the weather and didn’t want to go shopping. So I went to my favorite place and had it in 24 hours.

review_title: Gives just enough stretch to feels comfortable.
review_body: Bought same pants, same size, the black was tighter in waist...bought a waist extender button. Gives just enough stretch to feel comfortable.

I was a little worried after reading all of the negative reviews.  I was half-expecting to receive paper-thin pants with holes and missing belt loops.  But these seem to be just like the ones I've bought in stores for years.  They're rugged (so far) and they don't seem like factory rejects.  I'm not sure where these 550s came from since Levis doesn't make them any more, but I'm happy.

review_title: The size I got is what I normally get, but...
review_body: The size I got is what I normally get, but the waist was rather small compared to what I'm used too and the length was longer

I ordered these jeans when my husband's previous ones began to get frayed at the hem.  Levis never disappoints! They are a quality brand. My spouse says that the pants fit well, are comfortable and I think they look great on him.  I've laundered them several times and the color hasn't faded.  In the past, the washing directions stated, " wash in hot water, " but now it suggests cold.  I think this is a good change, because clothes laundered in cold water seem to last longer.

review_title: Great for People With No Rear End
review_body: The problem wasn't in the waist or legs, they have ample room,  but in the backside.  It seems these Levi's were made for someone that was in a terrible accident and had their buttocks completed cut off.  I own several pairs of this style of Levi's jeans and all but this pair fit perfectly, but these are very tight at the top of the rear.  If I wasn't an old man and most of my rear end hadn't already disapeared, I would not be able to zip them.
Great for price, size and quality. Unfortunately the good life has caught a with me and I needed to go up a size in the waist. Perfect fit for me.

review_title: We order one pair to see if he would like this style and if so we would order more
review_body: My husband is not a shopper but needed new jeans.  We decided to look online and Amazon was my go to.  We order one pair to see if he would like this style and if so we would order more.  They arrived timely with 2 day Prime.  Fit like a glove and we ordered 2 more pair and they are also a perfect fit.  Easiest shopping ever.
The only jeans my husband will wear.  He loves them!

Levi's quality control must have really gone down hill thru the years. After the first wash, I noticed a small hole had developed at the top seam of the back right pocket. Today, after the third or fourth wear, i find that there is a rip right along the same back pocket (no, I didn't "catch" on anything moving around today).

review_title: Wash and dry them and you better be ready to SQUEEZE into them at an about ...
review_body: Very frustrating where Levis mens wear is concerned. After reading other reviews, and from my experience with my most recent order, if you are a 38 waist don't order that size from Levis. Wash and dry them and you better be ready to SQUEEZE into them at an about 36" waist. 36" length shrink to about 33".

review_title: It is a great pj top
review_body: This is my second one of these. It is a great pj top. Love it

review_title: The material is soft and sturdy, and the fit is perfect
review_body: Bought this for my husband for his birthday.  The material is soft and sturdy, and the fit is perfect.  He loves it!

review_title: Left sleeve is 2 inches longer than the right sleeve
review_body: Defective - one sleeve is 2 inches longer than the other.

review_title: Fits well and feels great. Very comfortable
review_body: Fits well and feels great. Very comfortable. I like Henley's so I don't have that tightness around my neck. Nice shirt
have to admit i purchased this for one reason an that would be the color. fits well, lightweight, cool, and versatile!
I bought this for my grandson it fit him perfectly. It was delivered on time.
soft comfy lounge wear ,, perfect thing for long winter naps .
Nice looking shirt and fits perfect and fast shipping!

review_title: Great Shirts! The cuffs stay tight and the elastic ...
review_body: Great Shirts! The cuffs stay tight and the elastic in them does not seem to stretch or wear out.I own five of these shirts in different colors. They are great!
Love the solid red, one of my favs I bought..
Very comfortable and cooling and does pull the sweat away from you

This is my go to exercise shirt.  It keeps me cool and comfortable even when I am covered in sweat! It does a great job of whisking moisture and dispersing it throughout the material.  I would highly recommend for outdoor activity, or at the gym.  This is a polypropylene product and should be kept away from open flames and fire.

review_title: Yes, you can get this in TALL!
review_body: My husband has a HARD time finding anything in tall sizes, but we hit the jackpot here! GREAT quality shirt in the perfect size - exactly what you'd expect from Under Armour. Worth the money!
I got an XL and for some reason it is shorter than all my other UA XL polos & shirts. Im 6'4" so after one wash it's too short for me.

review_title: Four years later and still great!
review_body: I bought this for my husband four years ago and he still wears it all the time for working out! He wears a medium in pretty much all shirts and the medium fit perfectly. Definitely recommend.
Just a little tight for the size L

This shirt is GREAT.  I am a big guy and this shirt feels like it is a custom fit.  It does not retain body heat at all, in fact it feels so cool comfortable, does not cling at all.  You will be glad you bought one.
Fit perfect and so affordable. I love this shirt
Great shirt. Fit as expected to
Really nice with a good price!
DH loved them surprisingly as he only wears name brand. Seems well made. True to color
fit was perfect. Nice looking pants for a good price.

review_title: Not sure which pair this is for, because I ...
review_body: Not sure which pair this is for, because I ordered 2,  but I ordered a 29 inch waist and was sent a 34. Very irritated since there was no time to return because of the event.

review_title: which is a shame ‘cuz I did like the fee
review_body: Alas I must say this product is lacking, lint and hair are always attacking. The fabric it seems a lint magnet to be, which is a shame ‘cuz I did like the fee.
Great fit, great quality... exactly what I was looking for !
The fit is fine. But as others have mentioned it attracts a lot of lint. Can't wear this for a executive meeting.
Nothing to get too excited about.  Fabric seems cheap and may not last very long but, they are work pants so, for the money, they work.
nice quality and perfect fit for my husband. he loves them for work and you absolutely cannot beat the price! I have bought him 3 pairs and will be buying more in the future

review_title: Horrible fit. Did survive one washing
review_body: Horrible fit. Did survive one washing. Very disappointed. I wish that I had saved the packaging so that I could return these pants. Do yourself a favor - go to Old Navy and get their Khakis there.
Fits a little tight around my quads, but othrewise good.

Levi's used to be those jeans that were too expensive to buy. I used to buy mine from Gap until i noticed they sell theirs at about or more expensive then Levi's. Screw that. Now I buy Levi's. I bought my first pair from a department store and notices more color/finishes were available on Amazon. I ordered a pair and they fit shorter then my first pair. The waist was also different, tighter on the pair i bought at the department store. As long as Amazon allows free returns and exchanges I'll continue to puchase my jeans online from Levi's.... who's known for inconsistent sizes.
Had been looking to replace an old pair. Not exactly the same cut and material (stretch), but these are the closest things to it. Good job.
These rock.  They are perfectly sized to shrink perfectly and fit like they are tailored for you.  Soft without being flimsy, holdup well and look great.  I could not be more pleased with these.

My husband has had a pair of these pants for several years.  They were really looking worn.  We were unable to find them in any store!  Thankfully amazon.com was able to help us!  I ordered one pair to make sure they would work.  After he wore that pair to work and church a few times he decided he wanted me to order another pair for back up!  They fit true to size.  Material is soft, lighter weight than jeans with the look of jeans, and he has room to move.

review_title: My husband loves these jeans - they are looser in ...
review_body: My husband loves these jeans - they are looser in the thighs which he needs as his legs are very muscular. His butt looks cute in them too!

These are great jeans. Some of the colors aren't that great and with different colors also comes different denim altogether. I wouldn't recommend trying new colors as they are not consistent with others. The indie blue feels like denim infused with spandex. Gave them to good will.
These jeans are now my favorite. They are soft and durable. They are so comfortable and fit great. I ordered another pair. Very happy that I ordered these.

review_title: Do Not buy these. It's the Old Thick jeans from a decade ago, not the new soft cotton...
review_body: It's the old thick material & NOT what you see in stores now. It's the old thick stuff that shrinks 2" in length when washed (not like the new soft cotton) that actually get an inch longer when you wash-stick to j c penny and see what your buying. I got ripped off by an old close-out. I do Not recommend these. I regret falling for this old trick of bait and switch.
My favorite style of jeans.  Sits on hips so doesn't squeeze my not-so-flat tummy. The slight stretch in the fabric allows for easier movement and so these are comfy right out of the box.
My husband loves the Levi’s 559 they fit him relaxed and well. The color is very nice as well. Will definitely purchase again.
Love this sweatshirt well made nice blue color washes well no shrinkage

This jacket is a great buy for the price. Not too thick, not too thin... a good balance for Southern California cold weather. The jacket has kept its general show after 3 washings and almost daily use over the last month. Very happy with the purchase and thinking about getting another color in the same style.
Son says it is totally amazing and stylish. ;-)  It was just what he wanted. It is warm for how thin the material is. Very light weight and soft inside.
THIS WAS A PURCHASE FOR ONE OF MY SON'S TO WEAR WHEN THEY ARE JUST 'CHILLIN' LOL!
This hoodie will serve me well in South Florida as a winter coat. The price is very fair and shipping quickly.
Fit perfectly.  Just the right fabric weight for the spring weather this year.
Dried it and the zipper part is all out of shape.
Fits nice and comfortable and I love the color and would buy from them again.

I'm 511 210, I ordered an xl. I don't like tight clothing. This sweater fits baggy but not exaggerated either. It's soft, light but warm. The best thing I loved was the arm length. I usually have an issue with arm length being too short. I'm buying another one. You can't go wrong with this sweater for the price.

review_title: 5 Stars Great sweater, I was looking for something simple and ...
review_body: Seller: 5 Stars

Nothing like 20 or 30 years ago. No longer work jeans. My husband likes these mostly for chuch now. They are fairly thin denim that look fine for a couple washes but very quickly become faded and even thinner. But I knew this before buying from amazon. As a matter of fact it's why I buy them on here because some places in the mall still want over $50 for them and they are in no way worth that. Bring the manufacturing back to America and use heavy denim that lasts and I'll happily pay $55 per pair.
seriously undersized, had to return them

review_title: Pockets too deep. Rides up too high on waist.
review_body: Pockets too deep. Can't remove cellphone from pocket easily.

Good quality pants, so sharp I wore them to a meeting where I was suppose dot have slacks on, and nobody noticed, I even got complemented on my nice 'slacks'. haha. As they wear I expect I wont be able to keep up that deception though.

review_title: my husband won't wear any other jeans.
review_body: my husband won't wear any other jeans. he split his previous pair down the middle and we ordered these right away

review_title: Slightly darker than pictured (and darker than my last pair ...
review_body: Slightly darker than pictured (and darker than my last pair labelled as this shade, but fits the same and wears well.

Levi's has always made quality jeans. However, this batch was measured from the beginning of the waist band to the end. The waist should be the measure with the waist band buttoned. The measure of the waist was not correct while buttoned, approx 1/2 inch too small.

These are great jeans.  I have owned a pair of blue Levi's 500s and they fit perfectly and have since day one.  I just recently purchased a pair of black 550s and they are a little smaller then the first.  Otherwise these are great.  I like the wear of the Levi's 550, they hold up great too.  I like the classic look of these jeans but in a relaxed fit compared to the other jeans from Levi's.

review_title: Seems to be poor quality fabric as these jeans were not worn more ...
review_body: These jeans tore by pocket next to red Levis label on the right back side. I wear my wallet in my left rear pocket. Seems to be poor quality fabric as these jeans were not worn more than 10 times. This is pretty expensive especially when I used to buy Levis that lasted years in the past. Does Levis or AMAZON stand behind these products?

review_title: Great fit. Hate that I can't find these pants ...
review_body: Great fit. Hate that I can't find these pants in stores and have to buy online. Husband is very picky about his pants and these are the only ones he wears. These pants do last a long time with very abusive wear and tear on them.
nice quality, little smaller in waist than expected, overall great shirt
The sleeves seem to be twisted. They don't hang quite correctly.
Runs slightly big which is good for the relaxed feeling. Nice material. Sturdy shirt.
Husband loved these, very soft and nice weight, not real thin.

review_title: This worked out really well for my dad in the ...
review_body: This worked out really well for my dad in the nursing home, as the Henley opening makes it a lot easier for the nurses to dress him.
Longer than I like a tee shirt to be.
really shrank after first washing
I love this shirt very comfy . Washes great I recommend line drying

review_title: ... it for my boyfriend and if fits well and great material
review_body: Bought it for my boyfriend and if fits well and great material

review_title: ... of loose strings but for 10 bucks its a nice enough shirt
review_body: Had a lot of loose strings but for 10 bucks its a nice enough shirt.
4 stars because its very tight  on the arms
I've bought multiples of these shirts but in different colors. They're my go-to shirt when I play sports and exercise because they are light and dry quickly.
Love the T-shirt. If fits perfect and feels great wearing. Wears cool and better than cotton fabric. Wash and dry makes it so easy.

The shirt is of a lower quality than I expected. I have a couple of under armour shirts that I bought a while back that are nice (2). I wanted to get  a couple more and thought these were the same shirts. They aren't. The material is much thinner and the shirts are longer and more baggy. They're good for running/excersizing, but I think they're probably only worth 15 bucks. I wish I had gotten medium instead of large too.

Under Armour has come a long way in product quality and this shirt is no exception.  For those of us who don't need to walk around with everything  bulging out, this shirt provides a good tech fabric which dries quickly and is comfortable without being baggy.  As a warning, the orange color is ORANGE.  Otherwise, this is my third one and all work as advertised.

Love this shirt.  Fits great, very cool feeling, and doesnt generate clingy static electricity like previous under armour I have owned.  Very fast shipping and for $20, you cant beat that.  Not in any department or sporting goods stores here in town, at least.

review_title: UNDER ARMOUR IS THE BEST QUALITY
review_body: Hard to find shirts to fit exactly how you want but Under Armour never lets me down.

I'm 5'11 165lb and the medium size fits a bit loose around the torso,  at least in comparison to most modern fit shirts.  Super soft material though, and a great price for a couple good quality shirts.

Price for this shirt was about half what I would have paid for it at a local retail store, at least until the sales start. Shirt does an excellent job of wicking away sweat and moisture during and after the run.  The fabric is loose fitting, but not overly so, and is very lightweight. No chaffing or restriction of movement.
Bought a 3x. Had to give it to my brother who wears LG. Didn't fit at all.
Fit very well. Nice feeling material. Great price!
Nice casual pant, thought material would be nicer, but they feel like Dickie pants.

review_title: I was surprised at how well these pants fit me ...
review_body: I was surprised at how well these pants fit me, despite not having been able to try them on first :D
They fit perfectly and are much thicker material than my other slacks.
Great fit and finish. I wear a lot of khakis and these are great.
Good for the price- We'll see how they hold up
Amazingly good for the price.  Nicely sewn.  Make no mistake though, not tailored.
Great fit, and very comfortable. Quick delivery.

Love the pants.  Good fit and very slimming.  Looks good with a sports jacketLove the pants.  Good fit and very slimming.  Looks good with a sports jacket.  Love the pants.  Good fit and very slimming.  Looks good with a sports jacket
Great product, fair price, fast shipping.  What more could you ask?

review_title: Smelled like moth balls really bad when it arrived
review_body: Smelled like moth balls really bad when it arrived.  It took three washings to get the smell out.  Other than that they're great jeans.

review_title: I am disappointed. I bought these for my husband who always ...
review_body: I am disappointed. I bought these for my husband who always wears 30'' length and he already has a couple of the same 559 model that we have bought last year. The delivered jeans come out almost an inch short and I seem to not be able to return them. What a bummer. I bought three pair!

review_title: The other colors fitted well like they should
review_body: Levi's 559 are the only jeans that fit me, because of the extra room on the thighs. I bought many already, but this time the sub-zero was much too tight on the thighs. The other colors fitted well like they should. I hope they never discontinue thas model, but they could pay more attention to accuracy in size.

These are great jeans. They look good and feel good. You can really feel the quality. They don't feel constrictive or too loose. I have plenty of room to breath and move around. I look forward to buying more of these jeans. A great buy.

I accidentally clicked on the 34x 34 I was like he wont notice the size of the jeans, well I was wrong as soon as he took the jeans out of the package he was like "NO" they are way to big. So of course had to change them for a smaller size- let me tell you, I was on my way to drop of the jeans at the ups store when I was greeted with the new ones I had just ordered ( the exchanged one) I was amazed how fast I got the correct size!! I love ordering from Amazon!

It's interesting how you can buy two pairs of jeans, and other clothes, and each one fits a little differently. I bought two,pairs of these in blue and they fit fine. These will be fine too, but I wanted to state that Levi's can do better, especially for the price point...

review_title: they're comfortable, tend to get/ look dirty easy
review_body: these have stretch.  haven't lost that through normal "throw every thing in together" wash and dry's.  they're comfortable, tend to get/ look dirty easy. but wash out to clean. definitely need a belt with these.  my bad.

It took forever to find a Jean that my husband would wear. This fit is perfect. It's not skinny, it's not baggy, it's just right. My husband used to buy silvertab jeans, but they stopped making them in the style he likes. These Levi's 559 have become his new favorites. The other benefit is they come in waist size 33, which can be hard to find. And just FYI these are available for a great price and a larger variety of colors from both JcPenney and Kohls.

review_title: terrible, cheap fabric - does not qualify as jeans
review_body: This pair of 'jeans' is not denim or comparable fabric at all, but badly and irregularly woven, cheap junk. After the first wash, these pants looked like crap: the material shrunk irregularly and now feels striated/furrowed due to the poor/irregular weaving. It discolored/grayed irregularly, too. Compare to something close to a canvas shopping bag, but slightly thicker. W/o the Levi's sticker, one would assume that this was a pair of pants worth $5-10.

I received the jeans last week and washed them as soon as I got them.  I wore them on a trip to my parents house on Friday and realized on Saturday morning that one of the belt loops had seperated at the bottom.  After further review I found that it wasn't the stitching that had come loose, but the fabric had actually ripped so I can't reattach the loop where it was originally fastened.  The material overall seems to be of poor quality.  It certainly doesn't feel like denim of days gone by.
Great sweatshirt. Perfect! Only compliant is that it is a little shorter than a sweatshirt should be. I'm 5'10".
Bought for my husband to work in and he loves it.
Fits perfectly. Good metal zipper, but I hope the fabric around it doesn't shrink and cause it to get all bumpy after being washed, but for now it's great.

I would suggest going to a local big box store to try one if you can. I bought mine on Amazon because the color I purchased was not available locally. In my opinion, the male version of the hoodie fits awkward - probably due to it being fitted for Americans, but no real complaints.
fair priced and fits well.  good value.
perfect for this California weather

review_title: ... bit crooked and off center but overall it's not bad. I wear it under my motorcycle jacket so ...
review_body: Pockets are sewn a bit crooked and off center but overall it's not bad. I wear it under my motorcycle jacket so I don't care what it looks like.
Perfect for light fall football weather
They are warm and fit reasonably well but aren't soft. They leave a lot of fluff in the dryer.
Fits as expected. I hang dry mine though.

I refuse to pay ladies jean prices for sub-standard merchandise. I started buying these jeans after trying my husband's one day and I'm hooked. The denim is heavy, just like jeans used to be, and I get them extra long. They might be baggy on me, but I really love them; comfort is where it's at.
Ugliest pants I've ever purchased. The back pockets are nearly sewn on the sides. Hideous! Do not buy these!

review_title: Perfect jean for work and riding.
review_body: I ride a motorcycle to work and we have a dress code. Something businesslike understated (no bleaching, or other noticible details is required).

review_title: I wanted something heavier in material like I wore in the 70s and 80s
review_body: I was searching around for a pair of old school jeans (not in appearance) but rather in material. I wanted something heavier in material like I wore in the 70s and 80s. I found it with these jeans! Material is heavier, but not so much that they feel like a work jean. The relaxed fit is just that, they feel comfortable whether standing or sitting. The size fit as expected and stayed true to size after washing and drying.
The size and fit were fine. The material was significantly thinner than any jeans I've owned. The material and fabric weight are not likely to hold up to hard work.
Gift for back to school for Grand son.  My first order for 4 pair were too small in the waist.  I returned those (only got credit for 2 not 4) and reordered 4 in one waist size bigger.  PERFECT!

review_title: They fit perfect and feel very comfortable right off the bat
review_body: They fit perfect and feel very comfortable right off the bat!!!! I'm switching back to Levis, which feel better than Carhart's, which are now made in some 3rd world country.......

... but build quality not quite as robust as it was back in the day. I'm a mature dude and have been buying and wearing Levi's for, uh, quite a while. Buying on Amazon is simple if you know your size. And the price is as good or better than taking the time to go to a retail store. My only complaint is they aren't quite as good as they used to be (but the same could be said about many products that have been around for as long). The most noticeable thing: the zipper seems to be weak and I get the feeling it might break every time I put these on.
Cost much less that department store. Would've been very easy to return if we needed to, but he's very happy with them.
I was surprised it only has single stitching.  Price is too high for this mediocre quality.  Wrangler has double stitching and better quality for less money.  Will not buy Levi's anyone.
I should have ordered next size up but still decent shirt.
This is a great long sleeve shirt for the fall and winters. I really like the two tone of it and the fit was loose and comfortable.Will look at buying more.

review_title: Comfortable, odd cut, tight in the chest
review_body: The material was good quality and comfortable; however, the fit was a little off. The length of the torso and sleeves were great, but the body of the shirt was cut in a largely “tube-like” manner, making it too tight and awkward in the chest. I’m not built at all, so that was disappointing.
Nice shirt
Nice shirt.
Perfect fit and perfect color as seen.

review_title: Awkwardly large fit. Returned for refund.
review_body: This shirt was bought to be part of a Halloween costume (Linda from Bob's Burgers) so I was going to be quite forgiving when it came to quality/size. I buy an extra large for most products due to having somewhat broad shoulders but am in otherwise decent shape; 6'2/200lbs. It can be a crapshoot with certain brands/designs. This shirt was just far too large in a very unflattering way. The arms were far too baggy and the body of it made me look like a big red square. If I had the time, I would have maybe exchanged it for a smaller size but even so I felt the shoulders were going to be tight.
Nice Henley style and feels good to wear.

review_title: For an XL, it could be a little roomier ...
review_body: For an XL, it could be a little roomier in the body, considering the length of the torso section and sleeves.  Very soft material, quite comfy.
very nice shirt for just 10 bucks.  made well and fit perfect.  I like the length,  it tucks in and stays well.  I'll be buying a couple more of these

review_title: Not Up to Usual High Standards
review_body: Under Armour wear is normally of a very high standard and, while this T shirt is very comfortable, it started to shrink at the bottom pretty quickly, after only a few washes. Also the bottom area's elastic must have just gone, it feels like putting on a tent now. Not what I would expect from UA, very, very poor.

My husband loves th UA tech line. We ordered them in almost every color it comes in. They are very comfortable and they hold up well. On average they get washed once a week and all of them still look great after 8 months of lots of wear.
Really nice quality shirt

review_title: Finally a perfect fitting gym shirt
review_body: Finally a perfect fitting gym shirt. No belly popping out, and a nice loose fit. Dry-fit so can't see the sweat markls. Sitting OHP w/o creating a temporary belly shirt is so great. 5'10, 190 and got a Large.
My husband was very pleased with this shirt.  Said it was comfortable in the fit and cool and comfortable to wear on 90 degree days. Ii find it washes well and stays wrinkle free
Love these shirts.  Very breathable while working out.  Has become by brand of choice
Love this Tee! Fits great, looks great, not the usual UA shirt which makes it so cool. I've gotten many cool comments when I wear it.
Only one thing to say ( Quality)
Great item and price. I would recommend it if you are a large man. It wear good, cool and very comfortable.
very comfortable fit plenty of room

review_title: Fit is good though do not seem very wrinkle resistant
review_body: The pants have held up well with several washes and have fit as expected.  I am only giving these 3 stars instead of 4 or 5 because even when I take them promptly out of the dryer, they are very wrinkled or more wrinkled than my other wrinkle resistant dress pants.
Great pants. Cheap. No need to wear Dockers ever again.

review_title: the material looks washed out and develops shiny areas very easily when ironed
review_body: These pants are not what I was expecting. the material looks washed out and develops shiny areas very easily when ironed.

review_title: Not quite at the level of the other brands
review_body: I wanted to like these but they just dont fit like the other brands.

Ordered one of every color. I love them and for the price it's a bargain. I really don't know what all the complaints was about. They are comfortable and fits exactly as sized.  Got compliments every time I wear them.
Wow. $20 slacks that are Dockers and Haggar quality. No complaints at all.
Runs a little tight in waist
Very nice. My husband really likes them.
Durable, stylish, wash nicely, great fit
Very comfortable. I plan to buy a few more in other colors. I couldn't believe how soft they feel too.
Bought for husband for work and says they are very comfortable and likes the way they fit.

review_title: Happy Hubby took from Teen for Casual Friday
review_body: I bought 4 of the same 34 x 32 in different colors. This review is for "Covered Up" color.  Dark, stretchy and very soft!  Nice for a dressy jean and not stiff to start with.  Bought for my 17 yr old but hubby snatched them immediately.  Perfect for his casual Fridays at the office; dark solid blue.

I got the khakis. They were very good quality, but they ran a little tighter than the denim pairs that I have of the same style and size. I found a better, more comfortable option, so I'm returning these.

I buy levi because they last for a while. I bought this pair and another pair at the same time. I have had these jeans for 6 weeks. Three weeks ago i noticed tears on the rear pocket corners. Today after wearing them once a week I look down in a meeting and the crotch is ripped open. I have not had this issue with any other levi pair this soon. Usually they last for a year or more. Very disappointed with this pair of jeans.

review_title: wasted my time for size comparison.
review_body: ordered for my husband but returned. the size is all different. ordered 2 consecutive size but none of them fit. one is too big and the other one is too small i guess because the material for each size is not identical. one is 100%cotton and the other one is 98% cotton and 2%of spandex.

The jeans fit as expected, however there was a problem. They arrived with rows of deep, stiff creasing on one side in the entire front pocket area. I did not want to go through the hassle of return but I was afraid they would not come out. I took a picture of the jeans with the labels clearly attached. I then washed and dried them. Luckily the jeans washed well. I was dissapointed that there had not been better quality control before shipping.

review_title: Everyone knows the Levi name for jeans however I have ...
review_body: Everyone knows the Levi name for jeans however I have found in recent years their quality control is lacking. I used to consistently wear a 36x30 pair of jeans made by Levi's however not anymore. This pair of 36x30 559 Relaxed Straight Leg Jeans was oversized in the waist and too short in the leg. I exchanged for a size 34x32 however the waist on the replacement pair of jeans was too small the lengths was correct.

These are great.  Nice fabric, nice fit, color as described, and good quality construction.  I would definitely recommend buying more in this series instead of the 505 or 569 series because these are actually the way they are supposed to be.

review_title: Too Pricey. I'd buy more and 5 star if ...
review_body: Too Pricey.  I'd buy more and 5 star if it was a more realistic cost for these thin pair of jeans.

Levi's have gotten to the point where sizing is iffy since each style/color varies and is made of different fabric than how they used to be. However, after trial and error of various styles, these fit as advertised and when you consider how much they cost in retail stores, these were a good buy.

Bought these hoodies for my husband and son to brave these California winters. 😆  They are wonderfully thick and soft and well made for the low price. I'm so happy with them that I will be buying more for me and some of my other family members this Christmas. 😊👍

review_title: A REAL Hoodie, not a hoodie long sleeve tee
review_body: JUST what I was looking for. Some of these hoodies are polyester, some cotton, some tshirt thin, some super thick. This one is exactly what I needed. A real hoodie, made from cotton and the heavy thickness you come to expect from a Hanes product.

review_title: Well made, fits great and its warm!
review_body: Well made, fits great and its warm!
I just got my hoodie today and it fits and feels great. I got the red hoodie it was  $11  it's worth every penny.  I'm 225lb 6ft tall and it fits perfectly. Looks really good also.
very nice quality - unfortunately too large for the intended wearer but easily found another happy recipient.
Bought two for my husband. He says they are warm. Havent washed them yet so hope they do not shrink much. The price was very good.

I bought this hoodie for my boyfriend and it fit him very well. He said it was warm and comfortable. Although, the fabric was thinner than I had expected it to be. Nevertheless, I am happy with my purchase.
Great product for the price, would have definitely made 5 stars if just quite not so snug.
Inexpensive, comfortable, reasonable quality for the price. Likely won’t last forever, but it doesn’t cost $50+ like LL Bean, etc.

review_title: This is a cheap thin hoodie. It was perect ...
review_body: This is a cheap thin hoodie. It was perect to use as a layer under my windbreaker as some added warmth on my camping trip.
As usual, my shopping experience with Amazon was top notch.

review_title: Since they fit great and you can never find this size in the ...
review_body: I ordered a pair of these jeans in size 36x33 a few months ago. Since they fit great and you can never find this size in the store, I decided to order two more pair. When I received the jeans one pair had obviously been returned earlier because it didn't have any tags attached. No problem with that, until I tried them on. Both pair of jeans were too small, but the one that had been returned earlier was even smaller than the other pair! How can three pairs of jeans, all exactly the same size, all fit differently? Until Levi's fixes their quality control problems, I do not recommend buying this product.

I purchased two pair for my husband and he loves the fit. He normally wears size 36 x 32 in Levi's and all his 550 jeans are 36 x 32. It seams though that his 550 black jeans in size 36 x 32 shrank after washing them (It wasn't the first time this happened; the waist became way too small) and so this time he wanted to try the next larger size. We couldn't figure out why the black jeans shrank and the blue ones didn't. The 38 size in black washed well and fit perfectly after washing them so he will continue to order them in size 38.

They are Levi's and are of the good quality expected.  Ordered two pairs, one in medium stonewashed and one in dark stonewashed.  Upon arrival, the tags were different from each other, but both indicated they were 550's.  The medium stonewashed fit as expected and was true to size compared to all the other 550's purchased over the last decade.  Unfortunately, the dark stonewashed of the same size and style is a completely different, and much slimmer,fit and not like what one would expect from a 550.

review_title: It was easy to find a new belt also from Levi's
review_body: I am hard to fit and these fit me well.  I wear jeans every day (I am retired but busy), and these jeans provide the look I want and the durability I need.  It was easy to find a new belt also from Levi's, and it fits well and looks good.

O.K.  Admittedly I have put on some pounds over the years.  I have many pairs of pants that are 34x34, jeans included.  The 34x34 size is a bit small, not too small, just smaller than I would like.  I decided to go up a size and bought a couple pairs of jeans and a pair of khakis is a 36x34.  These were too big.  So I decided to find the middle ground and was quite excited when I saw that these jeans were available in a 35x34, which is a hard size to find.  I tried them on and then tried on a pair of the old 34x34 to compare and the fit was nearly identical. I guess it's time to workout.

review_title: Levis Are Getting Longer or My Legs are Getting Shorter
review_body: The Levis arrived on time as expected. I tried them on to find that they were abot 3.5" too long. My feet were covered by the excess. Puzzeled, I held them up to an older pair of 34" length 550s, and the new pair was significantly longer. I reluctantly returned the Levis. I probably would have exchanged them, but Amazon wanted additioinal $ to do so.

I can't find a line of Levi's jeans that look good any more. These 550s fit well in the waist, seat and front rise, but the legs are ridiculously huge. The slight taper doesn't help at all when the thighs and calves are so huge. I tried the 508s, but the front rise on those jeans was similarly oversized for my waist size. I just don't think that Levi's makes jeans for adult men any more. Returning these and looking for a new brand of jeans. I'm tired of playing this game with Levi's.

review_title: ... any trouble with Amazon products before but I'm definitely disappointed in these black Levi's 550
review_body: I actually only washed and wore the black Levi's 550 S twice and the second time I wore them the metal button fell out of the pants it said it was too late to return them I think that some type of compensation should be made I've never had any trouble with Amazon products before but I'm definitely disappointed in these black Levi's 550 S

I was very pleased when I got these as they felt very comfortable and have not had all the life washed out of them . I like to wear my jeans out myself. Have not had a pair of Levi's in years so it's nice to have a pair again
My husband loves the soft material and relaxed fit without being too loose.
Great shirt

review_title: Helps you stay warm and look smart!
review_body: This was a good deal. Quality fabric and very comfortable fit.

review_title: Great shirt for a great value
review_body: Love this shirt. Truly do, a must for cold winters.
Fit as expected and it is a great shirt but after one wash the blue on the left shoulder began to bleed a little bit leaving what looked like a white line.  Oh well.  It was great for a week.
good product.

review_title: Very comfortable and fit nice for the new muscles I have ...
review_body: Very comfortable and fit nice for the new muscles I have obtained. It has a nice soft cotton feel and tightish on the arms which feels good to any guy.
I bought this for my day, and he loves it.
Bought two of these, a blue and a red one. They’re very comfortable wearing them for home and outside.
Sturdy, stylish and long enough. I also love the button collar.

review_title: Under Armour makes great clothes. I give them as gifts and always ...
review_body: Under Armour makes great clothes.  I give them as gifts and always get comments about how they keep the skin cool and somewhat drier.
Got this as a Birthday present for my super slender coach and he loved it. Nice material. Super comfortable and keeps dry. Definitely will order again.
Great fit, great look, great comfort and it doesn't pick up the smell.  Give me 20 in different colors please.
Shipped fast and Good item
Fit as expected, very comfortable
Bought this for our son in law for Christmas, he loved it!
good fit, comfortable.
Great under armour shirt
Good shirt and price.

review_title: The cloth is soft and smooth, but it's a ...
review_body: The cloth is soft and smooth, but it's a loose fit!!!!!!! Makes me look baggy.
I took a chance with these, and I'm happy with how they look and fit. Will wear these for a while before deciding to buy more. If I do I will update my evaluation.

review_title: I bought 3 pairs, all the same size, ...
review_body: I bought 3 pairs, all the same size, all fit completely different. One pair the button broke in half. One pair fit well the other was way to big, the other was to small.

review_title: Great quality and value. I’m sold.
review_body: Having size 35 waist and 29 length is such a pleasure to be able to order.

review_title: I was hoping for pants that looked more like the image
review_body: I was hoping for pants that looked more like the image. They are unfortunately super baggy/loose around the thighs and lower legs.

review_title: These seem to be pretty decent quality for the price
review_body: These seem to be pretty decent quality for the price. I ordered my "dress slack" size and not my jean size, so they fit properly. As others have mentioned, they are roomy in the thighs but I consider that a positive. I plan to order several more colors in the same size.
These are actually pretty great for the price. Feels like they run a bit big but looks good.

review_title: the perfect size for my husband 31*29
review_body: It perfectly fits my husband. It's a headache for me to find the exact size for him, but I found at Amazon Essentials. My husband likes it very much!
Nice pair of pants at affordable price.  Size and fit were as described!
The fit was perfect and style was very trendy as well as comfortable.  Would buy again when needed.

review_title: It's like wearing drapes on your legs
review_body: The cut on these pants is horrific. It's like wearing drapes on your legs. Looks awful. And the bluish gray color looks awful.

I don't know what went wrong but this particular jeans was a little too tight and a teeny bit short too. I already own a couple of levis blue jeans (also ordered from Amazon) and they are a perfect fit. The only difference I could find between the two was, one was made in Lotoso and the other was made in Vietnam.
Belt loops break, same has happened with several Levi's I have ordered. Looks like it's time to shop a new brand.

review_title: He didn't like them - he's old school
review_body: My husband comes from the era of Levi's 501s and prefers the relaxed fit. This style's cut is too hip for him. He says that they go to far up his torso and they feel thin.
Well these are usually my husband’s favorite jeans...but these ripped the first time he put them on.

review_title: I've never seen anything like it before
review_body: First of all these are stretch jeans. I didn't even know they made stretch jeans. I don't mean the waist stretches - I mean the entire product stretches. It is uncomfortable. I've never seen anything like it before. Horrible product. Missed my return date too so now I'm stuck with terrible jeans.

I ordered the same brand, style, and size as another pair I already own (and comfortably wear regularly).  This new pair fit completely differently and was far smaller.  I've been brand-loyal, and was excited about the convenience of having them shipped.  Now, even if I get them in a store, I'll consider other brands first.  All brand-trust has been broken.

Hands down best jeans. I would only recommend buying the “range” color though. The other reviews referring to stretchy material are a slightly different color and fit, kind of strange considering they’re both 559’s. None the less buy the range color you won’t be disappointed.

review_title: I couldn’t find this size in my regular store and ...
review_body: I couldn’t find this size in my regular store and I couldn’t find anyone who would alter other sizes. These fit perfectly.

Item arrived perfect, I had the same jeans previously, but over years of use they started to get tears and holes so I wanted to replace them as I really liked my previous pair. They are just as I remember my old pair, just newer and with less rips. I like these jeans cause they aren't tight or restricting. They are just loose enough that you can move around in them and not feel the fabric stretching. I've had other jeans where the waist is fine, but the legs are tight, I hate that. I've found that when ever I buy any other jeans that are not Levi's. I don't like them as much. I only wear my jeans on the weekends, but my Levi jeans generally last 3-4 years. Depending on how much I wear them and what kind of elements I take them in.

I've been wearing nothing but 559's for the last 5 years or more.  The last 2 pair of 559's I've bought have been a snugger fit through the legs.  I prefer a relaxed fit (not baggy nor skinny) so not sure if this is the new trend for jeans
Comfortable, good sweater for the price !!
Fair item for the price,time will tell how well they hold up after a few washes.
Fast delivery, nice quality! Bought it as a gift, recipient was very happy.
Perfect. Prompt. As expected.

review_title: Runs a bit small. I got a XXL, ...
review_body: Runs a bit small. I got a XXL, hoping to have it baggy for the chilly weather. Luckily I ordered a size larger, otherwise Id have cold wrists. Im only 5'10.

review_title: LOOKS GOOD, I BOUGHT AS A GIFT FOR SOMEONE
review_body: LOOKS GOOD, I BOUGHT IT AS A GIFT FOR SOMEONE, THEY PUT IT ON RIGHT AWAY AND IT LOOKED COZY.  BOUGHT IN RED.
This large fits well, He usually wears a large.
Always loved these. Very comfortable for work and relaxing.

review_title: Not as good for skinny guys
review_body: This hoodie is soft and comfortable. However, there's a bit of extra fabric on the back, sides, and sleeves, and since the wrist and waist have elastic in them, this makes for a slightly balloon-like shape. I will have to see if it shrinks down a bit in the wash.
Nice weight.  Nice zipper.  Pockets are a good size.  Fit is as expected. My new favorite wear for early morning and later in the evenings.

review_title: The pants were as expected - Levi's are excellent in material and construction
review_body: The pants were as expected - Levi's are excellent in material and construction!!. The Vendor sent them Priority Mail so they arrived several days sooner than expected. I was impressed with the shipping - not having to wait the extra five days was great!!

review_title: Levi 550 relaxed fit is my favorite. Wish have more colors
review_body: Levi 550 relaxed fit is my favorite. Wish have more colors. The denim is heavy in dark blue colors. I like the denim used for black..
Love this color and style.  The pattern of the denim is trendy but still looks classic. The only drawback is that it seems to wear out faster than regular colors.

review_title: Good fit for my body shape
review_body: I love the 505 fit, a little extra room in the upper legs. And buying online where I can get the exact size makes for a great buying experience.
ok
Great buy.  Great jeans.  One thing I like about Levi’s is the larger back pockets.  Other brands tend to have smaller ones.

review_title: The price was good, and they fit perfectly
review_body: We ordered three pair in three different shads to replace the threadbear genes.  My husband won't wear anything else as casual attire. The price was good, and they fit perfectly. I washed them in hot water first, and he's good to go.
Love these pants and would love them even more if I could lose a few pounds. Not the fault of the seller or manufacturer, but ordered a little small based on my fantasy that I was thinner than I am!
As others have mentioned, the reduction of belt loops from 7 to 5 is causing issues. I tend to have problems with the pants wanting to fall down, unlike older Levi's I have with 7 loops.

My husband was tired of all of those low slung jeans that always felt like they were falling down & could only be pulled up so far! There was no way to keep a shirt tucked in & 'over-exposure' in the back was a constant issue. The Levi's 550 allows him to wear his jeans where they should be worn with enough crotch room to be comfortable. Levi's has always been his brand & now he has a style thaat fits his body. He likes a classic fit for going out, but the relaxed fit is super comfortable for working...bending, squatting, leaning...GREAT!

review_title: Nice shirt but way off on size
review_body: Nice shirt but way off on size. Fit more like a xxsmall but the sleeves were proper length if not slightly longer, body is way way way too small..
It was what he was looking for.

review_title: Great shirt well made and feels like it will last ...
review_body: Great shirt well made and feels like it will last a long time. The fit is great as well. Not too baggy and the sleeves are actually long enough for me. Im 6'4" and the sleeves fit me perfect which is extremely rare.
I bought this for a family member & they like it a lot!

review_title: The material weight is perfect for a Henley T-shirt
review_body: The material weight is perfect for a Henley T-shirt. The quality of construction is excellent. My favorite base layer on a cold winter morning.
little bit large in me L size
100% cotton very nice shirt and color !
Great shirt.

review_title: but I wish the collar laid flat like Hanes undershirts do
review_body: Collar does not lay flat and is a little wider (larger opening) than desired. I'm going to keep it because I intend to use it for doing outdoor work in, but I wish the collar laid flat like Hanes undershirts do.
My 25 year old son's favorite shirts.
Best shirts of this type I've found. Fit to size and last, I have several shirts like this that I where to work in summer, also great for working out in.
Lightweight, comfortable shirt.  I live in the desert and its a great shirt when the temps get up on the 100's
fit great and nice and thin great for hot weather.
Nice fit, very comfortable.
I would give it 5 stars if it were a true athletic cut shirt. Materials felt good on the skin and fabric didn't ball up after multiple washes, very important.
Love these Under Armour shirts, especially the ones that are not fitted and too constricting and this one is not.
Confortable and easy to take care of.
