Excellent fit, wicks away moisture, fabric slides without snagging against your body when moving then slides back into place. I bought 1 and now bought 2 more.

review_title: Great shirt and I've been through tons
review_body: I normally buy nike workout shirts but I think this one has been a catalyst for me changing brands. It's not too tight and it's not to lose. I find that I normally start my workouts with some form of aerobic exercise and then lift. It's nice that by the end of lifting I'm not as drenched in sweat as I was after my run/bike. It actually performs well in wicking sweat and drying you out.
nice shirt- soft and washes up nice
It could be because they actually fit and I usually wear things that are a bit too tight for my expanding waistline, but I think these are a little too baggy through the legs.
I like them. Good quality and well fitting in a size 42. I'll buy more.
These are great fitting pants.  I plan on buying more in different colors.
i liked them so much i bought 2 more
Fit well and nice material.  I think these are a high quality and we really like them a lot.
The waist size is a little smaller, so purchase one size larger, i.e., 34 Waist, buy 35 Waist.
Well built, comfortable and sturdy.
Extremely disappointed in these pants. Nothing as I expected. I ordered black and received a faded almost gray colored pant. I'm sure they'd be perfect if the color was what I had ordered.

review_title: Pants have correct length. Waist is as it should ...
review_body: Pants have correct length. Waist is as it should be. The legs are somewhat wide, but they're classic fit (read: moderately overweight or really loves and crushes leg day).

review_title: Spend a little extra to get better quality.
review_body: Okay pants. I wasn't expecting much for the price.

review_title: These jeans look nice. There are 3 differences I noticed immediately from ...
review_body: These jeans look nice. There are 3 differences I noticed immediately from other Levi 559 jeans..First is these 559 are 100% cotton,  all my other 559 are 99% cotton 1% elastic allowing for more movement..Second was the zipper, this pair the zipper is a wide flat piece of metal. Unlike all my other 559 jeans' zippers that have levi stamped into the metal and being smaller in size.. Thirdly was the weight of this pair of jeans, I'd like to say its almost half the weight of the others I own..So with that said I'm giving them 2 stars. I buy this type of Levi because of the mobility offered with having 1% elastic. Don't know what to say about the cheap zipper. They are nice jeans, don't get me wrong but they are not like other Levi 559
Nice quality Levi's that fit great. Very comfortable jeans that fit just as good after they were washed. Will buy again.

review_title: Fit great love how comfortable they are
review_body: Fit great love how comfortable they are, I did notice the stretchy one get hot when you streams near the fire where as the normal ones don't. Probably the elastic heating up in then.

review_title: Relaxed, if comparing to a blood pressure cuff!
review_body: I read the other reviews and figured they must be a bunch of fat guys complaining about fit. All I can say is that I am a thin guy. 31 inch waist. These pants are beyond skin tight. My thighs and seat were under severe compression. Length and style were fine. But the fit is terrible. These are like skinny jeans. Not loose. Not baggy. Not relaxed. These are skin tight from the waist to the knees. No room at all in the thighs, seat, or crotch.

This style is my perfect fit... Just wish they had shorter inseam lengths. They look and fit great, but for longevity, I would rather be able to have shorter inseam for my short legs... As they are, they tend to drag at the heal when I wear certain shoes that allow the cuff to travel below my heals. Otherwise these are great jeans with a great fit for wider men.

review_title: The jeans LOOK good and fit well
review_body: The jeans LOOK good and fit well. That said, the denim material was VERY thin. For a premium brand like Levi's, I expected thicker denim. I expect that these jeans wouldn't last through too many wash loads. I returned them.

review_title: He thinks these look more like slacks than jeans with the dark black
review_body: My son really likes these. They are a thinner material than the Massimo brand he was wearing that got discontinued, which were a more washed black. He thinks these look more like slacks than jeans with the dark black, but he likes the look. They fit him perfectly.

review_title: Great Fit for Athletic Legs, but Terrible Fitting Consistency from Levi's.
review_body: Levi's are terribly hit and miss with their jeans. I have gotten my last 5 pairs of 559 32x32 and nearly all of them fit different. I have to return as many of them as I ended up with because of sizing problems. I have bigger, athletic legs only being 5'9" 190 lbs, but a smaller waist (I use a belt still on 32's) and I like a fitting jean, not too loose and not skinny jeans. If you are lucky enough to get consistency with fitting, 559's are a great fitting jean but good luck with the consistency. Out of maybe 8 pairs ordered, 3 have fit perfect, one too tight but still ok, and the rest not close.

review_title: I was also happy the color was true to the picture
review_body: I bought these for my husband because I couldn't find the 559 stretch in our local department store.  I was worried it would not be what I wanted, but it was exactly what I wanted.  I was also happy the color was true to the picture.

review_title: Better price online than the box store
review_body: Better price online than the box store, and, I need the 36" inseam, so Amazon it is. I have found the Range wash/color is a much more durable material than some of the darker ones, which are very thin.

Not exactly sure why I am writing a review of this product.  It's a hoodie.  A very nice hoodie for a very nice price.  I bought it for my child with Autism who refuses to wear anything with a logo on it.
I like this hoodie! It keeps you warm unless there’s a gust of wind. Functional no frills inexpensive zippered hoodie. Good buy.
I love the zip hoodies! I bought several in different colors! Easy wash and wear!
I'm 5,11" , 240lbs and it's a little short. the fabric is very comfortable.
I purchased this hoodie for my son. Beautiful quality. Washes well. And very warm. Not super thick, but perfect for cool spring mornings.
Nice color and nice weight. It was a gift and my grandson wears it all the time. His favorite color is red.
Fit and look as advertised.
This is quite trim so if you have any extra weight around the waist, you may want the next size up, but this is exactly what my husband needed. Good price, too!

Just what I had hoped for. I love Hanes anyway. Super soft. Size is good. Not heavy like lined but not thin and too light weight either. A perfect thick enough material to make it warm for a chilly morn but not bulky.
Very nice item at a reasonable price. Fits perfectly.

review_title: Levi's - The Classic still the best
review_body: These black levi's are the ONLY jeans my now 48 year old husband will wear. Period. He's had 6 pairs for the past 10 years we've been together that just recently finally shredded to unwearable. I'm not exaggerating. I tried to get him to try on many other brands over the years, even expensive designer jeans failed to interest him and for the money paid, would not have lasted as long as these Levi's, I'm sure.

review_title: It would be nice to be able to get the link and 29 ...
review_body: It would be nice to be able to get the link and 29 inches. There was only 30 inches available with the weight size of 35.
Larger in the thigh than I expected.

I knew they would be a tad long because I wear a 29 inseam, not a 30. They still got great if i wore boots. Perfect fit in the thigh and butt area. I usually run into issues there. If I put things in my pockets and then sit, everything is too tight. Not with these though. Plenty of room to work. I'd also like to point out that they show no noticeable wear in three though area after wearing them for months. That's unusual for me, and that's why they get a 5 star rating.

review_title: As advertised these jeans are great!!
review_body: As advertised these jeans are great!!.  Comfortable and relaxed for the mature body and I highly recommend these jeans.

review_title: Everything else fits great. Quality of denim is good
review_body: For some reason, the length seems a little off, too long. Everything else fits great. Quality of denim is good.

review_title: good, needs more in between sizes
review_body: I like the fit and durability of Levi's but I always seem to be between sizes. I like this but have to opt for a pair that is a little tight in the waist because the next size up is too loose. I wish there was an inbetween size and that's always been the case for me.

These must be seconds. Inferior fit and material. Bought the same jeans at Kohl's recently. The material has held up great and jeans fit true to size. Can't say the same for the ones I bought here - material was very inferior, faded and ripped within weeks. Had flaws in the denim to begin with. Didn't fit correctly either. Husband says never again will he buy his Levis here...

I gave these as a gift, and he loves them. They fit perfectly. It's hard to know how jeans purchased online are going to fit, especially now that there are so many different types of Levi's. They came in at the perfect time, and I was very lucky to have found them at such a great price.

review_title: The other pair is fine. This particular pair was made with shoddy material
review_body: Ordered two pair of these Levi's Jeans.  My son has worn Levi's for years.  One of the pairs of Levi's from this order has fallen apart: there are holes and tears all over the seams, the belt loop broke, the material is fraying.  That is unacceptable for jeans, especially Levi's.  The other pair is fine.  This particular pair was made with shoddy material. And maybe workmanship.  Unfortunately, it is too late to return the one pair, but who would have thought the one of the pairs (which were worn equally as much as the other) would have fallen apart after a year?
Perfect
Great for the price!!!! The quality is good, the colors are good and the size was a true fit. Definitely going to get more colors than just black.
It is a bit too small. To much to sent back
Great quality and the color is just like the picture.
Very decent, and neat. It really is high quality. The price is surprising for such great quality
Bought those for my husband and he loved it and it fit him perfectly.
Well made, sturdy heavy weight fabric.
Fits well. Color is accurate based on picture. No apparent quality issues. Would  order again!
Very comfortable fit. I like the style and material.  Recommend this product.
Very comfortable!

review_title: You will love the comfort, fit and feel.  This shirt handles any weather conditions.
review_body: Wonderful shirt.  Well made.
Grandson loved it!
I love these shirts, was lucky enough to get them on sale but would definitely pay full price for more.  Excellent material for working out/running.
most comfortable shirt ever.  cool even the the hottest weather.  ordered 1, loved it, ordered 4 more.
Very comfortable

review_title: Best quality for half the price.
review_body: My go to tshirts.
Love Under Armour.
It's what I have come to expect from UA products comfort, quality, and function.

review_title: Looks like really nice quality and the peacock color is flattering
review_body: Bought this shirt for my boyfriend, came promptly and it fit him well. Looks like really nice quality and the peacock color is flattering.

review_title: Under Armour shirts are not true to size.
review_body: I feel like the Under Armour shirts are running small this year.  I order bigger sizes but they still feel tight.  I don't like my clothes tight fitting so I won't buy this shirt anymore.
Poor quality and too full a cut.

review_title: comfortable and stylish pair of slacks
review_body: This is a high quality, comfortable and stylish pair of slacks. Great job.
Great deal. Pants fit and look good.
Hard to believe I've shrunk to a 36 (from a 40) as I've aged, but these, if a tad snug, tell me I have!

review_title: look good. My personal preference is the thinner
review_body: Fit well, look good.  My personal preference is the thinner, polyester fabric but t here's nothing wrong with these.
These are comfortable & nice pants. I am very particular on how material feels & these are great. I'll be buying more especially at this price.

review_title: GIANT box -- one lonely pair of pants.
review_body: Excellent for work attire.  Sadly, one single pair of pants arrived in a box that was 28 x 24 x 24 inches.......a box large enough for a huge lampshade.  Absolutely unnecessary, wasteful and laughably ridiculous packaging.  Come on Amazon.......you are better than this.
fit as expected good look and great price
do not last. Just average, color fade after a month
The cut didn't work for me and the quality is not good. I can buy pants in the same price range that are much, much better

review_title: One pair (Sub Zero color) was made in Pakistan and the material is sturdy and thick
review_body: I've purchase two pairs of these jeans. One pair (Sub Zero color) was made in Pakistan and the material is sturdy and thick, the other pair (Andi color) were made in Mexico and the material is very thin and feels cheap. There is a significant difference in the quality of the two pairs of jeans.
Five stars for quality and comfort. They run a tiny bit too loose. Get the size right and you’ll have a great pair of jeans. Super comfortable.

review_title: TOO MANY  DIFFERENT  NUMBERS (505,514,559 569 ) MADE IN TOO MANY  PLACES  THE QUALITY SUFFERS
review_body: I WORE LEVIS FOR LAST 40+ YEARS  BACK THEN  ONLY 505  NOW  THERE SO MANY DIFFERENT  NUMBERS  ??????  WHY  SOMETIMES IT IS HARD TO FIND THE OLD FIT  THE 559 SEEM TO BE CLOSE  WAY BACK THEY MADE THEM IN USA  NOW THEY ARE MADE  IN  EVERY COUNTRY  EXCEPT  USA  ????  THE QUALITY  IS ????  IT SEEMS  THE ONES THAT ARE MADE IN MEXICO  ARE THE BEST

review_title: The fit is great and of course Levi’s are always the best looking ...
review_body: The fit is great and of course Levi’s are always the best looking jean out their,,,, but sad to say that they are made with half the amount of material these days,!their so thin and wear out to fast, no longer the working mans pants for sure!!
I had an older pair that finally needing replacing after 4 years. Got the same brand and model again, couldn't be happier.

review_title: Like No Other Pair of 559's I Own
review_body: I love 559, but these are not even close to the quality of my existing pairs.  They fit like the others, but extremely, no exaggeration here, THIN.  To be fair, I dont recall my other pair being called "stretch jeans" so this could very well be the differentiating factor here.

I had some qualms about ordering these pants online.  I always buy them locally, where I can try them on first.  I simply ordered the size I usually get, figuring that I could return them if for some reason they didn't fit right.  They worked out great.  A major upside is that I had more color selection here on Amazon.  I find that Levi's are durable, and seem to be put together better than some of the other cheaper brands of jeans.

review_title: Visually they're fine, but these foreign-made jeans are definitely not the ...
review_body: Visually they're fine, but these foreign-made jeans are definitely not the quality they used to be. Very thin material, and they wore through in about a year. Quality jeans usually last multiple years; not these.

review_title: I tried them on and the fit was fine except for the length
review_body: I have been wear 559's for last couple of years. I currently have 3 jeans that I bought from a large department store. they are starting to show some pulling at the rear pockets. So I decided to buy another pair from Amazon. I tried them on and the fit was fine except for the length. I purchased a pair of 34x30's and the tags say 34X30 but the legs are so long that they should have been marked as 34x34's.

These are the only jeans our son will wear. Living in the south, he still wears Levi's every day! This fabric is 'light, soft-stretch' as he explains it. They NEVER lose the form! Wash after wash, they come out of the dryer looking new. The key is to wash them inside-out with cold water and they never look shabby. There are so many colors to choose from and he loves all that I have chosen for him. These pants are worth the money. They are light-weight, but are sturdy, too.
Gift for husband and he was thrilled!  Fits well and much warmer than regular fleece.  It hasn't been washed yet so I'm not able to comment on that.  Very good purchase!
Comfortable, warm, fits ok. The waist area runs short, for me at least, and they shrank a little bit in the wash as well. Pretty decent hoodie.
Le quedo perfecto a mi esposo
Fits great. Lightweight but warm. Only thing I dont like is the feel of the seam down both sleeves. Great price though
This Hoodie fits just right.  It keeps me warm and has a soft material to it that is easy to care for.  I would recommend this to all.
I have a green one and wanted blue as well.

review_title: I needed a basic sweatshirt to leave in my office ...
review_body: I needed a basic sweatshirt to leave in my office at work because they always leave the building to cold. This fits my needs perfectly.
Perfect fit. Great quality material.

review_title: Fits just the way I like it and I think it will be perfect if ...
review_body: I'm 6'3 and 170. Fits just the way I like it and I think it will be perfect if it shrinks a little it el dryer.
Great product at a great price.

review_title: Was a quality brand... now crap.
review_body: These jeans are a HUGE disappointment. They ripped within 35 days of owning them. Five days beyond the Amazon's return period. I have never experience such poor quality product. Cheaply made and cheaply sold. I have been wearing Levi's 550 for years and thought I could just save time and buy them online instead of dealing with the store. Totally different make an feel from what I'm used to.  I would say avoid these.

Nice dark colored blue Levis! Was tired of buying Levis in the store that were TOO rinsed.. I found with the too rinsed effect that my husbands jeans were getting holes in them with in 2 months! I decided to order the NOT SO rinsed and they are perfect!!!! Will last a lot longer!

review_title: I used to like relaxed fit but nowadays the regular get the job ...
review_body: Returned because it was way too baggy. I used to like relaxed fit but nowadays the regular get the job done with maybe 1" waist size higher.

review_title: Quality of Fabric is Very disappointing
review_body: After 2 washing holes have started to appear in the legs.  Very, very thin fabric.  Think it's time to stay away from Levis. Definitly do not order them online.  The unpredictability of the quality and fit makes it imperative to buy in a store where you can try them on and feel the fabric.  I order 3 pair and each one is different in quality and fit.  Levi's has outsourced by buying of their product; won't bother with them in the future.

review_title: These jeans will rip in the top of the back pockets, but they will be the best jeans you have.. TRY THEM ON FIRST. Lol
review_body: These are great jeans for me. I’m a little heavy an no butt. Where these jeans sit and how they are cut is perfect. The fact you can get them washed to match your life style is a plus. I just wish the rivited the back pockets.

the levis which i purchased where of poor quality noticed other people complained what could go wrong with a pair of levis i have purchased a lot of levis in my days the amazon stonewash jeans look like someone took a paint brush and wipe the front with bleach (both pairs) almost to embrassed to wear them the material was very thin compared with much older stonewash levis i have purchased at sears the sears levis have much thicker material even being much older the amazon levis have the printed levi logo on the outside of the pocket inside of the jeans never have seen this before i do not know if a foreign country manufactured them if so someone needs to check quality assurance i will be going back to sears to get my levis at least i know what i will be getting even if they cost little more

review_title: one fits like a glove the other tight
review_body: Levis sizes are inconsistent
Levi has always been keeping up to the standards and the trends. So this item is 100% genuine and legit. Perfect and would recommend...!!!

I've been wearing this style of Levis for close to 50 years. The quality and fit still seems good. I remember years ago, Levis only came in a few styles and were stiff as a board. (before pre-wash) I'd run them trough the washer a few times before wearing. Only problem with this order was that one of my 6 pairs was mislabeled and too short. Return was easy. (Although there was no option for replacing with same product, only replacing with a different size/style or getting refund)

review_title: LEVI Jeans Bad Corporate Politics But Great Jeans
review_body: Although Levi Jeans is anti-2nd amendment and I am pro gun rights and all of the Bill of Rights, I like their 550 jeans and I am still buying them. I also like Wrangler's relaxed fit but their back pockets are too high. Lately the Wrangler jeans are lasting just as long as the Levi's and their belt loops stay sewn longer than Levi's. Bottom line all the jeans are made by communist China, who supplied weapons to the people in Vietnam that nearly cost me my life. It's all bidness, bidness.
Nice shirt - wears and washes well

review_title: Not Beefy at all. Made of some stretchy thin ...
review_body: Not Beefy at all.  Made of some stretchy thin fabric.  I ordered this shirt in black before, but this blue one is totally different. It goes into the charity bin.
Was very satisfied with the fit and is very comfortable. Will be ordering more in the future. Thank you!
All these henleys fit true to size, and are good quality love them.
Lighter then I thought it would be. Fit is a little small.
Its a Christmas gift , so I will see after its opened and tried on

review_title: Fit well, looked great, decent price and quality
review_body: Nephew loved this shirt; he hates scratchy things and things with tags so this was perfect and fit him well. Decent price, decent quality. He liked the fit and the feel. Loved the color and the collar; he wears it open, mostly. Likes that it had a little room to wear a slim-fitting tshirt, underneath.
my son loves it, it's soft
fits great, very comfortable.  holds it shape, not feeling stretched out after a day of wearing it.
Bought three of these and The off white was somehow smaller than the other two. Nice shirts tho
As expected, nice color.
Shirt is great.. Took FOREVER to ship it to me.

nice shirt just came in way bigger than expected. I am 5'8" 160lbs and in shape, I purchased a medium and it's too big... I have since ordered a small in a different color and it fits better, still a little big on me though..
Great fit, fast shipping.
Shirts are great quality, as all Under Armour are.

review_title: If you are known for this category why take the quality out???
review_body: I have 4 of these t's from UA, purchased over a couple of years, and with the receipt of these latest ones it does appear that the level of quality is going down. The collar seems loose and isn't holding its shape (upon immediately opening the package and putting it on) and the shirt seems thinner.  If I wasn't traveling I would just return the 4 I just ordered.
Great product

I am 5'-11 and 175 lbs. and ordered a large size. It fits perfectly and is very comfortable and attractive. The material looks silky and is very light weight and cool. I'm 74 years old and look 20 years younger in this tee! Love it.
I love these shirts, especially in hot weather areas like Houston. They make the heat and humidity more bearable.
Son loves these type of shirts. Color is really nice and he loves the fit and keeps him cooler in the summer.
Only three stars as the actual blue is lighter in color than the advertised blue.

I was honestly expecting some cheap clothes I would need to replace in the next few months. Or they would fit awkwardly. But I was completely wrong. They felt great, and material was nice. I would say they are the dockers without the logo.
I bought a few pair of these for work. Not the best quality but will do for 20$

review_title: They fit like baggy pajamas, or old-timey suit pants.
review_body: These are cut like old-time suit pants with the crotch halfway to the knees and the legs about twice the size they should be. They're as baggy as pajamas. Obsolete pattern/design.
Well made, good fit, priced right.
The material and fit were low quality.
We were surprised at the quality for the price. Looked and fit like Dockers
excellent;;ent fit.  I have not yet laundered them so I cannot report further
Gift for my son but he loves the pants.
Fit was good. Picks up stains very easily and doesn’t wash well.
These jeans run almost 2 inches larger than the stated size.  Where in the world did Levi have these manufactured?

review_title: Not a happy customer. $40 out and pantless
review_body: In the first two days two belt loops broke.

review_title: Not sure if these are real, red tag on ...
review_body: Not sure if these are real, red tag on pocket has only an R, doesn’t say Levis. Checked a dozen other pairs in my closet, all say Levis. Maybe seconds?

Read lots of complains about people getting different sizes - I suppose it may be true, not one to judge - but I didn't have any sizing issues.  These are the exact same fit and size (559 / 34x36) I had bought a year ago at a department store, and they fit just the exact same.  Note that "not all 34's are created equal" - if you switch from relaxed to regular to slim fit, the sizing WILL change... not sure if that's the issue some folks were having.... but I had no issues, got exactly what I wanted.

review_title: Strong and sturdy yet very soft and comfortable
review_body: Strong and sturdy yet very soft and comfortable. I've been looking and looking for good jeans that have that stretch and these have exceeded expectations. I'm buying another pair immediately.
Bottom of one leg of the jeans is frayed!  See photo. Grandson was packing the jeans and leaving for a trip so unfortunately can't return. DISAPPOINTING!

review_title: Great fit. Ordered more after trying first pair
review_body: Great fit. After trying one pair, I ordered few more, to avoid having to spend precious time shopping for jeans ;) Good stuff!

My favorite jeans. Note: In my experience, the different colors have different textures, some softer, some more stiff—the more stiff being more durable. For me, "Range" is the best compromise, soft enough for comfort but not so soft they fall apart in a couple years.

What a perfect fit just with my husband was looking for! You always get nervous ordering clothes online you never know if they're gonna get just the right fit even with measurements listed. But this went hate it right out of the park!
I went to a department store looking for this color of jeans but it was not available.
Although it did have some loose threads, it's great for mild weather 50s/60s. The fact that it's made partially with recycled plastic is a plus, I got it in green and can brag about being green.

review_title: I like it everything was perfect but the problem was I’m ...
review_body: I like it everything was perfect but the problem was I’m a big guy so sometimes the material on some clothes is to small so I figure maybe the xl would fit me perfectly but not with this one it look big on me so I’m returning it and get the large I know that’s going to fit me perfect but other than that I like

review_title: Great fit. Surprisingly warm despite its thin profile
review_body: Incredible value. Great fit. Surprisingly warm despite its thin profile.
A fantastic, plain black hoodie. My boyfriend loves it. And, it has not shrunk in the wash!
Medium was a little too big, so I sold it to someone and got a small which fit just right.
Nice sweatshirt fits well color is correct and arrived on time
Shrunk in wash
Great fit, excellent quality.  Very pleased with my purchase.

Great looking sweatshirt jacket.  Fits well, and feels nice.  The sweatshirt didn't shrink when washed and dried, but the drawstring for the hood became twisted and frayed, after one wash, on the gentle cycle.
Wearing it now.  It's a sweatshirt with a hood.  It's warm.  Will purchase again

I am disappointed with the poor quality control on the Levi's 550 jeans, a blue pair and a black pair, I bought from Amazon recently.  About an inch of the inseam is not stitched tie together.  The blue Levi 550 jean is made in Lesotho.  Btw, where is Lesotho?  Last week I also bought a pair of black Levi's 550 jean from Amazon.  The black jean is softer and quite comfortable.  The downside is that there is a pea-sized hole at the backside of the jean after one wash.  The black jean is made in Nicaragua.  I thought Levi's was in the West of USA.

I wear these as my "nice" jeans.  I am 5'10" 165 lb the 32"x32" fits me well, and have always had pretty big legs since I run and lift, I have a problem finding jeans that fit well.  The regular fit is usually too tight, the loose fits are usually too sloppy, this is just right.  I am a 31" inseam so I bought the 32" and roll the bottom up 1".  I will stick with the 550 now that I know they fit so much better than all the others.  The wash goes well with a collar shirt for a dressy-casual look.

I have been a 550 relaxed fit levi wearer for over 15 years. I have had quite a few pairs and they last forever. Recently my favorite pair (over 6 years old) ripped beyond repair. And decided it may be time to get new and a size larger..I was extremely happy that the cut of these pants hasn't changed a little snug in waist and loose in the legs. So now I have 4 new pair that are soooo comfortable and look nice (the black jeans pass as dress pants)I have had no real luck finding womens jeans that fit like this so this message is for women who want a nice, comfortable fitting jean to try this style.. I love my Levis!!!  Colleen

review_title: But for some unknown reason they don't fit like the others
review_body: I've purchased several pairs of jeans thru Amazon over the last few years. The last pair are the exact same brand, style and size. But for some unknown reason they don't fit like the others. Anyways they are for work and can still wear them just without buttoning them and wearing a belt to keep them from falling down.

review_title: Mislabeled size, no way these are a 33" waist.
review_body: I currently own a pair of 34x34 550 relaxed fit that I bought at a major department store.  The 34x34 are more loose than I'd prefer so I ordered these 33x36 from Amazon and I was also looking for a longer length.  The pair that was delivered must be from the reject pile that doesn't get sold to major department stores because there is no way these are a 33" waist.  When I tried them on they were a good 2-3" to small in the waist.
My husband fit very nicely into these jeans. They are exactly as described. They’re very nice.

I bought three of these, in different colors, at the same time.  Two of the jeans that I bought have a belt loop that is falling off, and they're both broken in the same place.  It obviously isn't an isolated incident, since two different colors have the same problem.  I can't recommend this product.

review_title: Waist size is fine as advertised but I didn't realize the pant legs ...
review_body: Waist size is fine as advertised but I didn't realize the pant legs would be THIS RELAXED.  If I weighed about a hundred pound more the legs might be alright but they seem very big from the thigh down through the calf; almost balloonish.

review_title: Like all the other Levi jeans I have purchased with one exception
review_body: Kind of odd that the jeans fit just fine with one exception...the back of the jeans just below the waist are stitched together to look like a "V".  This is the same as all the other jeans I have purchased.
No surprises, this pair of jeans is the same or similar to those that I've bought many times before.
I'm pretty fit, and I like my shirts somewhat loose, but these kind of start at the shoulders and tent down.  Great if you need the room, I guess.
bit small. but ok.

review_title: Very nice shirt. A little thicker than I like but ...
review_body: Very nice shirt.  A little thicker than I like but still good.
Sleeve collars are tight. I cut then off and sewed a smaller seam- much more comfortable

review_title: I purchased this for my wife's nephew for Christmas and ...
review_body: I purchased this for my wife's nephew for Christmas and he likes it!! Well made and fits as expected.
Great lightweight shirt! Comfy!
I have to admit this is my new favorite shirt. Looks are clean, it fits well, and is comfortable.
Heavyweight. All cotton. It was a little large for its size but after one washing the strunk a

review_title: wears it all the time and looks great.
review_body: My husband has two of these now, wears it all the time and looks great.
Good products good for and good feel
Always correct fit
nice and lightweight for summer
These are my favorite shirts in both short sleeve and long sleeve.  Not to hot, not to cold, fits right, can wear to bad.  Perfection.  I own about 8 different colors.
NIce product

review_title: Line dry is recommended. I gave it 3 stars because of that
review_body: Unfortunately I put this in the dryer, and it shrunk down to a size medium.  Line dry is recommended. I gave it 3 stars because of that.  Material is ok. Not as soft as other though.
Mine was not a US size. XL is usually a bit large for me....this one was tiny!
Perfect fit. Light weight, comfortable and wicks sweat. Keeps you cool on hot days. Easy wash and dry.
Does nicely

I prefer my shirts a little loose and not body hugging. I trusted the reviews saying order a size smaller and did. Very nice shirt but I should have ordered my regular size. I gave 5 stars because my trusting reviewers is not the shirts fault.  Update: ordered another shirt one size larger and it fits nicely.
fits nice.

These slacks were for my 90-year-old father, who  has this style from years past but the fabric is much heavier than the older style, which isn't a plus in the deep South, and they weren't cuffed as the older style had been. All in all, they are a decent value, and they fit him well but I wish the weight of the fabric had been posted.
Fit as advertised.  Kept their creases well
These pants are perfect and what a great deal! They looked so great on my son that my husband bought some too. Fantastic value.

Great product for the price. The only reason I gave it 4/5 stars is because the picture itself is very misleading (the product into is correct though). There is no taper in the legs and they are very baggy around the shoes
Great quality at a good price.

review_title: Good material but quite lose at the thighs (and inch ...
review_body: Good material but quite lose at the thighs (and inch loose than dockers D3). Also run a bit long. I ordered a 36X30 and these turned out to be 36X31.5!
Very nice cut and very comfortable.

review_title: Length is good on a 6'2 guy
review_body: hard to keep lint off of it. Even when I washed it separately. Somewhat snug too. Maybe because it is a classic fit? Length is good on a 6'2 guy.
Quick delivery. Fits great.

review_title: Need to return. Waist was 2 sizes too small ...
review_body: Need to return.  Waist was 2 sizes too small.

I have bought 4 pair of the same pants in different colors. Each pair is a little different, but 1 pair has an inseam almost 2 inches longer than the other 3 although all 4 should be the same.  I like the lighter weight denim and the colors have been what I expected.

Good fit at a good price. I love the feel. The material is slightly elastic and highly comfortable. I'm ordering a second pair right now. I saw some of the negative reviews. I'm not sure what they received but these pants deserve more than 5 stars.

They fit well, except they just split all along the seam. I had purchased another pair of jeans at the same time, same make, but a different color and they are just fine. Maybe it was just a bad pair.
Very good fit. I'm 6'6" with a slightly "expanded" waistline. I need length and crotch space and these have both.
Fits great but color was off from what I expected, why can't pants be like auto parts and just have part numbers so you can get the exact same ones you already have.
Very durable. I did not pay attention to the fact that the ones I bought were stretch fit. But I'm glad I got them. With the line of work I do, the extra give in the material helps.
Nice jeans but the inseam on in the 36x32 was only 29". I returned them and got the we 36x34 to end up with a 31" inseam

review_title: The black Friday Amazon price beat out Kohls, we ...
review_body: The black Friday Amazon price beat out Kohls, we buy 2-3 pairs of jeans each Christmas for my husband and they last a year (50-70 washes) before wearing out, usually at the back pocket and knees.

review_title: The jeans fit better than I expected and arrived on time
review_body: The jeans fit better than I expected and arrived on time.  Really enjoy the stretch comfort.  I will definately order more.
I wasn't sure how I would like the "stretch" jeans, but they are very comfortable for moving around and sitting. Classic great looks and style. I'm very happy with them.

review_title: A cheap jacket for those chilly days
review_body: Here is a comfortable, basic, and affordable hoodie that anybody who wants one just in case it happens to get a bit cold would probably be fine grabbing.

I purchased this as a gift for someone, in the size he normally wears, and was please to see it fit him perfectly. It's not thick material but it washes well and is comfortable. Good product for the price.
Comfortable weight and quick to dry.

This is a very nice hoodie. I ordered it in deep forest green and the color is beautiful--something a bit different from all the black and gray hoodies out there. The color is deep enough that it goes with everything. It's nice and soft, too. My husband loves it. I would say it's true to size,. My husband is slim (About 145 lbs.at 5 ft., 10 in. tall) and could easily wear a medium if he wanted a slimmer fit. But he prefers a more generous fit--this looks very nice on him and he says it's quite warm.
Good light weight zipper hoodie for under my water proof gear.

review_title: Thin hoodie for ~$9. Can't be beat.
review_body: Blue. Hoodie. Thin Sweatshirt material. Just what I wanted.

My husband is 6'3' and 230 lbs.  This fit him perfectly, was very soft and has washed well, he thought it was a great Christmas present.  My daughter wants one know to iron her new Harry Potter patch on to it.
Very comfy lightweight hoodie. Good quality
fits well. careful so it doesnt shrink

review_title: and he like it a lot
review_body: Bought for my husband, and he like it a lot. Fits him well. Would recommend.

i ordered 2 pair plan on buying 6 more  2 each mo....but cant do it now,,,i ordered 2 pair one fit the other was 2 sizes to large ..the size label was mark the same on both but were not the same...i have been wearing these jeans 550s --38x30 for 15 yrs the people i have been buying them from went out of bussiness,,,so i orded 2 pair from amazon... ( i live out in the middle of no where) so i cannot get to a store unless i drive 100 miles one way....i tryed to send them back for replacement.,amazon said they could not exchange them and i had to send them back for a refund ,,,then reordered them.....man ...what a wast of time and money....why could they not just replace them with the right size.......

I ordered these jeans (32x32) a couple years ago and they've fit and held up nicely.  I re-ordered since I was happy with them.  The new jeans that showed up yesterday were noticeably longer.  Both labels match = 550, 32x32, relaxed.

review_title: ... so much hassle about returning them it was a waste of money
review_body: Husband can't wear them and the company gave me so much hassle about returning them it was a waste of money, we donated them to goodwill. These are NOT Levi's like you think...sizes in Egypt must be way different!

review_title: A little baggier than expected, but suits me well overall!
review_body: I like the product.  I wore these jeans as a child and wear them as an adult.  I wear other name brands, but this gets the job done.  Not too cheap, just right!  A must have!

It's still a nice pair of jeans.  I got what I thought was the identical size to what I had ordered before but got the straight leg instead of the tapered and, as a result, they a bit too tight in the thigh area.

Fits as expected, it is very hard to come across non-skinny jeans nowadays in retail stores, so this is the first time I bought online a pant! Fits great. I hope they keep making them.  I don't understand the skinny jeans fad.

I've been struggling with the higher prices of clothing while the cotton crisis (that no one's talking about!) continues, and alliteration aside, I'm glad I found a way to get my beloved Levi's at a lower price than any local store, and in the exact style and color I want, which the stores never seem to have.  Reading some of the negative comments had me concerned that Levi's might be cheapening materials or manufacturing standards too much, but the jeans I received are still well within the parameters I care about that keep me buying Levi's.  I still wish the prices could come down without hurting quality, so I could afford more pairs, but I know that's not gonna happen.
These are replacements for other Levi's Jeans that eventually wore out..  They're hearty and long-lasting and, most importantly, comfortable.

These don't last like they used to anymore.  The bottom of the belt loops (in the back of the jeans) unexpectedly rip out from the jeans after 3-6 months.  That's with wearing them twice a week.  No real stress on them either.  every part I have purchased in the last year, even from Brick and Mortar retailers has had the same problem.  Considering switching brands.  Jeans are too expensive to have such quality issues.

review_title: The Real Jeans For Real Men
review_body: This jeans cannot be found anymore in my country (Lebanon) me and my father don't like the new jeans style, those are hippy or urban style, with low waist, nowadays jeans are unwearable by gentlemen, so i was surprised that i could find the jeans that our fathers wore in the past, that gave them a macho man look, a jeans with high waist, and great quality such as this one, girls will come kneeling infront of you. thank you i order more than 10 items because this is something very valuable to keep and have lots of it. when we received the jeans my father was astonished with the color and the quality and the style thank you so much for keeping the genuine stuff in the market, thank you amazon.
Product is a lighter weight then Dickey but the comfort is great
Looks good but a little snug. He kept it anyway.
Given as gift to my son.  He says fit is great.
I love these shirts. Super comfy.
Love it. Nice fit. Material feels good.
Nice heavy weight T shirt.
Love it. Super comfortable and keeps me warm.
Very nice long-sleeve t-shirt. Good quality.
Looks super hot on my boyfriend
A gift he said he likes. Said the fit was good. Nice color.

review_title: EXCELLENT fit. Went back and bought more
review_body: EXCELLENT fit.  Went back and bought more.

I don't really like to pay a lot for clothing, I usually buy what is on sale - so, buying a UA tee was kind of Christmas in July gift. But this tshirt is really something that makes you forget how much you paid for it, and also makes you forget that is not cotton (which is usually what I look for in a tshirt).
Very lightweight shirt. Good Style, but runs larger than expected. My BF is 5'8 & 140lbs and the MED is too big

My favorite gym shirt. really wicks away the moisture and doesnt smell all funky even after a hard work out. Keeps me nice and cool and has stood the test of time. I have several of these shirts and have not had to throw one away in spite of constantly washing them :)
Nice look
Been wearing these hiking for a few years.  Hold up well.
Very good product for working in the cold weather.
Bought 4 for my husband to wear as an undershirt. He loves them! Easy to wash and dries quickly. Also, easy to pack for trips instead of heavy cotton ones.
Good product.
Loved the color, fit and style. Good deal.
Not wrinkle  free but the way these pants are made .... perfect fit, modern, straight cut, no pleats and 30w X 30! Given 4 stars because definitely I will spend some time with the iron.
They fit, but they are very basic.  I guess that is what I paid for, but meh.
Fit in the legs is very baggy. My husband has runner's legs, so a lot of pants are tight in the thigh for him. The legs on these are almost billowy. Other than that, they seem fine.
The pants were well made & looked good. The fit was not good for me, so I returned them.
Fit wayyyy too loose.  Meh.
Fabric is cheap and they wrinkle like crazy.
Pants are as described and fit well.

I bought one size up after reading the reviews that the pants were snug. Glad I did as the pants do tend to run small. For the price, the pants are not bad. It's a 60% cotton 40% poly blend. One thing that I've been noticing with budget pants is the front zipper. It seems the manufacturers are putting in 1/2 a zipper these days. These have at least 3/4 of a zipper which does make a difference. The inside right front pocket has an inner pocket for change which is something I like. The pants are not a slim fit. If you're looking for a slim fit these are not the pants for you. They are "roomy" which for me adds to the comfort. I'm going to order a few more in different colors.
Fades wayyyyy too fast
Perfect fit on my husband.. Looked dang good in these pants

This is my favorite cut.  I am 300+ pounds and these are completely comfortable and look good on me.  I have limited selections in my size, but these jeans allow me to wear something relatively fashionable very comfortable.  I have bought 559s for a long time and will continue to do so, even as I lose weight (down 10 so far)!

I've worn Levi's jeans for 20 years.  These are not the Levi's I know and love.  The material is substantially thinner than any pair of jeans I've ever bought.  They feel more like pajama pants than denim jeans.  I bought these as work pants, am very doubtful they will hold up.  I regret buying these online.  Lesson learned, I'll cut my losses and never buy Levi's online again.  This was a company I respected.  Now I feel ashamed for them for the kind of product they are putting out.  Take my advice and buy some Carhartt Jeans instead.

review_title: Nice pair of jeans with a touch of stretch.
review_body: Nice straight jeans, not too wide. Have a touch of stretch which is nice. They are not too soft, but they look nice and with that touch of stretch are more comfortable to wear then straight up 100% cotton. The black color is a nice jet black, good to wear out or to work, as they look a bit more formal.

100% denim cotton!  No spandex nor elastine.  Just a regular pair of jeans.  I bought the Charley D color.  You have to scroll down and read the description to figure out which color/shade is 100% cotton.

I have a pair of these jeans and was trying to find an identical replacement.  I'm assuming the different colors are different fabrics and fit and feel, as that's the only reason I can come up with that these jeans were so different that the ones I already have.

I checked several local stores for this jean in size 34 X 32 and none of them carried it or were always out of stock. I was a bit apprehensive ordering jeans online because I usually like to look through a couple pairs to find one without flaws or with a good look to the fading. The clincher for me is the great return policy with Amazon, so I ordered them knowing it wouldn't be a big deal to return them. I got mine for $39 bucks which is the lowest price I've seen. They shipped in a sealed plastic pouch so there was very little packaging waste. When I opened it the jeans were perfect and exactly what I had ordered. I really like the Indie Blue color and the faint distressed look on the front, but most of all they fit me and they are very comfortable. Thanks again Amazon! And to the local stores...sorry I tried.

review_title: Absolutely ok, fits as expected. However, they ...
review_body: Absolutely ok, fits as expected. However, they are a little darker than the picture.

review_title: Feel & fit do not represent "true" Levi's. My ...
review_body: Feel & fit do not represent "true" Levi's.

Great jeans that actually fit! So nice to not have to leave the house and go through piles of jeans in stores. My size is always sold out!  From now on this is the way I am  doing it right here online.  Very comfortable fit!

Great style, cut, price, and material. My husband is about 6 ft tall and 200 lbs of muscle w/ a bit of fat and these jeans fit perfect on him.  He doesn't like his clothes to fit tight ...he has to have room for his thighs, private, and rear to move/ breathe. Thus, these jeans are a perfect match for his needs. They provide a loose comfortable fit from the waist down and they fall great over his boots and gym shoes.

The fleece hoodie is very soft and comfortable right out of the package. It is good for Fall and Spring type weather as it is not a thick hoodie. I love the three I got. Just don't expect them to be heavy duty winter wear.
Bought one size larger, fits perfect when wearing a tee under it...Nice quality.
great gift-nice
Good quality, just very thick. Definitely for late Fall and Winter. Usually like a little thinner hoody to wear inside a jacket. This hoody is thick. Too warm for early fall.

I bought an XL since most things I wear or XL (sometimes XL is too small for some brands). This is comfortable and I use it for the gym. It is a little big for an XL though. So if you like loose, get your size, if you like it more form fitting get a size smaller.

review_title: My teen son loves this jacket. Very picky about ...
review_body: My teen son loves this jacket. Very picky about material and what he wears, has no issues with it at all.

Fits extremely well, ordered a large and I'm about 6'4 and 200lbs, slimmer build. Keeps you extremely warm surprisingly for how cheap this is, I have been using it the last few days in the snowy winters with a thermal under layer. The green is quite attractive in my opinion. I would definitely recommend one or two of these, pretty good quality for the price.

review_title: Good for what I bought it for
review_body: I bought this hoodie specifically to wear to work and did not want to spend very much money. I am happy with this purchase especially for the price. Only complaint is the inside doesn't stay soft long enough.
It would get 5 stars if it were made from cotton...but then it'd be twice as much, so there you have it.
Does not fit as expected. I expected it to be too small and it was not it fit perfectly.

review_title: Although I ordered two pair of blue and this one ...
review_body: Although I ordered two pair of blue and this one in black of the same model and size (550 Relaxed in 31x30), this one was considerably smaller than the other two.  Don't know why but it was.  I returned this pair for a refund.
Great for hub! Very slightly tighter on waist n butt than a different brand this same size. But looks great

Overall appearance of these jeans is great.  I've never bought through Amazon before so in fairness delivery was fast and product sizing was as stated.  But I have had sizing issues with other Levi purchases (I bought 4 pair from another source my last purchase and all were 34x36; 2 pair fit and 2 pair fit more like 33x36) so I bought a little large this time.  A size 35x36 would have been the right size for this purchase(but only 35x34 are available).  I would purchase again through Amazon, I feel sizing is Levi's quality issue not Amazons'.

review_title: Great for Young Men, My Old School Guy Said, "No"
review_body: My husband comes from the era of Levi's 501s and prefers the relaxed fit. This style's cut is too hip for him. He says that they go to far up his torso and they feel thin.

Ordered and received 36x34 jeans ... but inseam actually measured @ 33" ... second pair of Levi's ordered from Amazon w/ this problem ... not Amazon's fault, but will keep me from purchasing Levi's online again.

review_title: Great pants at a discounted price
review_body: Great pants at a discounted price, (at least when I bought them). Having said that what happened to the 28" inseam?

review_title: Had bought other Levi relaxed fit and they fit perfect but the black Levi were to tight in the ...
review_body: Had bought other Levi relaxed fit and they fit perfect but the black Levi were to tight in the waist  had to send back for next size up
I've worn this style for a while. Tried others but found nothing as comfortable. It would be nice if they could figure a way to make them in this country.

review_title: Perfect fit, great price in a nice color.
review_body: I purchased these for my husband who enjoys a nice relaxing fit in his jeans.  He is a policeman and when he is off duty he loves to kick back in a pair of jeans.  He was surprised that they fit so well since he hadn't tried them on first but they fit perfectly and will be the right length for when he wears his cowboy boots.  I was pleased with the purchase but I did think the delivery took too long.  I was ready to contact the seller about where were they when they finally arrived.  Other than that I was satisfied with the quality of the product.

I was a little hesitant to buy jeans on the internet without trying them on first. Finally, when they appeared on sale at Amazon I decided to give them a try. Upon arrival I was pleasantly surprised that they were the same quality Levi jeans I normally buy in department stores for a lot more money.  Through and through they are Leve's and fit perfectly. These are not seconds or knock off but great jeans especially for the money. Packaging and shipping was outstanding and I will buy them again without reservation.
nice quality well made feels good and looks good
Well made, comfortable, good fit. Cannot speak to durability. Will not hesitate to buy again.
Nice, somehow thick fabric, very confortable to wear.

review_title: I liked everything exept the bluetooth smart watch
review_body: I liked everything exept the bluetooth smart watch.i downloaded various of apps to connect the my s8 android phone with with the watch it didnt work so i threw it away.smart watch was waste of money and please i didnt sign up for amazon prime videos so get that canceled for me please.
Fits like a glove.
Doesn't shrink

review_title: These are a good way to layer and very comfortable
review_body: I bought one then three more. I live in Washington state. These are a good way to layer and very comfortable

review_title: The quality of the fabric is nice and I love the rich color
review_body: The quality of the fabric is nice and I love the rich color. This is a present for my brother and he looks very handsome in it!
Nice tee shirt great for cooler weather . Fits very good and comfortable .
Like it fits perfect.
My teenage son loves this shirt.  It fits well.  Nice material.  Well made and he loves it which is what counts.  :)
Love my Under Armour <3

review_title: Great comfortable shirts with nice fit!
review_body: Love these shirts! Light, soft and comfortable. I keep cool and do not perspire as much. Just great shirts. They are all I wear. They are not tight fitting.
Good Product
As advertised
fits well .

It's ok

I also wish Amazon would have a measuring tool so that you can gauge the size of the pants to order. Mine ran a little bit long for 30 length

Fits well, made well.
excelent service, and the item was great and excelent quality

review_title: Needs more room at the waistline.
review_body: The waist level is too low. I didn't expect to need suspenders.

The product was not exactly small but there is not another catergory. The material is twisted on the right leg where it was sewn together. Instead of outside seam going to the outside of the leg as normal it starts to pull. When looking the material you can see where the denim is lined up incorrectly. Oh well another pair to the donation pile.

review_title: my favorite jeans. sub zero is a great color and ...
review_body: my favorite jeans.  sub zero is a great color and no stretch.  stretch jeans feel wierd to me.
Purchased for my husband and they were perfect.  Were happy to find out they were quality Levi’s and not junky irregulars.

review_title: Different cut than other 559s I have owned
review_body: Bought these to replace another pair of 559 jeans. Fit was about the same in the hips and thighs but the cut at the bottom of the leg is different. These are longer and wider at the bottom even though they are supposedly the same jeans and size (both 559s and 34W 32L)

I bought  8 pairs of jeans for Christmas and 7 them were Lee's not Levi's and this is why:  I bought a pair of these (men's relaxed straight leg) in an effort to upstyle a young man with the shlumpy baggy-jeans look.  They looked nice, in contrast, when he put them on.  Two days later I could not tell these apart from his usual 8 year old jeans.  Frankly, they looked like crap.  He's looking fine in Lee's now.

review_title: Didn't like the new elastic stretch in the 559s.
review_body: Use caution when purchasing the 559's. Some are labeled as stretch, which means there is elastic in the jeans similar to women's jeans.  It suppose to help with motion and movement, but I prefer the old style.  Personally, I don't like things snug to my leg.  I left it was snug around my thighs while loose toward my ankle.

review_title: I ordered these for my husband and after he had ...
review_body: I ordered these for my husband and after he had them for 4 weeks, he finally tried them on. Now he's worn them nearly every day for a week! He likes the fit, length, and the quality of the material. He says the jeans are not thin, that the material is more heavy duty.

I buy Levi jeans for my husband all the time -- same number 559 just different shades of blue.  This time I ordered the Sub-zero color and as usual they fit just right.  I do agree with other reviewers these Levi's don't seem to last as long as the Levi's we grew up with but that is the price we pay for wanting our jeans to be more "trendy".  You want your old jeans...order your button-up 501...they are still out there!!!
Fit as expected. Holding up well to washing and wearing to work where it gets put to the test !!
Shortens/shrinks after a few washes
Great fit ,great quality ,true to size ..I really would have paid double
This was a present and my relative loved it!  Great buy!  Thanks!
Great zip up hoody. Perfect for the gym. Not too thick, but thick enough to provide a good fast warmup. Probably will buy again.
Comfortable, lightweight, and perfectly sized.

I love these Hanes hoodies. They are thin but I like that. This is my second one as my first one went missing at work. Fit great and survived alot of washes. The hood string will get a little worn out though
I like it fits comfortably keeps me warm.
Comfortable basic hoodie. It fits exactly as the size indicated it should.

review_title: but very handy indoors on cool winter days
review_body: Nothing special, but very handy indoors on cool winter days.

I have been buying this style jeans for my son for quite a while.  I always order the medium stonewash.  It is the same color jeans that I wear.  The medium stonewash Levi's that I have ordered recently look much more like a dark stonewash.  I am very happy with the quality and the price, but if you are expecting a medium-blue color, that's not what it will be, not anymore anyway.  It will be quite dark.

review_title: Levi's are not what they used to be
review_body: The right rear belt loop on these 550 jeans always tears out the cloth at the bottom. Not the stitching coming loose, I mean a little hole where the belt loop bottom was sewn.. I have 4 pairs that have done the exact same thing.
They were nicely packaged and fit as expected. I will order another pair soon! They were a bit pricey--so they earned four stars.

review_title: Older guys, buy LARGER waist size
review_body: I've loved, and worn, Levi's all of my adult life.  But if you are getting older (middle aged) buy a size or three larger.  In the blink of an eye, I went from a 32" waist to a 33" and now purchased a 34" and, after washing, a 34 inch is still too tight.  No, I don't blame Levi's.  I blame it on "middle age."  Just ... middle aged buyers beware!
right on the money: sits at the waist, feels great, nice to touch...great pair of jeans!
You can always count on Levi's to be good quality. This is really all my husband wears.

review_title: great jeans, ordering online is easy if you know ...
review_body: Levi's no change, great jeans, ordering online is easy if you know your size. Reordering a loved pair of jeans is now dead easy.

review_title: ... But One Month Later, they're falling apart!
review_body: I purchased these jeans one month ago, and last week, on a plane heading off for vacation, I look down and see the right seam by my knee has come apart. And these were the only jeans I had brought with me. Bummer! I took them to my local cleaner this morning, and they can repair the seam for $10. It's just disappointing I have to pay money to have them repaired when they're not even one month old. Very disappointing.
i bought 2 pairs of the same size.  one black and one blue.  the black ones are baggy and the blue ones are snug.  not sure why......

review_title: I don't know if it is me or what but they have always fit me like tailor made
review_body: Levy's jeans have always been my brand of choice since the time I tried the first one. I don't know if it is me or what but they have always fit me like tailor made. This is the first time of many (just ordered a second pair) purchased through Amazon.

What's not to like about Under Armour!  Well, okay, maybe the price, but if you consider how long it lasts, what good service it provides, how well it holds up in washing, and mostly how very comfortable it is, you've got to consider it a bargain.  Yes?  Yes.  Most highly recommended.
IDK think I am starting to like Under Armour more than nike. Has been through a couple of washes and still has not shrank!!
Great shirts. UA always delivers comfort and quality.
PERFECT SHIRT

another excellent product from Amazon

review_title: ... find khakis that don't squeeze my legs and are comfortable to wear
review_body: It is hard for me to find khakis that don't squeeze my legs and are comfortable to wear. I decided to try these ones out and was a little sceptical at first. Once they came in, I was pleasantly surprised. They fit very comfortably. Definitely going to buy more.
Washed & then dried pants in the dryer & they looked wrinkled & cheap. The material collects every piece of lint imaginable. They fit as expected but I wouldn't buy again.
A little bit loose for my liking, but ok for the price

review_title: Decent quality but sizing is off. Most my pants ...
review_body: Decent quality but sizing is off. 36x32 was huge on me. 34x32 is really tight.
Can't complain, price right and fit is perfect!
Didn't fit sent back.
Great fit. So far so good. Lost some weight and needed new pants. They look and feel really good.
The seam next to the zipper ripped after being worn for only 4 hours. And it wasn't as if the pants were too small; they fit perfectly.
Unimpressed... Company and quality has done down hill.  I will no longer purchase from Levis.
I bought this pair at a ROSS over a year ago. I love them so much that I ordered 2 pair here on Amazon! Been wearing the new pairs everyday after work! I might order 2 more pair!

I have to admit that I was very much against stretch jeans initially. However, after the holidays, and my body gained a few extra pounds, these have been very helpful. It may have been the style of the jeans, but I found them a little bigger than expected.  Other than that, they’re perfect.
These jeans fit just as I expected them to. very pleased.

Have always loved Levi's, but these strong/stretch jeans are so very comfortable.  And they keep their shape even after a long day of travel.  They feel good, wear well, and look sharp.  My new favorite jeans.

I have two other washes of 559's. I have the black and another dark blue, they both fit perfectly, although the black is a bit more form fitting in a good way. I ordered the Midnight Oil wash and it was too tight with thinner material. I exchanged fro the Levine wash and it fits fine, but the material is still thinner than the first two washes I bought. Weird.
They don't make Levi's like they used to, with the super thick denim that took Forever to break in. These are a thinner denim, but Just as stylish. And the hub says Alot more comfortable.

review_title: Worth it if you like relaxed straight jeans
review_body: My husband really liked these jeans I got him. They fit as expected and were comfortable. The only thing he didn't like was the fit.. He was expecting these straight jeans to be, well, straight! They looked more like bell-bottoms on him.

As others have mentioned, the jeans are made in all different places and use different measurements.  The Steely Blue is made in Colombia, Cash made in Pakistan, and the Andi is made in Cambodia.  The worst out of the bunch is the one made in Cambodia because the fit is too narrow and material is very thin.  The ones made in Cambodia seem to have the best fit and thickest jean material.

review_title: My husband has a pair exactly like these in the same size and they fit perfectly
review_body: My husband has a pair exactly like these in the same size and they fit perfectly.  These are so small he cannot come close to buttoning them.  Going to save until he loses weight.

its pretty nice

review_title: Lower quality... and that AWFUL smell!
review_body: That's it... no more colored Levi jeans for me. It's not the fit... it's the SMELL. This pair of black jeans has been washed over 10 times and they still have a pervasive chemical/dye smell that is really unpleasant. Black seems to be the worst but even the traditional blues smell for many washes. This does NOT happen with other brands... so I will be switching permanently. Honestly... this was an easy decision because the smell issue is just the icing on the cake of the relatively low quality that has been the default over the last few years (the belt loops are crap... will fail... and leave a hole in your jeans eventually).
My husband is not easily pleased....picky! He is happy with this choice.

Cheap quality denim. Not the same as older ones. After two weeks one of the belt loops broke loose. After a month the pocket began tearing off. Two weeks after that a split down the side of the pocket. Unwearable. I'll never buy Levis's again. :(
Recieved in a timely manner. fits good, washes great no runs or fades in the last 3 washes.

review_title: I like the way these jeans fit and wear.
review_body: Exactly what I had hoped to receive.  Perfectly sized, and the color that I was looking for.  I'm glad that I found these online.  As for fit, these are fitted in the waist, loose in the seat/thigh area, and then tapered a bit to the ankle.  I just went back and ordered another pair in a different color.

review_title: These are great! Fit is great
review_body: These are great!  Fit is great, they look great, high quality.  So much easier ordering this size on Amazon instead of trying to find this hard to find size in a store!

My husband loves these jeans.  They are smart looking, yet comfortable and of good quality.  I found them to be cheaper on Amazon than our local stores.  It sure beats rifling through the jeans at Kohls trying to find the right size, and then coming up with nothing!  Just click on your color and size, and have them shipped.  They arrived in less than a week.

review_title: Amazon, what a great way to buy jeans
review_body: Love Levi's jeans and the 550 fits me the best. The pants I bought are black with a black leather label with silver letters. The small Levi's tag is red. Not faded, not washed, the jeans have a new look but are not stiff. The thing that pleases me the most is buying them from Amazon. I take a popular size and when I go to the department store my size is more often than not "sold out". How nice it is to not only have my size but also a choice of colors!
These are a staple in my husband's wardrobe. Excellent quality, fit and comfort.

review_title: It has been getting worse and worse on the poor wear of Levi's over ...
review_body: After 30 years wearing Levi's for farm work, no longer. I bought these May 2018 and in less than two washing two belt handles ripped off.  It has been getting worse and worse on the poor wear of Levi's over the last few years but this was the cinch to change. Trying Lee and Cinch next - really would like to find a comfortable work jean that moves and wears well!
Love it.
great

review_title: Jeans are nice, but not amazing
review_body: I bought some 559's somewhere else and they were the most comfortable jeans.  However, I bought the same style 559, straight leg, relaxed fit but somehow the waist was wider and the pants were longer than the ones I purchased previously.  I matched the two jeans next to each other and the ones I ordered were definitely longer and bigger and not as comfortable.

review_title: The fit is right, but a tad short
review_body: I used to wear Levis 569, but since they changed the cutting and completely ruining that line, I decided to try the 559s. These were less baggy than the 569 which I like. I mostly own Levis jeans and they easily last me 8+ years. I hope these will be the same.

review_title: These are good jeans. It took a couple times ordering before ...

Good Pants. I've had them for eight months now and they're still going strong. I usually wear through the fabric of Levis slower than other brands, but they rarely last more than a year of washing and being active. I bought this color because my friends said I was wearing mom-jeans. Bunch of jerks.

It could just be the style, but these Levi's are rather thin. It could be the 559 or the little bit of stretch in them? They are just much thinner than Levi's used to be. But great price and it is nice ordering on Amazon because it is so frustrating finding my husband's size in store.
It's hard to find jeans in this size for my tall boyfriend, these fit him perfectly and look sharp.

review_title: Size different that at retail stores
review_body: Bought it to save a trip to retail store but luckily just order one pair - the size and fit is complete from ones at our retailer. Even the materials are different. Even though my old pair and this one carry the same size numbers and model number they are very different. This ones much lighter and less "relaxed". The material of this jeans much thinner. It could be a plus during the summer, though. The only difference that I can find in identification is that old pair made in Sri Lanka while this one is from Mexico. So, it seems to make sense for Amazon to include in product details the origin of the product.

review_title: My husband loves the way these fit. He was ...
review_body: My husband loves the way these fit. He was normally a lucky brand jean guy and these are a new fav! He is tall size 32x34 and his size is hard to find. But these were a surprising score! Will definitely be buying more in the future!
The fit from a 31" to 30" is dramatically smaller (waist and buttocks) than say going from a 32" to a 31".  I'll get there, but they fit more like 28" jeans.  I'm a thin/fit 50 year old.  lol

Purchased these for my husband because they didn't have this color combination in his size at Macy's and he was really sad about it.  They were the same price on Amazon and came within two days.  All I can say is va-va-va vhooom baby, these are bumtastic.  Love the cut.  All I need now is for him to wear these while cleaning the house and its on!

It is very well made, soft, and comfortable. It is very attractive and I can't wait to see him in it! The quality is way above what you see in most department stores and I would definitely buy it again.

This fits snug on top , but since they match my dark red sweatpants I will keep it.  Hope they can correct this for future purchases.

Good quality.

I've worn Levi's all my life (strayed a few times with "other" brands), and have always had no complaints...until recently. 2 pairs of 517's showed wear ("down to the threads" wear) in less than a year. That was something that took years of constant use until Levi changed their manufacturing/materials.

Levi's has always had a style of jeans to fit just about anyone. Although, like other reviewers have stated, they are getting much thinner as the years pass. Jeans that used to last me a good year or more now only last around 6 months if I'm lucky. Needless to say, if you are the type of person that dresses casual and can't afford 100 dollar jeans for going out on the town, Levi's still look nice and likely have a style that fits well on you. I just wouldn't suggest them for work anymore.
They fit like they should and look great!  So much easier than going to the store!

I've been buying these jeans at the stores for years and always tried them on because they all fit just a little different. Same size and style but there were always slight variations in the fit so I was a little nervous buying online. I'm happy to say these jeans fit perfect. I go through at least 6 pairs a year for work in construction and will certainly order them from Amazon from now on.

review_title: Not cut properly. Too long. Something just doesn't ...
review_body: Not cut properly. Too long. Something just doesn't feel right. Not the same quality jeans from years past for sure. Won't buy again.

review_title: Great pants for a short & fat guy
review_body: I have a hard time with jeans because I have short legs and a belly. Pants need to sit around my hips, under my belly, which means that I need a short inseam. These are the only jeans that don't squeeze my upper thighs and are short enough that I'm not walking on the back of the pants. They seem to fit like pants should fit a normal person, and they didn't need to be hemmed or modified. I'm 5'9" and weight 230lbs for those interested.

review_title: ) High quality stuff sent in good packaging. It was as advertised
review_body: They are pants. You put one leg inside and then the other (unless you're some sort of alien who can do both legs at the same time - freak!)

review_title: Too small even though had just bought same size / brand locally.

Macy's didn't have the lighter color I wanted in stock, so I figured I'd source those online.  Unfortunately the two pair I bought online are too small even though they are the exact same size and Levis brand.  Now the hassle of returning, etc..  Also, the button hole above the zipper is too small for the button, very difficult to button / unbutton, and not because of the fit...the hole is just a little too small to where you have to struggle a bit.  Disappointed.

Very nice - Fit well and look great.

I like the jean, however, it was too tight in the thigh. I ordered three different color 559's at the same time and the other two fit fine. I laid the black jeans on top of the other jeans to see if there was a noticeable difference in size and there was, about and inch-ish. That was enough for me since I wear them with a comfortably snug fit. No big deal, though, It was easy enough to exchange the black ones for another color, which fit just fine. I did consider exchanging black for black, thinking the ones I received were perhaps cut differently in Columbia than the other ones, which were made in Mexico or Cambodia​.
Hard to find my size at our local store. They arrived as expected, when expected, fit as expected, looked as expected
Great color, great fit. I have a body meant for jeans apparently, so across the board, all brands jeans fit me well in the 34-34 department. These jeans are no exception.

I don't know why is the difference in the quality of the clothes. The blue one in was more hard and the grey i was bought before. Much quality and durable. Same items must have same materials and quality measures. So my review is for the first one i bought.

review_title: Warning!  Fabric is very thin! Very different than normal 559s!
review_body: These jeans are terrible.  As soon as I opened the bag, I could immediately tell a difference.  The fabric is easily half the thickness of the 559s that I purchased at a store.  They feel like they were made to be tight women's jeans (that comment came from my wife).

review_title: Fit varies widely, suggesting quality control issues
review_body: I bought these jeans because I had the exact same jeans - or so I thought - in a 32x32 and they were a bit snug at the waist, but I liked them otherwise.  So I ordered 33x32, but in black, thinking they should fit perfect.  No way - they are at least 3 inches bigger at the waist and bigger overall through the thighs.  They are so much bigger that they fall down, and this is after washing and drying on high heat.  Seems to me Levis has some quality control issues.

review_title: Men are lucky that the sizes are built right into ...
review_body: Men are lucky that the sizes are built right into their pants. Sure, sometimes they're a little off, but for the most part if you know your size you can buy pants online. Or your wife can buy them for you, which is what happened here. So, in conclusion, men are lucky and men's pants are sized in a way that makes sense, and these men's jeans reflect reality.

This is the second pair of levis I purchased that no longer fit right in the backside. So Levi's took a winning fit and changed it so I'm constantly pulling up the backside of my pants. Brilliant. I'm uncomfortable no matter if I get up from a chair, get into my car, or shift positions. I guess they retooled their design so they could save a buck–but that is that last buck they will get from me. I've been a loyal customer for over 30 years. If you know of a brand of blue jeans that actually fit please leave a suggestion.
